loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine, age 48, raises hogs to be fattened and eventually offered for sale. She manages her business while her husband is busy in their rice field. Between the two of them, they are able to support her two children in their studies. With the help and support of her husband, Josephine has become confident in running her business successfully. From the profits she earns from her business, Josephine is able to help provide for the family's daily necessities and strives to improve their standard of living. 

Josephine has paid back her previous loan and is now requesting another loan in the amount of PhP 20,000, which she will use to buy hog feed and vitamins for her three hogs. She is hopeful that her requested loan funds will help her meet her life goals. In addition, she is grateful for the continuous access of financial services available to her from Kiva lenders through ASKI so that she can continue to ensure the proper growth of her hogs. As a result, she is able to offer her hogs to buyers at higher prices.

Through the generated income from her business, she intends to build savings toward ensuring a bright future of her children.

loans.use: to buy hog feed and vitamins for her three hogs

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna, age 23, is a beekeeper. She has been involved in this business for four years and now keeps 15 bee colonies. She sells the honey in Kapan city, where this product is in big demand.
 
Anna would like to purchase more bee colonies and expand her farm. She also wants to purchase hives in which to keep the bees, but currently does not have enough funds. This loan will help Anna to purchase more bee colonies and hives, which will mean more gathered honey and additional income from its sale.

Anna lives in Kapan city with her uncle. The house where they live needs to be renovated. Developing her beekeeping business is important for Anna, allowing her to earn more income, complete the house renovation, and foster better living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for 10 bee colonies and 11 hives

loans.name: Djiguéne Bakhna 34 Group

texts.fr:
Djiguène bakhna 34 est un groupement mixte composé de 5 membres et est situé à environ 22 km de la ville principale.Ce groupement s’active sur la vente de fruits, il est dirigé par Mme Fatou marié et mère de famille.
Mme Fatou achète et revend des fruits et légumes depuis plus de 10 ans. Elle demande ce crédit pour acheter et revendre ces mêmes produits. 
Les bénéfices qu’elle aura lui permettront d’aider son mari à la scolarisation de leurs enfants et à la dépense quotidienne.
Mme Fatou veut un jour avoir son propre magasin de vente.
texts.en: Djiguène Bakhna 34 is a mixed group with 5 members located about 22 km from the main city. This group sells fruits and is led by Mrs. Fatou, a married mother. Mrs. Fatou has been buying and reselling fruit and vegetables for more than 10 years. She is seeking a loan to buy and resell more of these products. The profits that she will have will allow her to help her husband to send their children to school and with daily expenses. Mrs. Fatou would one day like to have her own store.

loans.use: to buy various food products (palm oil, dried fish) and fruit to resell

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret is a 41-year-old married woman with three children living in Kasese, Uganda. For the past seven years she has sold poultry; she also sells clothes on the side. With her profits she has been able to pay school fees for her children. A shortage of money for chicken feed, price fluctuations and inflation challenge her.

Margret is requesting a 1,200,000 UGX loan from HOFOKAM to buy feed for her poultry. Her goals include educating her children and building a permanent home while expanding her poultry business into new markets.

loans.use: to buy feed for her poultry.

loans.name: Gulsara

texts.ru: Гулсара – 37 лет, вдова, имеет 3 детей. Занимается торговлей детской одежды в центральном рынке. Опыт в этой деятельности более 4 лет. Её занятие является основным доходом для семьи. Она хочет накопить денег, чтобы дети ни в чем не нуждались и дать им хорошее образование. С каждого дохода она откладывает необходимую сумму. Этот кредит Гулсары второй по счету. Она не нарушала условия кредитования, а также доказала свою пунктуальность. На полученный кредит планирует увеличить свой товарооборот, закупить сезонную детскую одежду. Гулсара выражает свою благодарность нашей организации за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Gulsara is 37 years old, a widow and has three children.  She is involved in selling children's clothing at the central market.  She has over four years of experience in this business.  This business is the primary source of income for her family.  Gulsara wants to save money to make sure that her children are not in need for anything and to provide them with a good education.  She sets aside a necessary amount from each of her income earnings.  This is Gulsara's second loan.  She did not violate the financing terms and also proved her punctuality.  She plans to increase her goods turnover with this loan by buying seasonal children's clothing.  Gulsara expresses her gratitude to our organization for the financial support.

loans.use: to buy seasonal children's clothing

loans.name: Genaro

texts.es: Genaro de cuarenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz tiene varios años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, para cada cosecha mejora la calidad de su trabajo, el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola, comercia en todos los alrededores del lugar y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable; Genaro es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor, siempre buscando las mejores oportunidades para superarse y alcanzar el éxito, en esta temporada de siembra desea aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital para invertir en los insumos por eso le solicita  INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante, insecticida, herramientas, etc. Genaro tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Genaro, 45, lives in his own home with his common-law wife and his children. He makes his living through farming; specifically he grows corn. He has been working in agriculture for many years and has gained valuable experience which has allowed him to increase his income.  He works to make every harvest better than the last. 

His land is located in an area with a great deal of commerce and agricultural activity.  He has many customers, since it is well-known that his crops are of high quality, and his prices are affordable.  Further, his service is impeccable.

Genaro his an enterprising and hardworking man.   He is always looking for opportunities to better himself and be successful.  In this planting season he wishes to increase his production, but he needs working capital to invest in the supplies he needs.  Thus he is seeking this loan in order to buy corn, fertilizer, insecticide, tools and other items. He has good credit references and is very responsible.  He promises to repay this loan while at the same time providing his family with a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn, fertilizer, insecticide and tools.

loans.name: Bart

texts.en:
Bart, a 38-year-old divorced man and sole caregiver of his four children living in Kasese, Uganda, has been operating a retail shop for the past year. It was purchased with capital saved from his previous work which involved carpentry.

Bart's business hardship is inadequate capital to purchase enough store stock, and so he is requesting this loan to buy sugar, flour and cooking oil for his store. His business goal is to expand into new markets, and his personal goals are educating his children and building a permanent house.

loans.use: to buy sugar, flour and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Salvador

texts.es: Salvador de 62 años de edad, es un hombre muy emprendedor, el cual posee 25 años de experiencia en trabajar como agricultor. Él vive junto a su esposa la cual se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar y tres hijos, los cuales le ayudan a su padre a sembrar la semilla, y así mismo a darle todos los cuidados necesarios para una excelente cosecha. Salvador posee una parcela en la cual cultiva diferentes tipos de granos básicos, los cuales coloca en unos graneros de forma cilíndricas hechos de acero inoxidable, estos granos son los que luego comercializa  con sus diferentes clientes los cuales le compran por mayor, este es un negocio el cual le ha permitido contar con todo lo necesario durante 25 años. Él solicita  un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para comprar mayor cantidad de abono, maíz, pesticidas, y así mismo pagar la mano de obra para desgranas el elote, esto le permite elaborar un mejor trabajo y obtener mayores ganancias, así mismo le permite brindarle fuentes de trabajo a otras personas lo cual es muy importante para Salvador.
texts.en:
Salvador, 62, is a very enterprising man.  He has 25 years’ experience working in agriculture.  He lives with his wife who does household chores and their three children who help their father plant the seeds and to provide all necessary care to produce an excellent harvest.

Salvador has a parcel of land where he grows various basic grains that he stores in cylindrical stainless steel silos.  He subsequently sells the grain to various customers who buy at wholesale.  This is a business that has allowed him to have everything necessary for 25 years.

He’s asking for a loan to have the money needed to buy larger amounts of manure, corn and pesticides as well as to pay labor costs to hull the corn.  
This will allow him to do better work and obtain higher profits while providing a source of employment for others which is very important to Salvador.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Jaime Oliverio

texts.es: Jaime Oliverio de 23 años de edad, es un joven lleno de muchos sueños todos con vista al bienestar de su amada familia la cual está conformada por su esposa y un pequeño hijo. Jaime trabaja sembrando granos básicos, a los cuales también les da todo los cuidados necesarios para realizar un excelente trabajo. Este oficio lo aprendió de su familia por lo que está muy agradecido ya que es el que hasta ahora le permite sostener a su hogar. Jaime solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para la compra de graneros para depositar el maíz y los frijoles que posteriormente comercializara. Así mismo comprará abono, palas, más arados y pesticidas para controlar cualquier tipo de plaga que quiera dañar su cultivo. Jaime se destaca por ser muy trabajador y responsable, características muy positiva.
texts.en:
At the age of 23, Jaime Oliverio is a young man who is full of dreams aimed at his beloved family’s wellbeing.   His family consists of his wife and a little son.  Jaime works planting basic grains and giving them all the care they need in order to do an excellent job.  He learned this occupation from his family which he’s very grateful for because to date it allows him to support his home.

Jaime is asking for a loan to have the money needed to buy silos to store the corn and beans that he’ll subsequently sell.  He’ll also buy manure, shovels, more plows and pesticide to control any type of infestation that might damage his crops.  Jaime stands out for being very hardworking and responsible-very positive characteristics.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies and tools.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 45 years old and has three school-aged children. He is a hardworking father who owns and manages a rice farm in his community. His aim is to increase his yields and income so as to enable him to finance the education of his children and satisfy their daily basic needs. Despite problems and difficulties in life, he is determined to uplift his family’s standard of living and give them a better life.

To improve his farm, Samuel is asking for a 20,000 PHP loan from ASKI to buy fertilizer and pesticides and pay for the expenses incurred in transplanting rice. He believes that this loan will enable him to improve his farm and lead to a large harvest this coming season.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides and pay for the expenses incurred in transplanting rice.

location.town: Brgy. Mangayang, Dupax del Sur, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Musyenene Women Group

texts.en:
Selestine is a 50-year-old married man with three children living who lives in Kasese, Uganda. For the past four years, he has been operating a pharmacy. Selestine's major business hardships are customers not paying on time and inadequate capital to purchase stock. 

Selestine is requesting a loan to buy drugs and medicines to sell. In the future, his personal goal is to educate his children and his business goal is to buy land to grow crops.

loans.use: to buy drugs and medicine

loans.name: Geoffrey

texts.en:
Geoffrey, age 35, is a farmer in the Litein area of South Rift Kenya. He has been engaged in farming for 12 years, producing mainly milk and tea for the local market. He and his wife have four children. The youngest is a one-year-old baby and the eldest is 10 years old. 

Geoffrey has requested a loan of 30,000 KES from Kiva partner Juhudi Kilimo to help him venture into poultry farming. He will use the loan funds to buy poultry birds. He believes this endeavor will help to uplift his family's living standards through the generation of more income. He adds that the loan will also help him improve the family dairy business. His future plan is to venture into transport business, since he says transport remains the major challenge for farmers in the area.

loans.use: to buy poultry birds

loans.name: Naji

texts.en:
Naji, age 31, supports a family of five in Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan. He is requesting a loan in the amount of 500 JD in order to improve and expand his home. 

His future dream is to purchase and own a house that his family can live in.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements

loans.name: Miriam Estela

texts.es: Miriam Estela de cincuenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo mayor en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas su negocio está ubicado en su domicilio en un lugar estratégico porque por ahí circulan muchas personas, es muy conocida en la zona pues sus tortillas son las más ricas y calientitas y tiene mucha clientela pues saben que son elaboradas con material de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es el más rápido; Miriam es una mujer emprendedora, con muchas metas por alcanzar, trabaja a diario para ganarse el pan de cada día y sabe que con esfuerzo y dedicación logrará el éxito, en los últimos meses aumento la demanda el doble y eso la impulso para hacer crecer el negocio;  necesita invertir en insumos pero no posee de capital suficiente por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, leña etc. Miriam Estela tiene capacidad crediticia y una moral impecable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Miriam Estela, 52, lives with her long term partner and their son in their own home, from where she runs her business selling tortillas. Her home is strategically located as many people pass by, and she is well known in the area for her freshly-made, tasty tortillas. She has won over many customers who know that she uses the finest ingredients in her tortillas and sells them at an affordable price, as well as offering the fastest service. Miriam is a hard-working lady and has many dreams that she wishes to achieve. She works every day in order to earn her living and she knows that her hard work and dedication will bring her success. In recent months her orders have doubled and, consequently, she decided to grow her business. She needs to invest money in her supplies but she does not have sufficient capital, so she is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan which will allow her to buy more wholesale corn and firewood etc. Miriam Estela has a good credit history and impeccable principles; she is certain that she will be able to settle her debt and offer her family a better standard of living at the same time.

loans.use: to buy wholesale corn and firewood

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine has a dairy farm. She has successfully been managing her dairy farm with her one cow in Kitale, Western Kenya, and has also been actively engaged in farming for 10 successive years. Her farm produces milk and maize, which she sells to the local market. She runs her farm with the help of one farmhand. She supplements her farming income by running a tailoring business in the local market. She and her husband have two grown children, aged 23 and 26.

Josephine has requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to help her buy poultry birds for a new venture into poultry farming. She is confident that expanding into this endeavor will help her build a good capital base for her family business. She hopes to expand her dairy farming as well.

Josephine points out that animal diseases, high cost of feed, and lack of capital are the major challenges for local farming businesses.

loans.use: to buy poultry birds

loans.name: Manal

texts.en:
Manal, age 43, is a conservative woman who prefers not to display her photo on the Internet, so her husband is pictured here. She lives with her family of four in Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan. 

She is requesting a loan in the amount of 600 JD so that she can pay for home improvements and make her house into a better living environment for her family.

loans.use: to pay for house improvements

loans.name: Om Nassim Group

texts.en:
This group is called Om Nassim and it is made up of four members Thakra, Monirh, Najibh, and Nahla  who joined together because they are friends. They live in Aden, Yemen. They took out a loan of 180,000 YER.

Monirh is the president of this group. She is 39 years old, a married woman, and has five children who live together in Aden, Yemen. (She is the second woman from the right.)   She has been selling incense and ladies' fabrics for three years. She works hard to provide for her family. Because of  her desire to work  she has obtained  the satisfaction of her clients. 

Currently, she has applied for a loan of  60,000 YER from AMB to buy incense, fabrics and perfumes for her business. She hopes to expand her business to sell all types of clothes in order to offer a good life to her family. She would like to enroll her children in the best private schools.

loans.use: to buy incense, fabrics and perfumes for her business

loans.name: Al-Asala Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Asala and consists of Habibh, Azizh, Wardh and Aziza. They took out a loan of 250,000 YER.

Azizh is the president of her group. She is 42 years old, a married woman, and has three children. (She is the woman wearing a green and brown scarf.) She lives in Sana`a, Yemen. She has been selling all kinds of spices. She started her business several years ago with a small amount of capital. She did this because she needed a way to support her family. She says she offers her clients good service. This has earned her a very good reputation, as well as allowing her to increase her sales. 

Azizh is requesting this loan of 60,000 YER to buy products such as chili peppers, etc. for her business. She hopes to have many stores in order to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy products such as chili peppers, etc. for her business

loans.name: Mario Joel

texts.es: Mario Joel de 29 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos, él se destaca por ser muy trabajador, y se esfuerza día con día para salir adelante y dar lo mejor de sí.  Mario se dedica a sembrar frijoles, maíz y maicillo, los cuales comercializa en diferentes agencias distribuidoras de granos básicos de su pueblo. Él solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de semilla de maíz, frijoles y maicillo para sembrar, de esta forma él espera incrementar su cosecha y así incrementar al máximo sus ventas, de este mismo modo desea comercializar en su casa, por lo que necesita invertir en más siembra, lo que podrá alcanzar gracias a dicho préstamo.
texts.en:
Mario Joel, 29, lives with his wife and children.  He stands out for being very hardworking.  He strives daily to get ahead and give his best.

Mario works planting corn, beans and sorghum that he sells to various basic grain distributing agencies in his town.  He’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to have the money needed to buy corn and bean seeds and sorghum to plant.  

He expects this way to increase his harvest thus increasing his sales to the maximum.  In this way he also wants to sell from home so he needs to invest more in the crops which he’ll be able to do thanks to said loan.

loans.use: to buy sorghum.

loans.name: Ireneo

texts.en:
Ireneo, age 59, manages a farming business. He lives in Gonzaga, and he and his wife have three children. He has been working in his field for 18 years and he knows from experience that it is not easy. He pursues his work for sake of improving his family's standard of living. 

He is requesting a loan in the amount of PhP 15,000 in order to buy the seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides required for executing a successful farming venture. He hopes to increase his income through his loan, allowing him to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides for his farm

loans.name: Sandra Estela

texts.es: Sandra Estela de 22 años de edad, es una joven muy trabajadora la cual se dedica a la agricultura, a pesar de su corta edad, ella ya posee varios años de experiencia en este trabajo. Ella vive junto a sus padres y hermanos quienes también trabajan como agricultores. Sandra junto a su familia siembran maíz y frijoles, los cuales posteriormente comercializan por mayor a diferentes en tiendas y mercados. Sandra solicita un préstamo con el deseo de comprar todos los productos necesarios para el cuidado de sus semillas, tales como abono, pesticidas y otros instrumentos muy necesarios para realizar este trabajo.  Ella es una persona muy alegre y amable que se dedica de lleno al bienestar de su hogar y su familia, por lo que espera obtener mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Sandra Estela, 22, is a very hardworking young woman who works in agriculture.  Despite her young age she already has several years’ experience in this work.

She lives with her parents and siblings who also work as farmers.  Sandra and her family grow corn and beans which they subsequently sell at wholesale to various stores and markets.

Sandra is asking for a loan wanting to buy all the products needed for the care of her seeds like manure, pesticide and other tools that are very necessary to do this work.

She’s a very cheerful, kind person who is totally committed to her home’s and her family’s wellbeing which is why she’s hoping to obtain higher profits.

loans.use: to buy manure.

loans.name: José Santana

texts.es: José Santana de cuarenta y tres años de edad vive junto a su hija en casa propia; Él se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras tiene en variedad plátanos, cebollas, papa, tomate, chile, entre otros el negocio está ubicado en su vivienda además manda en su vehículo otra parte de la venta para que comercie ambulante, su negocio es el más surtido del lugar y el más conocido ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo el producto de excelente calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable; José es un hombre emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir adelante siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan alcanzar el éxito, quiere acrecentar el negocio pero necesita de capital para poder invertir por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito y comprar verdura y fruta por mayor; José Santana es muy responsable y tiene excelentes referencias de pago asegura que podrá pagar el financiamiento y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: José Santana, 43 years old, lives with his daughter in their own home. He runs his business selling fruit and vegetables from his home, offering a range of bananas, onions, potatoes, tomatoes and chilies among other items.He also uses his vehicle to deliver goods as part of a mobile service. His business is the best stocked in the area and the best known as he now has many clients who know that all his produce is of excellent quality and at affordable prices, as well as which his business is unrivalled. Jose is a hard-working man with a great desire to progress; he is always on the look out for new opportunities which will offer him the chance of success. He wants to grow his business but he needs capital in order to invest, so he is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy wholesale fruit and vegetables. Jose Santana is a responsible person with excellent credit references, and he is certain that he will be able to repay his loan and offer his family a better standard of living at the same time.

loans.use: wholesale fruit and vegetables

loans.name: Emilia

texts.en: Emilia is opening a kiosk and she is requesting a loan of $600 to improve her business. With the loan, she will be able to buy more things to keep in her store. She is making a good income.

loans.use: To buy cigarettes, beer, and other items to sell

loans.name: Ana

texts.en: Ana is living in the city and is requesting a loan of $600 to do her business. She can buy more things now because the loan is offered. With the loan, she can improve her business.

loans.use: To buy biscuits, candles, noodles, and other things to sell

loans.name: Orlando

texts.en:
Orlando is married to Marilyn and has been a rice farmer for 15 years. He believes that he will keep on producing a good rice crop to enable him to increase his profits.

Orlando is requesting a 20,000 PHP loan to purchase sacks of fertilizer and insecticide to improve the health of his crop. He will use his loan to improve his way of life and save for future emergencies if he or his wife become weak. Orlando hopes to increase his farmland in the future.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and insecticide to improve his rice crop

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose, age 41, has been engaged in farming for over five years. She started this business to increase her income so as to better support her family. She and her husband have three children. 

Due to insufficient funds, she is requesting a loan in the amount of PhP 20,000 to purchase seeds, insecticides, and fertilizers. She is grateful to lenders because they provide much-needed financial assistance that helps many farmers. She is confident that the loan funds, combined with her own hard work, will bring her a profitable harvest this coming harvest season.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, insecticides, and fertilizers

loans.name: Maria

texts.en: A loan of $600 helps Maria to do what she wants to do to make money. She buys vegetables and coconuts and then sells them to make a profit. She is happy to do this kind of activity. She earns good money doing this business.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and coconuts to sell

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is involved in agriculture through cultivating land and breeding cattle. The main source of income for Susan's family comes from their livestock. They sell the gathered milk and meat to wholesale traders. Susan would like to purchase more livestock in order to gather more meat and milk. To implement this, she needs money. With the requested loan, Susan plans to purchase a cow, eleven sheep, five lambs, and two pigs. This will allow Susan to have more income from her agricultural business. It is important that she increases the number of livestock that she owns so that she can develop her farm further. 

Susan lives with her husband, son, and mother-in-law, and they are also involved in agriculture. She dreams that her son will start his own family and live in prosperous conditions. The development of her agricultural business is vital to making her dreams come true.

loans.use: To pay for a cow, eleven sheep, five lambs, and two pigs

loans.name: Fatu

texts.en: Fatu lives in Buchanan with her husband and five children. Her children are between the ages of 14 and 27.  Fatu's husband is a contractor. Only the youngest one lives at home, while the others are with their grandmother, and attend school. Fatu has sold food stuff like biscuits, candy, Sardinia (sardines) and bread for the past 18 years now. She likes to do this business because she is able to support her home. She is requesting a loan to purchase more Sardinia (sardines), bread, candy, and biscuits for her business. Her future plans are to build a house for her children and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more Sardinia (sardines), bread, candy, and biscuits for her business

loans.name: Topista

texts.en:
Topista, a 47-year-old married mother of nine children living in Kasese, Uganda, has been operating a bar business for seven years. The business profits have enabled her to pay school fees and renovate her house. Her hardships are seasonal weather and inadequate capital to purchase enough stock.

While Topista's business goal is expanding her business into new markets, her personal goal is educating the children and so she is now requesting a loan to pay their school fees.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Mohammed

texts.en: Mohammed is 54 years old, a married man, and has 12 children who live in Taiz, Yemen. He has a house. He works tirelessly to acquire income for the education of his children. He inherited a plot of land from his father that enabled him to build the first floor of his house. Now, he has managed to build a part of the second floor and he would like to complete his second floor, so he is asking for a loan of 300,000 YER from AMB to buy iron and cement for his house.

loans.use: to buy iron and cement for the second floor of his house

loans.name: Noah

texts.en:
Noah is a thirty-five-year-old married man with four children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been running a retail shop for seven years. 

His hardships are inadequate capital to purchase enough stock, customers not paying on time, and high fuel and transportation costs. His personal goals are educating his children, building a permanent home, and self education. His business goals are buying land to grow crops, hiring employees to help expand his business, and expanding his business into new markets.

Noah wants the loan to buy building materials for construction of his residential house.

loans.use: to buy building materials for construction of his residential house.

loans.name: Ronald

texts.en:
Robert is a 24-year-old married man with a child living in Kasese, Uganda. For the past two years, he has been operating a retail shop, starting with 500,000 UGX that has become 2,500,000 UGX in working capital. Robert's business hardships are inadequate capital to purchase stock; high fuel and transportation costs; and price fluctuations and inflation. 

Robert is requesting a loan to buy sugar, soap, salt, soda, and beer to sell. His personal goals are to educate his children, build a permanent house, and buy a car. His business goals are to diversify his business and buy land to grow crops.

loans.use: to buy sugar, soap, salt, soda, and beer

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge, es una persona muy conocida en su lugar de vivienda por ser responsable, amable y trabajador, vive junto a su esposa y dos hijos quienes le ayudan en el negocio. Jorge se dedica a la agricultura sembrando maíz y frijoles, debido a su amplia experiencia y a la excelente tierra de su parcela obtiene muy buenas cosechas. Para poder obtener ganancias extras Jorge también trabaja como albañil, realizando diferentes trabajos como construcción de muros, baños sanitarios y otros más, los cuales son temporales pero son de mucho beneficio para su economía. Jorge solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de maíz y frijoles para sembrar, de modo que pueda duplicar la cantidad de granos básicos y así venderlos con más clientes.
texts.en:
Jorge is a very well-known person where he lives for being very responsible, kind and hardworking.  He lives with his wife and two children who help him with his business.

Jorge works in agriculture planting corn and beans.  Thanks to his vast experience and the excellent soil in his parcel he gets good harvests.
In order to earn extra profits, Jorge also works in construction doing various construction jobs like erecting walls, building bathrooms and others, which are seasonal but of great benefit for his economy.

Jorge is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy larger amounts of corn and seed to plant so that he can double the amount of basic grains to sell to more customers.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen, age 49, has operated a transport business for five years. He is a married man with five children living in Kasese, Uganda. His primary hardship is seasonal weather, especially the rainy season, which makes most of the roads impassable. In addition, he faces high fuel and transportation costs, price fluctuation, and inflation.

His personal goals are to secure the education of his children and to build a permanent house for the family. His business goals are to diversify his business, buy land to grow crops, and obtaining at least three motor vehicles for his transport business.

Stephen is requesting a loan in order to buy motor vehicle tires to replace those that have worn out.

loans.use: to buy motor vehicle tires to replace those that have worn out

loans.name: Adnan

texts.en:
Adnan is 31 years old, a married man who lives in Taiz, Yemen. He has been selling gas cylinders. He has had this business for six years.  He started his business with a small amount of capital until he was able to expand his business.  He has employed one worker in his business. Thanks to his business he has been able to build a small house. 

Now, he is aiming for a higher income to improve his family's living conditions but he suffers from insufficient funds. So, he is now requesting a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to buy gas cylinders to increase his profit. He hopes for the further improvement of his business in order to achieve better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy gas cylinders for increased income

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is a 49-year-old woman from Baqa'a, Jordan, who has a family of nine. 

Fatima is requesting a 500 JOD loan to purchase new furniture and thus improve the living space for her large family.

loans.use: to purchase new furniture for her home

loans.name: Loice

texts.en:
Loice is a thirty-six-year-old married woman with five children living in Kasese, Uganda. 

She has been operating a shop for ten years. She started with 3,000,000 shillings and now has 10,000,000 shillings as working capital.

Her personal goal is to educate her children and her business dream is to have a wholesale shop. 

Loice intends to use the money to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Ndeye Maty

texts.fr: Madame Ndeye Maty réside au Sénégal. C’est une femme mariée qui s’active dans le secteur du commerce plus spécialement dans la vente de bazins teintés plus connu sous le nom de ¨Thioups¨ ,parfums et autres tissus et marchandises diverses. Elle exerce cette activité commerciale depuis plus de 5  ans. Son ambition est de développer son activité de commerce. Par  conséquent elle sollicite un crédit  de 500.000 francs CFA au guichet de l’U-IMCEC où elle est membre. Une partie du financement sera prévu pour l’achat de thioups destinés à la vente, l’autre partie sera orientée vers le démarrage d’une nouvelle activité de vente de téléphones portables. Ainsi l’objectif visé est la diversification de son activité de commerce dans l’espoir d’une croissance de ses bénéfices et du niveau de son épargne. Avec ce financement elle pourra contribuer à l’amélioration des conditions alimentaires de sa famille. Son  plus grand rêve est d’arriver a bien se positionner dans le secteur de l’import-export.
texts.en:
Ndeye Maty lives in Senegal. She is married, and works in trade, more specifically selling dyed basin cloth (known as thioub), perfumes, other cloths and various other items. 

Ndeye Maty has been working in this business for five years. Her ambition is to expand her business and she is therefore requesting a loan of 500 000 CFA francs at the branch of UIMCEC of which she is a member. 

Part of the loan will go towards purchasing thioub for sale, and the other part will be allocated to starting a new business selling mobile phones. In this way, she aims to diversify her business in order to increase her profits and increase her savings. With this loan she will be able to better feed her family. Her greatest ambition is to be well-placed in the import-export business.

loans.use: to travel within her local area and buy thioub and mobile phones to resell

loans.name: Edson

texts.en:
Edson is a 35-year-old married man with three children living in Kasese, Uganda. For the past seven years, he has been running a retail shop with capital acquired from previous savings as a teacher. Edson began with 500,000 UGX and now has 3,000,000 UGX in working capital. His business hardships are inadequate capital to purchase enough stock, price fluctuation, and inflation. 

Edson is requesting a loan to buy soap, sugar, salt, and cooking oil to sell. His personal goal to educate his children and his business goal is to expand his business to new markets.

loans.use: to buy soap, sugar, salt, and cooking oil to sell

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is a twenty-seven-year-old single mother living in Kasese, Uganda. 

She has been dealing in a hardware and plastics business for ten months. She started with 2,000,000 shillings and now has 6,000,000 shillings as working capital. 

Her hardships are high taxes, price fluctuations, and inflation. Her personal goal is to build a permanent home and her business goal is to move her business to a more permanent location.

Juliet wants the loan to buy plastics for resale.

loans.use: to buy plastics for resale.

loans.name: Jenniffer

texts.en:
Jenniffer is a thirty-nine-year-old widowed woman with one child living in Kasese, Uganda. 

She has been running a shoe shop for ten years. Her hardships are high taxes, customers not paying on time, price fluctuation, and inflation. 

Her personal goals are educating her child and building a permanent house for residence. Her business goals are expanding her business into new markets and moving her business to a more permanent location.

Jennifer wants the loan to buy shoes for resale.

loans.use: to buy shoes for resale.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en: Josephine is an industrious mother who engages in farming in the village. Through the income generated from her business, she is able to help provide for her family's basic needs, but unable to support all the education of her five children. Consequently, she is requesting a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy additional seeds, fertilizer and insecticides. With this, she can now sustain the essential needs of her farm and she is hoping for a high harvest soon. She also hopes for her family's standard of living to improve and to be able to let her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy additional seeds, fertilizer and insecticides

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en: Julieta is an industrious person who has been engaged in growing rice for 20 years. She is 55 years old, married, and has four children. She usually plants and harvests rice to sell. Julieta works hard through her rice farm business to lift her family out of poverty. Right now, Julieta is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy fertilizers and insecticides to sustain her farming  business. She hopes to maintain her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides

loans.name: Ashot

texts.en:
Ashot is a young entreprenur from Yerevan. For three years already he has been running a bakery. Now Ashot would like to purchase a new oven for the bakery to increase production and improve the quality of the products. Thus Ashot has applied for this loan. With the loan's help he will also purchase flour for bread production. 

Ashot lives with his mother, a teacher, and his father, a police officer. Unfortunately, their salaries are too low and are not sufficient to make ends meet. So the current business provides the main income for the family. It's also important for Ashot to be a financially independant person and support his own family in the future.

loans.use: to pay for flour and a new oven

loans.name: Elida

texts.es:
La señora Elida labora como cocinera hospitalaria y  realiza su trabajando por turnos elaborando los deliciosos platillos que deleitaran  los pacientes y trabajadores de un hospital de la ciudad de león.

El  crédito solicitado a Ceprodel fue utilizado para compra de laminas de zinc, perlines, brochas,  varillas para soldar, para instalación de techo a un cuarto, ella actualmente vive en un casa muy pequeña y su familia a crecido por lo que necesita mayor espacio para tener un poco de comodidad y así mejorar el nivel de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Elida works shifts as a hospital cook where she makes delicious food to delight the patients and workers in the Leon city hospital.

The CEPRODEL loan that she has applied for will be used to buy metal corrugated sheeting, purlines, bolts and solder rods to build a roof onto one of the rooms of her home. Currently she lives in a very small house and her family has grown, so she needs to have more space so that they can be more comfortable and, thus, improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: To buy metal sheeting, purlines, bolts and solder rods.

loans.name: Asasio

texts.en:
Asasio is a thirty-one-year-old married man with five children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been fishing for one year. His hardships are customers not paying on time, price fluctuation, inflation, and high fuel and transportation costs. His personal goal is educating his children and his business goal is diversifying the business to include motorcycle transport.  

Asasio wants money to buy fishnets for fishing.

loans.use: to buy fish nets for fishing.

loans.name: Juan Amílcar

texts.es: Juan Amílcar de cuarenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida en casa propia; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, ya tiene diez años de dedicarse a la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en el rubro que le permite siempre tener calidad en su trabajo, el terreno donde cultiva está cercano a la localidad donde vive y comercia en todas las zonas aledañas, ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas le prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable; Juan es un hombre dedicado a su labor siempre dispuesto a superarse; en la cosecha pasada tuvo mucha perdida debido a la tormenta nombrada E12, y en este periodo de siembra quiere recuperarse e invertir en insumos para la producción por eso le solicita a  INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante, herramienta. Juan Amílcar tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, sabe que cancelara el financiamiento y a la vez le dará a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Juan Amílcar, 45, lives with his life companion in his own home.  He grows corn, and has ten years of farming experience, which has allowed him to consistently raise quality crops.  The land where he grows his crops is close to where he lives, and he sells his corn in all of the surrounding areas.  He has many customers; they prefer to work with him because he always has what they need at affordable prices, and he offers unparalleled service.

He is a hardworking and dedicated man and is always looking to better himself.  In the last season he lost a great deal of his crops due to Tropical Storm E12, and in the current planting season he wants to recover his losses and invest in supplies for raising his corn.  For this reason he is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to buy seed corn, fertilizer and tools.

Juan Amílcar has good credit references and is very responsible. He knows that he will repay this loan while at the same time providing his family with a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn, fertilizer and tools.

loans.name: Zeinab

texts.en: Zeinab is a 60-year-old woman from Al-Hashmi, Amman, Jordan, who lives with two other family members. She is requesting a loan of 400 JD to so that she can make improvements on her home including repairs, thus bettering her family's living space.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements

loans.name: Enos

texts.en:
Enos, a 35-year-old married father of four children living in Kasese, Uganda, has been dealing in cosmetics for 15 years, and he has reaped tangible benefits from it, including a house.

His hardship is high taxes; his business goal is to move his enterprise to a more permanent location, while his personal goal is to educate the children. Enos is now requesting a loan to buy more cosmetics to sell.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Calvin

texts.en: Calvin is a thirty-eight-year-old married woman with two children living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been operating a retail shop for three years. Her hardships are customers not paying on time and high taxes. Her personal goal is educating children and her business goal is expanding her business into new markets. Calvin wants money to buy books, paper and pens to sell.

loans.use: to buy books, paper and pens to sell.

loans.name: Gaylin

texts.en: Gaylin is 38 years old, married, and has three children. She aims to improve their standard of living and to give their children a better future. Farming is one of their major sources of income, so Gaylin really cares for her business. They have been in this business for more than 8 years and usually earn a profit of PHP10,000 every harvest season. Now, she is asking for a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy rice seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, and to pay for labor costs required for executing farming work. They believe that this loan will be an enormous help for them to increase their yield.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, and to pay for labor costs

loans.name: Leniticus

texts.en:
Leniticus is a twenty-three-year-old married man with three children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been selling clothes for three years. He started with two millions as working capital and now has eight millions. His hardships are seasonal weather, inadequate capital to purchase stock, price fluctuation and inflation. His personal goals are educating his children and building a permanent house. His business goals are hiring employees to help expand his business and expanding his business into new markets.

Leniticus wants money to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Seham

texts.en:
Seham is a 35-year-old married woman from Irbid, Jordan.  She supports 2 members of her family.  She is a conservative person and unwilling to upload her photograph onto the Internet, so that the man in the photo is her husband.

Seham is looking to improve her family's living conditions, so she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase appliances for her house.
Seham is looking to make a full maintenance for her house.

loans.use: to purchase appliances for her house

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine is a thirty-six-year-old woman living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She has a personal goal of educating her children and building a permanent house. She has been running a retail shop for six years now after using her savings as start-up capital. She faces hardships of price fluctuations, inflation, and high fuel and transportation costs. Besides that, she has a vision of expanding her business to new markets and moving her business to new areas. 

Christine needs a loan to buy general merchandise such as sugar and soap to sell.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise such as sugar and soap to sell.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a 45-year-old married man with eight children living in Kasese, Uganda. For the past four years he has been running a general store. He began with 400,000 UGX and now has 2,000,000 UGX as working capital. Seasonal weather, not enough money to buy stock, price fluctuations and inflation are his challenges.

Joseph is applying for a 1,500,000 UGX loan from HOFOKAM to buy beer, soda, soap, biscuits and books to sell. His personal goals are to educate his children, build a house and buy a car. His business ambitions include diversifying into farming, moving his shop to a more permanent location and expanding his businesses into new markets.

loans.use: to buy stock for his shop.

loans.name: Nihad

texts.en: Nihad is a 49-year-old woman from Bani Kenanah, Irbid, Jordan who supports three members of her family. She is requesting a loan of 500 JD to pay for home improvements to make her house a better living space for her family. * Since Nihad is a conservative woman, she prefers not to display her photo on the internet, thus the photo above is of her husband.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements

loans.name: Koroneri

texts.en: Koroneri needs another loan to buy more agricultural produce such as beans and maize to sell. Over the eleven years that he has been in this business, he has been able to construct a house for residence and pay shool fees for his children. He is still facing hardships of price fluctuations, inflation and high fuel and transportation costs. Nonetheless,  he has a vision of expanding his business to new markets and diversifying his business to include cattle keeping.

loans.use: to buy agricultural  produce such as beans and maize to sell.

loans.name: Oliver

texts.en:
Oliver, a 28-year-old single mother living in Kasese, Uganda, has been a landlady for one year; the business is quite lucrative since it entails minimal operational costs. Her personal goal is educating her children, while her business goal is expanding into new markets.

Because she lacks the capital, Oliver is requesting this loan to buy raw materials for the construction of more rental houses.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for the construction of more rental houses.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is a thirty-six-year-old married woman living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She has a personal goal of educating her children to attain degrees as minimum qualifications. 

She has a restaurant as her business and is facing hardships of price fluctuation and inflation. However, she has a vision of diversifying her business to include farming and owning a hotel.

Joyce needs a loan to buy land for farming.

loans.use: to buy land for farming.

loans.name: Rosario Del Carmen

texts.es: Rosario del Carmen vive junto a su esposo quien trabaja como vigilante para un almacén, y así mismo junto a sus dos hijas. Rosario es una mujer muy trabajadora, quien siempre se ha esforzado por darle lo mejor a su familia. Ella posee una pequeña parcela en la cual se encarga de sembrar maíz y frijoles, los cuales posteriormente comercializa por mayor a diferentes clientes quienes vende estos productos en los diversos mercados del país, su negocio es bastante estable, en el cual desea invertir en lo más posible, ya que es gracias a este como ella logra sostener a su familia junto a su esposo. Rosario solicita un préstamo con el deseo de comprar todos los productos necesario para el cuidado de sus plantaciones, tales como abono, pesticidas, así mismo ella desea poder contar con la suma de dinero necesaria para pagar mano de obra que le ayuden a cultivar y a desgranar el maíz, así de esta forma ella espera poder mejorar su trabajo y poder brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Rosario del Carmen lives with her husband, who works as a guard at a warehouse, along with their two children.  She is a hardworking woman who has always made a great deal of effort to give her family a better life.  She has a small parcel of land in which she grows corn and beans, which she then sells wholesale to her customers, who in turn resell these products in various markets throughout the country.

Her business is fairly stable, and she wants to invest in it as much as possible, since this through working in this business she has been able to support her family, along with her husband.

She is seeking a loan so that she can buy all of the products necessary to care for her crops, such as compost and pesticides.  She also wants to be able to pay laborers to help her grow and shuck the corn.  In this manner she hopes to be able to improve her business and be able to offer a higher level of service to her customers.

loans.use: to buy pesticide and fertilizer for her crops.

loans.name: Sylvia

texts.en:
Sylvia is married and has been blessed with four children. She aims to have a progressive life and educate her two children.

To make her dreams come true she is requesting additional funds in the amount of PHP 20,000, allowing her to buy livestock feed, vitamins, and vaccine for her hog raising business. 

She knows that this loan is beneficial to her business and family. She hopes to obtain greater profits to be able to have a continuous source of income, which will serve for improvement in her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy livestock feed, vitamins, and vaccine for her hog raising business.

loans.name: Majdi

texts.en:
Majdi is a 28-year-old single young man.  He is employed and gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover his needs and ensure him better living conditions.
Majdi is requesting a 1,100 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing a new laptop. This will enhance his skills in using the computer and help him to complete the requested reports for his work, which will improve his work status and ensure to him a bright future.
Majdi is photographed while he is using his laptop.

loans.use: To purchase a new laptop computer

loans.name: Sajjad

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 49 years old, married, and has seven children.

Sajjad is a blacksmith; in 2000 he opened his own workshop making doors and windows. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. He has a good reputation and he is becoming well known in the surrounding areas.

He applied for a $2400 loan in order to pay the annual rent for his workshop. He is aiming to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent for his workshop

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth owns and operates a general store.  She is thankful because her previous loan helped her in increasing her income. She has run her general store for almost four years and is able to earn PHP3000 a month. This income is used to cover all their household expenses and savings.

Elizabeth would like to borrow additional working capital in the amount of PHP15,000. She will utilize this loan to buy more stock in order to obtain higher profits. She knows that she can satisfy her customers' demands and provide her family's basic necessities.

loans.use: to buy more stock for her general store

loans.name: Ibonde Tweyimukye Group

texts.en:
Job is a 53-year-old married man with six children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is a member of the Ibonde Tweyimukye Group in which each member guarantees repayment of the others in order to access a loan.

For the last twenty years Job has run a general store. Price fluctuations, inflation, inadequate money to buy stock for his shop and high fuel and transportation costs are his challenges in business.

Job is applying for a 4,400,000 UGX group loan from HOFOKAM. With his portion he will buy sugar and soap to sell. His personal goal is to educate his children and build a house. His ambition is to own a wholesale shop and diversify into farming.

loans.use: to buy sugar and soap to sell.

loans.name: Nofoz

texts.en:
Nofoz is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her elder son Alaa' appears in her Kiva profile photo, pictured in the family farm next to the seedlings.

Nofoz is a 46-year-old woman. She is married and a mother to three sons and three daughters. Her husband and all her family members are working in agriculture, which is the only source of income for the family, but also needs more support to cover the costs.

Nofoz is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing summer season seedlings. This will increase the crop and improve the family's income.

loans.use: To purchase seedlings

loans.name: Mansour

texts.en: Mansour is 39 years old, a married man, and lives in Ibb, Yemen. He has been running a grocery store for five years. He was a partner with his brothers selling groceries then he saved up money until he was able to buy his own shop. He would like to increase his income but he doesn`t have sufficient money so, he is requesting a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to buy grocery items like canned food, mineral water and soft drinks for his business. He would like to expand his business and run a wholesale shop in order to increase his capital.

loans.use: to buy grocery items like canned food, mineral water and soft drinks for his business.

loans.name: Ameen

texts.en: Ameen is 54, married, and is raising three children. He has been a butcher for the past 12 years. He lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He has a wealth of experience and runs his business well. He is successfully developing his business. He is asking for a loan of 150,000 YER from AMB for the purchase of livestock, with the goal of increasing his turnover capital. He hopes to open a chicken shop.

loans.use: to buy livestock for his business

loans.name: Jawahar

texts.en:
Jawahar is a 46-year-old woman from Bani Kenanah, Irbid, Jordan. There are three other members in her family. Since Jawahar is a conservative woman, she prefers that her picture is not posted on the internet. The above photo is of her husband.

Jawahar is applying for a 300 JOD loan from Tamweelcom to make home improvements and buy furniture so as to better her home for her family.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements and furniture.

loans.name: Salem

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 41 years old, married, and has five children.

Salem has owned a cattle farm since 2007. He gained sufficient experience in this field from his family. He has a good reputation and he is becoming well known in the surrounding areas.
 
He applied for a $2000 loan in order to purchase a dairy cow. He is aiming to grow his farm and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en:
Josefina is a hog raiser within her local community.  She is now 57 years of age, married, and has three children.  She has been doing this to add to her husband's income for their living.

She and her husband aim to have improved living conditions and to be able to send their youngest child through a higher level of education.  Josefina plans to purchase two additional piglets, hog feed and vaccines, but her capital is not sufficient. For this reason, she is requesting a loan of PHP20,000. 
This amount would really help in making her business more profitable.  In addition, she believes that through her patience and strong determination, she could be able to uplift their living status out of poverty and be able to gain higher profits to take care of their basic necessities.

loans.use: to buy two piglets, hog feed and vaccines for raising hogs

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en:
Cecelia lives in Buchanan, Liberia. She is forty years old and single with eight children. The oldest child is 26 while the youngest is ten years old. The younger children live with Cecelia at home and go to school. Her oldest child is working and living on their own.

Cecelia has been running a restaurant for the past ten years. She says she has to vary her menu to attract customers on a daily basis. She likes the business because she earns a good income every day.

Cecelia is applying for a 12,000 LRD loan from BRAC Liberia to buy more rice, oil, fish and other food items for her restaurant. With her loan she plans to furnish her shop and buy more rice and other goods. Her ambition is to build a house.

loans.use: to buy more rice, oil, fish and other food items for her restaurant.

loans.name: Wafiya

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. She is 35 years old, married, and has two children.

Wafiya is a seamstress and she has been in this field since 2004. She makes, repairs, and alters clothes such as suits, coats, and trousers for women and kids. She has a good understanding of local customers and knows about their needs. She has a good reputation and she is well known in the surrounding areas.

She is requesting a $2,000 loan to purchase two sewing machines and an air conditioner. She is aiming to increase her profits and provide a better living standard for her family.

loans.use: to purchase two sewing machines and an air conditioner

loans.name: José Roberto

texts.es: José Roberto de 52 años de edad, vive junto a su compañera de vida y una hija, él se dedica a trabajar la tierra, sembrando maíz y frijoles, los que posteriormente comercializa en diferentes lugares. José posee un terreno bastante grande, el cual no ha podido aprovechar al máximo debido a la falta de capital para invertir, por esta razón José solicita un préstamo a través  del cual cuente con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de semillas y de esta formar sembrar en todo el terreno, así de esta forma se asegurará obtener mayores ganancias, las cuales serán de mucho beneficio para su familia, ya que podrán contar con una vida estable, gracias a la venta de los granos básicos.
texts.en: José Roberto is 52 years old and lives together with his life partner and daughter.  He is a farmer who grows corn and beans which he later sells in different  places.  José owns quite a large plot of land which he hasn't been able to make the most of as he lacks the capital he needs to invest.  He is requesting a loan which will give him the money he needs to invest in buying a larger quantity of seeds so that he can sow all of his land with crops.  In this way he will make more profits which will be of great benefit to his family as they will be able to enjoy a stable life through their sale of basic grains.

loans.use: to buy seeds to sow on his land

loans.name: Adnan

texts.en:
Adnan is from Iraq. He is 41 years old, married, and has five children.

Adnan has been an owner of a bicycle repair shop since 2007. He repairs and sells all bicycle accessories. He has sufficient experience in this field and a good reputation and he is well known in the surrounding area.

He is requesting $3,000 in order to pay the annual rent and install shelves in his shop. He aims to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent and install shelves in his shop

loans.name: Leakhena

texts.en:
Leakhena is 28 years old and lives in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She is married and blessed with two children. Her husband is a mechanic who earns about 5 USD a day. She has farmed rice and fattened up animals to sell for more than ten years and earns approximately 3 USD a day.

In order to improve her husband’s business, Leakhena is applying for a loan of 700 USD from KREDIT to buy a plot of land to build a repair shop on for her husband. This money will help him establish his business and earn more income to support the family.

Leakhena’s ambition is to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. She also hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land to build a repair shop on for her husband.

loans.name: Ammar

texts.en:
Ammar is from Iraq. He is 31 years old, married, and has two children.

Ammar has owned a small restaurant since 2002. He specializes in kebabs. He has a lot of experience in this field since he used to work in his father’s restaurant. He also has a good reputation and his restaurant is well known in the local area.

He is requesting $2,400 in order to pay the annual rent for his shop. He aims to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent for the shop

loans.name: Sovan

texts.en:
Sovan is 43 years old. She is married and resides with her three children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $15 per day. One of her children is a construction worker. He earns about $4 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family's transportation, Sovan is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support her family. In the future, she would like to expand her husband’s business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Abbass

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 41 years old, married and has seven children.

Abbass has owned a food market since 2003, selling soft drinks, juices, groceries, cheese, frozen beef, chicken, fish, and dairy products. He has sufficient experience in this field, a good understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. He has a good reputation and he is well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a loan of $2400 in order to install new shelves for the shop. He is aiming to increase his profits and provide a better standard of living for his family.

loans.use: to install new shelves for the shop

loans.name: María Abisia

texts.es: María Abisia de 52 años de edad, es una madre de familia muy responsable y trabajadora, quien vive junto a su hija. Desde hace 30 años atrás que María se dedica al oficio de corte y confección, tiempo en el cual ha ido adquiriendo mucha experiencia como también clientes fijos. Ella es una persona muy responsable, quien trabaja con mucho esmero por dar lo mejor de sí, realizando gabachas, faldas blusas y mucho más. María solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda invertir en su negocio, comprando mayor cantidad de materia prima como: telas, botones, hilos, y agujas, de forma que siempre pueda elaborar su trabajo con toda la calidad que la identifica. Salir adelante con las ganancias de este negocio es fundamental para su sustento, ya que es la única fuente de ingresos con que cuenta para salir adelante.
texts.en: María Abisia is 52 years old.  She is a very responsible and hard-working mother who lives together with her daughter.  María has been working as a dressmaker for 30 years.  Over the years she has gained a lot of experience and also a lot of regular customers.  She is a very responsible person who works with great care and gives her very best.  She makes aprons, skirts, blouses and much more besides.  María is requesting a loan so that she can invest in her business, buying a larger quantity of raw materials such as fabric, buttons, threads and needles.  This will enable her to carry out her work with all the quality she is well known for.  Getting ahead in life through the profits she makes in this business is fundamental to her survival as this is the only source of income she has.

loans.use: to buy fabric, buttons, threads and needles

loans.name: Sai

texts.en:
Sai is 48 years old. He is married and resides with five children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. He is a deckhand who earns about $4 per day. His wife is employed in a massage shop. She earns about $5 per day. Four of his children are employed. They earn about $8 per day. 

In order to improve his family’s finances, Sai is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase a motorbike for his son to run a taxi service. This purchase will help his son to generate more income to support the family. In the future, he would like to purchase a tuk tuk for their taxi service and help his children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for his son to run a taxi service.

loans.name: Srey Naet

texts.en:
Srey Naet is 29 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She is employed in a hotel. She earns about $4 per day. Her husband is an electrician who earns about $5 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Srey Naet is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support her family. In the future, she would like to run an additional business to earn more income for her family and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it much stronger and more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Leark

texts.en:
Leark is a 41-year-old homemaker who lives in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She is married and blessed with five children. Her husband operates a taxi service and earns about 5 USD a day.

In order to improve her family’s finances, Leark is requesting a loan of 1300 USD from KREDIT to buy a tuk-tuk (an auto rickshaw) for her son so he can run a taxi service. This purchase will help her son generate more income to support the family.

Leark’s ambition is to develop an additional means of income so as to generate extra money for the family and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. She also would like to rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable and convenient for her family.

loans.use: to buy a tuk-tuk for her son so he can run a taxi service.

loans.name: Sokuntheary

texts.en:
Sokuntheary is 30 years old. She is married and blessed with three children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband runs a taxi service (with a tuk tuk taxi). He earns about $15 per day. Her children are still in her care. 

Because of the present tuk tuk’s trailer is old, Sokuntheary is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase a new trailer for her husband to run the business. This purchase will help her husband attract more customers and earn more income for the family. In the future, she would like to run a grocery store at home to generate additional income for her family and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a new trailer for her husband's tuk tuk taxi service.

loans.name: Mariana De Jesus

texts.es: Mariana de cincuenta años de edad  vive junto a su hijo, ella posee una tortillería que está ubicada en el lugar de su residencia tiene varios años con el negocio y es muy conocida en el lugar pues tiene  la gran ventaja que no hay mucha competencia en la zona, además sus tortillas son las más calientitas y ricas su clientela la prefiere porque lo que vende es elaborado con material de primera calidad, a precios accesibles pero sobre todo con el servicio más rápido;  Mariana es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan alcanzar el éxito, cada día se levanta desde muy temprano para iniciar su labor sabe que con todo su esfuerzo su negocio logrará crecer, ha tenido mucha demanda y no quiere decepcionar a sus clientes así que aumentara la producción y necesita de capital para invertir en insumo por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor. Mariana es muy responsable y con una clara capacidad de pago, asegura que podrá saldar el financiamiento y a la vez ofrece a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Mariana is 50 years old and lives together with her son.  She has a tortilla bakery located in her home.  She has been in the business for a number of years and is very well known because there isn't much competition in her area.  In addition, her tortillas are the warmest and most delicious.  Her customers are loyal to her business because she makes her tortillas with top-quality ingredients, sells them at affordable prices and offers the quickest service.  Mariana is an entrepreneurial woman who has a great desire to do well in life.  She is always looking for new opportunities that will allow her to achieve success.  She gets up very early every day to start her work.  She knows that, as a result of all her hard work, her business will manage to grow.  She has experienced a lot of demand and doesn't want to let her customers down.  For this reason, she needs to increase her production and needs capital to invest in buying supplies.  She is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy corn wholesale.  María is very responsible and definitely has the ability to repay her loan.  She assures us that she will be able to repay her loan and, at the same time, offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale

loans.name: Jesus

texts.en:
Jesus is a farmer living at Lanna with his wife and children. He has been raising crops, primarily planting and harvesting rice to sell. He usually sells his crops to traders in his village and earns about PHP 20,000 twice a year (during harvest season). His income is just enough to sustain his family's needs for meals and allowances. 

Jesus hopes to increase his income. To achieve this, he needs to improve his crop production to earn higher profits upon harvest. As a result, he is asking for a loan of PHP 38,000 to buy fertilizers, insecticides, and pesticides for use in farming. These inputs will help maintain his farming business. He hopes to achieve a plentiful harvest and keep earning funds to pay for his children's education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides, and pesticides for use in farming

loans.name: Wilmer  Alberto

texts.es: Wilmer  Alberto de treinta y dos años de edad vive con su madre y sus hermanos; él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en este rubro y ha ganado experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener cosechas de calidad, su terreno de siembra es propio y se ubica cerca de la zona donde reside, es muy conocido en el lugar porque ha vivido y trabajado en ese lugar desde pequeño, comercia en todos los alrededores y tiene clientela fija que lo prefieren porque saben que lo que vende es de calidad a buen precio y sobre todo con un servicio excelente, se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad; Wilmer es un hombre confiable, trabajador, honrado pero en especial humilde, siempre está en la búsqueda de oportunidades que le permitan ser en un futuro exitoso, le gusta mantenerse delante de la competencia por eso en este periodo de siembra quiere aumentar la producción y necesita de un apoyo de capital para invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, insecticida etc. Wilmer es muy  responsable y con buenas referencias de pago tiene la certeza que cancelara la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia la calidad de vida que se merecen.
texts.en:
Wilmer Alberto is 32 years old and lives with his mother and siblings.  He is a farmer who mainly grows corn and beans.  He has been in this line of work for a number of years and has gained very valuable experience which enables him to obtain good-quality harvests.  He owns his own farmland which is located near his home.  He is very well known in his town because he has lived and worked here since he was young.  He makes his sales in the surrounding areas and has regular customers who prefer to buy from him because they know that the produce he sells is good-quality, affordable and comes with excellent service.  Wilmer is known for his friendliness.

Wilmer is a trustworthy, hard-working, honest and, above all, humble man.  He is always looking for opportunities that will allow him to enjoy a successful future.  He enjoys keeping ahead of the competition and, for this reason, he would like to increase his production during this sowing season.  In order to do this, he needs financial support as he would like to invest in buying supplies.  He is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, etc.  Wilmer is very responsible and has good credit references.  He is certain that he will be able to repay his loan and, at the same time, offer his family the quality of life that they deserve.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer and insecticide

loans.name: Sopheap

texts.en:
Sopheap is a forty-year-old homemaker who is married and lives with her husband and four children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about 5 USD a day. Two of her children are employed and earn about 15 USD a day.

In order to improve her family’s finances, Sopheap is applying for a loan of 1400 USD from KREDIT. She will buy a plot of land with it to build rooms to rent and so increase her family’s income.

In the future Sopheap would like to run a grocery store and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. She would also like to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to build rooms to rent.

loans.name: Vanessa Arely

texts.es: Vanessa Arely de 22  años de edad, es una persona soltera, la cual trabaja desde su propia casa de habitación, vive junto a sus padres quienes son bastante mayores. Vanessa  posee su propia tienda en la cual comercializa productos varios como golosinas, pan, papel higiénico, pastillas y algunos tipos de detergentes, a pesar que ya cuenta con 3 años de experiencia, debido a que la mayoría de ganancias son destinas al sostenimiento del hogar, ella invierte muy poco al negocio, por lo que necesita una ayuda para mejorarlo. Es por esta razón que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para comprar mayor cantidad de productos como huevos, jugos, leches, pan, más golosinas en diferentes marcas, de manera que sus clientes tengan mayor variedad para escoger y así comprar más. Vanessa es una persona muy dedicada a lo que hace, es por ello que su mayor deseo es poder crecer en su negocio y así mismo brindar un mejor servicio en el cual sus clientes se sientan cómodos al comprar en su tienda y de esta manera ella pueda mejorar sus ganancias.
