La venta de granos básicos es un negocio muy importante para Germán y su familia ya que todos dependen de este, razón por la que  solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar todos los insumos necesarios como: palas, arados, tanques para rociar pesticidas y otros, los cuales son fundamentales para obtener buenas cosechas, con lo que él espera mejorar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Germán, 42, lives in his own house with his wife and six children; all depend on him.  They are very well-known for being very hardworking and responsible since even the older children share the work.

Germán sells basic grains that he plants and harvests himself.  The sale of basic grains is a very important business for Germán and his family since they all depend on it which is why he’s asking for a loan to buy all the necessary supplies like shovels, plows and tanks used to sprinkle pesticides and others which are fundamental in order to obtain good harvests that he hopes he’ll be able to improve his sales with.

loans.use: to buy pesticide and manure.

loans.name: María Irma

texts.es: María Irma de 55 años de edad vive junto a sus  hijos, quienes  le ayudan en el trabajo familiar. María se dedica a la agricultura de maíz y frijoles, con lo que logra darles todo lo necesario a sus hijos, quienes son muy responsables y colaboradores en el hogar. María es madre soltera y siempre se ha esforzado mucho por salir adelante y contar con todo lo necesario para tener una vida estable, razón por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para la compra de pesticidas, abono, semillas de maíz y frijoles y todo lo necesario para realizar una excelente cosecha  y posteriormente comercializar. Esto llena de mucha ilusión a María ya que con mucho esfuerzo podrá tener una vida mejor.
texts.en:
María Irma, 55, lives with her children who help her with the family work.  María is a corn and bean farmer.  With this she’s able to give everything necessary to her children who are very responsible and cooperative at home.

María is a single mother and has always striven very much to get ahead and to have everything necessary to have a stable life which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to have the money needed to buy pesticide, manure, corn and bean seeds and everything needed to obtain an excellent harvest to subsequently sell.  This fills María with much hope because with much effort she’ll be able to have a better life.

loans.use: to buy manure for her crops.

loans.name: Sotero

texts.es: Sotero es un padre de familia muy responsable y trabajador, él vive junto a su esposa y dos hijos menores de edad. Sotero se dedica de lleno al oficio de  la agricultura, sembrando  maíz y frijoles, granos básicos los cuales poseen una gran demanda ya que son parte de la dieta principal de este país, así mismo es la única fuente de ingresos que posee, por lo que él desea contar con mayor cantidad de granos básicos y de esta forma percibir mayores ganancias. Por esta razón Sotero solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar más semillas para sembrar,  así mismo para comprar pesticidas para el cuidado de estas. El mayor deseo de Sotero  es aumentar sus ventas y de esta forma contar con una mejor vida junto a su familia donde puedan contar con todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Sotero is a very responsible and hardworking father of a family.  He lives with his wife and two children, both minors.  Sotero fully dedicates himself to agriculture, planting corn and beans, basic grains which are in high demand and are already part of the principal diet of this country.  Also, it is the only source of income that he has so he wants to have a greater quantity of basic grains and in this way earn higher profits. 

For this reason Sotero is applying for a loan by means of which he can buy more seeds to plant and also buy pesticides to care for them.  Sotero’s greatest desire is to increase his sales and in this way have a better life together with his family where they can have everything they need.

loans.use: to buy materials to plant corn.

loans.name: José Salvador

texts.es: José Salvador, vive junto a su esposa quien se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, y junto a su hijo. José se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijoles, negocio en el  cual trabaja desde hace más de 10 años. Para mantener su cosecha libre de plagas José debe tener todos los cuidados necesarios desde el momento de la siembra hasta la hora de cosecharla, por lo que solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar más semillas para sembrar, de manera que pueda producir mayor cantidad de granos básicos, así mismo para comprar pesticidas, los cuales le garanticen la calidad de sus productos, con lo que sus clientes estén satisfechos de tal manera aumentar sus ventas.
texts.en:
José Salvador lives with his wife who does household chores and with their son.  José works growing corn and beans, a business he’s had for more than ten years.  

In order to keep his crops free of infestations he must exert every care necessary from the moment of planting until the hour of harvesting which is why he’s asking for a loan through which he will be able to buy more seeds to plant in order to produce a larger amount of basic grains.  He will also buy pesticides that will guarantee the quality of his products that will keep his customers satisfied thus increasing his sales.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Héctor Antonio

texts.es: Héctor Antonio  se dedica al oficio de la agricultura sembrando frijoles y maíz, así mismo comercializa ganado vacuno con lo que obtiene otras ganancias extras y también trabaja como motorista, transportando personas a diferentes lugares del pueblo como: mercados, iglesias, escuelas y otros lugares más, él tiene 31 años de edad y se destaca por ser muy trabajador y responsable con su familia, la cual está conformada por su esposa, dos hijos y sus padres quienes le ayudan con el negocio de la agricultura y ganadería. Héctor solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de semillas, lo que le permita sembrar el doble de lo que ha hecho siembre y así poder aprovechar al máximo su parcela, así mismo desea comprar una vaca más para incrementar  su ganado el cual es de mucha ayuda para el sostenimiento de su hogar, ya que de este obtienen leche para comercializar y para el consumo personal. Héctor desea aumentar sus ventas lo cual podrá lograr por medio de dicho préstamo.
texts.en:
Héctor Antonio is in the agricultural business of growing beans and corn, and also selling cattle with which he earns extra income. He also works as a driver, transporting people to different places of the city such as markets, churches, schools, and other places. He is 31 years old and is known to be hardworking and a responsible family man. His family is made of of his wife, 2 children and his parents who help him in agriculture and cattle raising.

Héctor is asking for a loan from Integral so that he can buy more seeds which will permit him to grow twice what he has planted and thus be able to take advantage to the maximum his plot of land, and he wants to buy another cow in order to increase his livestock which is a great help in the support of his home, as it provides milk to sell and for personal consumption. Héctor wants to increase sales which can be achieved through this loan.

loans.use: to buy beans for planting and selling

loans.name: Gladys Haydee

texts.es: Gladys Haydee  de treinta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado, ya tiene varios años de trabajar en este negocio, adicional a esto tienen una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, pan entre otros, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todas las personas la prefieren porque todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además de un servicio inigualable; Gladis es una mujer decidida siempre está en toda la disposición de alcanzar un futuro más próspero, últimamente ha aumentado la demanda en su negocio, por eso se decidió invertir en insumos para aumentar el negocio, necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ganado, granos básicos, pan, golosinas, etc. Gladys es una mujer dedicada al trabajo siempre, está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan cancelar la deuda a tiempo, y a la vez ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: 33-year-old Gladys Haydee lives with her life partner and her children. She buys and sells cattle, and she has already been in this line of work for many years. In addition, they own a store where they sell essential goods such as basic grains, milk, eggs, bread, etc. She has gotten a lot of customers because everyone prefers to go to her, since everything she sells is high quality at affordable prices, and the service is unmatched. Gladys is a determined woman who's always fully willing to reach a more prosperous future. Lately her business has seen a rise in demand, which is why she decided to invest in supplies in order to increase her sales. She needs working capital, so she requests a loan from INTEGRAL which allows her to purchase cattle, basic grains, bread, candy, etc. Gladys is a woman who's always dedicated to her work, and she's expecting to get new opportunities that allow her to repay the debt timely and also improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase cattle, basic grains, bread and candy.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesús

texts.es: Teresa de Jesús de 41 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos menores de edad. Desde hace mucho  años que Teresa  posee una venta de tortillas, en la cual se encarga de elaborarlas y venderlas. Este  negocio  ha  nacido con el deseo de poder mejorar la economía familiar, ya que en muchas ocasiones no contaba con el dinero necesario para solventar todos los gastos del hogar. Es por esta razón que Teresa desea poder seguir creciendo  con el negocio que le ha brindado estabilidad económica a su familia. Ella solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar maíz por mayor, de manera que pueda obtenerlo a precios más accesible, así mismo comprar cilindros de gas propano con el fin de contar con una reserva de este último, ya que en muchas ocasiones escasea y de esta manera no se verá afectada como en otros años. Esto será de mucho ayuda para ella, ya que podrá mejorar las condiciones de su negocio y así contar con más clientela.
texts.en: Teresa de Jesús is 41 years old. She lives with her husband and 2 young children. For many years Teresa has been selling tortillas, and she is in charge of making and selling them. This business was born from the desire of being able to improve her family finances as on many occasions she did not have the necessary funds to cover the household expenses. This is why Teresa wants to be able to continue growing the business that has provided financial stability for her family. She is asking for a loan to be able to buy corn at wholesale, in order to get it at a more affordable price, and also to buy propane gas cylinders to be a reserve of the latter, as it is often scarce, and in this way not to be affected as she was in other years. This will be a big help to her because it can improve her business conditions and thus she will have more customers.

loans.use: to buy corn in order to make her tortillas

loans.name: Shazia's Group

texts.en:
Shazia is requesting a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her father’s fruit-selling business. With the loan investment he will buy fresh seasonal fruits to sell to his clients. He is very professional in his dealings and offers good quality produce. Shazia is hopeful that the loan will help him to further improve his business and increase his profits.

Shazia is a very good housewife and working lady who sews clothes for her neighboring clients to financially support her husband. She has a seven-year-old daughter who has not yet started her education.

Note: In the photo, she is sitting in front of her sewing machine.

loans.use: To buy fruits for fruit selling business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for his bean crop.

loans.name: Manuel Vicente

texts.es: Manuel Vicente vive junto a su compañera de vida, sus hijos y sus nietos; él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz, tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, se siente orgulloso porque su labor le ha dado buenos resultados, el terreno de cultivo es muy favorable y está en una zona con alta incidencia agrícola, comercia en todos los alrededores y ya tiene mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable; Manuel es muy entregado a su labor siempre está a la disposición de nuevas oportunidades que le permiten alcanzar el éxito; debido a las lluvias del año pasado tuvo grandes pérdidas por eso en esta temporada de siembra quiere aumentar la producción y necesita de capital para la inversión por eso le solicita a  INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, abono, insecticida, herramienta etc. Manuel Vicente tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Manuel Vicente lives with his life partner, his children, and his grandchildren.  He is a farmer, and he grows corn.  He has worked in this trade for many years, and he has a lot of experience, which allows him to get the best income.

He feels proud because his work has given him good results.  The land is favorable for farming, and there is a lot of agriculture in the area.  He sells in all of the outlying areas, and he has a lot of clientele.  They know that everything he sells is of the best quality at affordable prices with unparalleled service.

Manuel is very devoted to his work.  He is always ready for new opportunities that will allow him to be successful.  Due to the rains last year, he had big losses.  That is why he wants to increase his production during this planting season.

He needs the capital to invest, and that is why he is requesting a loan from Integral.  A loan would allow him to buy corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools, etc.  Manuel Vicente has good payment history.  He is sure that he will be able to repay the debt and provide his family with a full life.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools, etc.

loans.name: Eman

texts.en:
Eman is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in her Kiva profile photo.
Eman is a 40-year-old woman and the mother to four sons and four daughters.  Her husband is employed, but his salary is not enough to cover the family's needs.

For the past five years, Eman has operated a public services office, offering printing, copying and translating services to clients.  It has been a profitable project, but it needs more support to cover the costs.

Eman is requesting a 1,000 USD loan from FATEN to help cover the costs of purchasing a new printer and copier machine to improve the project's offerings. This will increase the quantity and the quality of her work and improve the family's income.

loans.use: To purchase new printer and copier machine to her project

loans.name: Concepción Del Carmen

texts.es: Concepción Del Carmen se dedica a la siembra de frijol y maíz desde hace más de 15 años, negocio gracias al cual ha podido salir adelante junto a su familia. Concepción posee  una pequeña parcela la cual desea aprovecharla al máximo lo que ha sido muy difícil hasta el momento ya que no cuenta con los ingresos necesarios  para hacerlo.  Concepción es muy responsable y dedicada a su hogar, vive junto a su esposo  y dos hijos quienes le ayudan a sembrar y a desgranar el elote para obtener los granos de maíz que posteriormente comercializan. Concepción  solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar todos los insumos necesarios para la siembra como semilla, palas, arados y más, con lo que ella espera obtener mayor cantidad de cosecha. Concepción desea mucho salir adelante y mejorar su estabilidad económica por lo que trabaja muy duro para obtenerlo.
texts.en: Concepción Del Carmen has been growing beans and corn for over 15 years, and thanks to this business she has been able to get herself and her family ahead. Concepción owns a small plot of land and she wishes to make the most of it, which has been very difficult so far, since she doesn't dispose of the earnings she needs to do that. Concepción is very responsible and dedicated to her household. She lives with her husband and two children who help her to sow and to separate the kernels from the corncobs, so they can obtain the corn grains that they later sell. Concepción requests a loan in order to purchase the supplies she needs for sowing, such as seeds, shovels, plows, etc., and with this she hopes to get a larger harvest. Concepción very much wishes to get ahead and improve her financial stability, and she works very hard to achieve that.

loans.use: to purchase plows and shovels in order to sow basic grains.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es: Carlos Alberto vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos; él se dedica al cultivo  de granos básicos, como el maíz, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener siempre las cosechas de mejor  calidad, él es muy trabajador y ama lo que hace, el terreno de siembra está ubicado cerca de su residencia, comercia en todos los alrededores de la zona y ya tiene mucha clientela porque las personas saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable siempre está a la orden de la gente que lo visita, adicional a lo anterior Carlos posee un empleo de soldador en un ingenio esto le ayuda a complementar los gastos del hogar ; es un hombre visionario con varios objetivos a futuro, quiere aprovechar todas las oportunidades que se le presenten para esforzarse y alcanzar el éxito, en esta temporada de siembra quiere aumentar la producción y necesita de capital para invertir en insumos por eso se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante, insecticida, herramienta, etc. Carlos Alberto tiene buenas referencias de pago y una buena moral asegura que podrá pagar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carlos Alberto lives with his life partner and his children. He cultivates basic grains such as corn. He has been working several years in agriculture and has gained valuable experience that permits him to always obtain crops of better quality. He is very hardworking and he loves what he does. 

The planting area is located near his home. He sells to all the surrounding areas and he has many customers because people know that all that he sells is of top quality and at affordable prices and also the service is always unique to the requests of the people who visit. 

In addition to the above, Carlos has a job as a welder, a talent that helps him supplement the household expenses. He is a visionary man with several future goals. He wants to take advantage of all the opportunities accorded him in order to try and succeed in this planting season and he wants to increase his production and needs capital in order to invest in supplies and this is why he decided to ask for a loan through Integral which will permit him to buy corn seed, fertilizer, insecticide, tools, etc. Carlos Alberto has a good payment history and is trustworthy assuring that he will pay the debt and at the same time give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn seed, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools

loans.name: Izdihar

texts.en:
Izdihar is a 24 year old woman from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan whose family owns a small food store.  She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to buy extra goods for the store to help further develop the store.  Since she is under 30 years old, her loan is considered to be a youth loan. 

* As Izdihar is a conservative woman, she prefers not to have her photo on the internet.  The above photo is of her husband in their store.

loans.use: to pay for food goods to sell at her shop.

loans.name: Samar

texts.en:
Samar is a 40-year-old woman; she is married and the mother of two sons and four daughters.  Her husband is a worker who is paid a low salary. He also raises and sells sheep and sheep products.  That business has been a profitable project, but he and Samar need more support to cover the family's needs.

Samar has her own project.  She purchases clothes to resell.  That has also been a profitable project, but from time to time she needs support to cover her project's costs.

Samar is requesting a 1,500 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing a new collection of summer clothes to satisfy her customers and compete with other sellers. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

loans.use: To purchase a new collection of summer clothes to resell

loans.name: Salaha

texts.en: Salaha is a woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan, who supports one other family member. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to help make home improvements, buying new furniture, and thus upgrade her home for her family.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements

loans.name: Nidal

texts.en:
Nidal is a 23-year-old single young man. He is a construction worker who enjoys a good reputation among people. He gets a salary, but not enough to cover his needs and to complete finishing his house.
Nidal is requesting a 1,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of completing his house from painting and installing tiles to improving the house's condition. This will ensure a suitable home for Nidal to live in with his family in the coming future.
Nidal is photographed in his house.

loans.use: To complete finishing his house from painting and installing tiles to improving the house's condition

loans.name: Ruth M.

texts.en: Ruth lives in Sanniquelle along with her husband and two children aged 9 and 14, who are in school. Ruth is aged 38 and a high school graduate. For the past five years she and her husband have been managing their business to improve their living condition. Ruth says she enjoys the movement of her customers (the in and out, the buying, and goods on credit). Her customers always purchase huge quantity of goods since she sells quality products, and sometimes gives them goods on credit. One of the problems she faces is the number of her commodities. She is requesting a loan to purchase more for her business inventory (bowls, glasses, clothes, spoons, cups, etc.). Her dream is to establish another site to help her customers with quality supplies, and to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more for her business inventory (bowls, glasses, clothes, spoons, cups, etc.)

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a 42-year-old married woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan, who supports 6 family members. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to make home improvements and buy new furniture. This will help her update her home for her large family. 

Amal is a conservative woman who prefers not to post her photo on the Internet. The above photo is of her husband.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements and furniture

loans.name: Aysha

texts.en:
Aysha is a 44-year-old wife caring for two sons and two daughters. Her husband works in the governmental sector.
Aysha has applied for this loan to support her small food store with more goods, in order to turn it into a mini market. This will bring her more revenue to help in paying the household bills.

loans.use: to support her small food store with more goods

loans.name: Hanadi

texts.en:
Hanadi, a 36-year-old conservative woman, has asked her husband to take her place in the photo.
Hanadi is a housewife caring for four children. She has recently started a small business at home selling clothes to help her husband in providing their kids with a better life. Now she has applied for this loan in order to bring in more clothes to sell.

loans.use: to bring in more clothes to sell

loans.name: Faryal

texts.en: Faryal is a 42-year-old woman from Al Karak, Jordan who supports 6 members of her family. She is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to buy clothes which she will then sell so that she can expand her business. Her future plans are to open her own shop to sell them from.

loans.use: to pay for clothes that she will sell

loans.name: Lerma

texts.en:
Lerma is a hog raiser in the village where she lives. She is 42 years old, married, with three children. She has been raising hogs to fatten and sell to butchers when the hogs achieve the desired weight. She wants to make sure her hogs become healthier so she can offer them at good price upon disposal, but she needs additional capital of PHP 10,000 to buy feed, medicines, and vitamins to sustain them. This will help maintain good income from her small business. 

She hopes to make her business profitable enough that she can save funds for her children's education. She is aiming for a stable living condition for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, medicines and vitamins  for hog sustenance

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana vive junto a su compañero de vida, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas desde hace quince años, tiene mucho tiempo de trabajar en este negocio y le ha dado muy buena experiencia, se siente orgullosa de que ha dado muy buenos resultados, la tortillería está ubicada en su vivienda y es muy conocida en el lugar pues vende las tortillas más ricas y calientitas, cuenta con mucha clientela y la prefieren porque lo que vende es de calidad, a precio accesible pero sobre todo con el servicio más rápido, adicional a esto también posee una crianza de ganado que le ayuda a completar los gastos del hogar; Juana es muy dedicada a su labor siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan aprovecharlas para obtener un futuro más próspero, desde hace algún tiempo aumento la demanda, por lo que Juana desea aumentar la producción, necesita  de capital para invertir en insumos por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, leña, etc. Juana tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que puede cancelar el financiamiento a tiempo y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Juana lives with her life partner.  She makes a living selling tortillas, which she has done for fifteen years.  She has spent much time working in this business and it has given her very good experience.  Juana is proud that her business has been successful.  Her tortilla shop is located in her home and is well known in the area, since the tortillas she sells are the freshest and most delicious.  Juana has many customers who like to buy her tortillas because of their quality and affordable price, and because her service is the fastest.  She also raises cattle, which helps her cover the household expenses.  Juana is very dedicated to her work, and is always on the lookout for new opportunities that could help her achieve greater prosperity in the future.  The demand for Juana’s tortillas has recently increased, and so she wants to increase her production.  She needs capital to purchase supplies for making tortillas, and that is why she is asking for a loan from Apoyo Integral.  The loan will allow her to buy corn in bulk, firewood, and other supplies.  Juana has good payment references and is very responsible.  She is confident that she can pay off her loan on time while providing her family with a full life.

loans.use: to purchase corn in bulk and firewood for making tortillas.

loans.name: Mary Rose

texts.en:
Mary Rose is 27 years old and married, with three children. Her husband is a farmer while Mary Rose is a vendor selling fruits and vegetables to the people in her village.  She earns about PHP 3,000 each month. Her income goes for daily meals and allowances. She would like to increase her sales so she is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy tomatoes, bananas, eggplant, and string beans to sell. This will help increase her sales and her income too. 

She hopes to make her business more profitable to pay for her children's education. This way, the family will achieve a better life someday.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, bananas, eggplant, and string beans to sell

loans.name: Nemecia Antonia

texts.es: Nemecia Antonia de cincuenta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos desde hace dieciocho años en  casa propia, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad frijoles, pan, huevos, bebidas, jabones entre otros, además posee una venta de tortillas y pupusas que le ayudan a completar los gastos del hogar; es muy conocida en la zona y ya tiene mucha clientela y tiene ventaja porque no hay mucha competencia en los alrededores,  la gente la prefiere porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad y a excelentes precios, además el servicio es muy bueno; Nemecia es una mujer muy trabajadora siempre dispuesta a cumplir todas las oportunidades que se le presentan para así  alcanzar el éxito, uno de sus más grandes sueños  es acrecentar el negocio, necesita de capital que le permita comprar granos básicos, ´productos instantáneo, pan, golosinas, queso, verduras etc. Nemecia Antonia tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable sabe que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Nemecia Antonia, fifty-nine, has lived with her lifetime companion and their children in their own house for eighteen years.  She owns a store where she sells basic items such as beans, bread, eggs, drinks, soaps, etc, and she also sells tortillas and pupusas (grilled tortillas stuffed with cheese, beans, or pork skins and served with sliced cabbage) and these help her cover her household expenses.  She is well-known in the area and she has many customers.  She has the advantage of not having much competition around.  People prefer her store because she always has quality products and excellent prices. She also gives good service.  
Nemecia is a very hard-working woman always ready to take on any opportunity that presents itself to be successful.  One of her biggest dreams is to increase her business.  She needs capital that will allow her to buy basic grains, quick-cooking products, bread, cookies, cheese, vegetables, etc.  
Nemecia Antonia has a good credit history and she is very responsible.  She knows that she can cover the debt and at the same time give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, quick-cooking products, bread, cookies, cheese, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Emadedden

texts.en:
Emadedden is a 44-year-old man, married, with no children yet.  He is employed but paid a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's needs.

For the past ten years, Emadedden has operated a dry cleaning project.  It has been a profitable project, but needs more support to cover the costs.

Emadedden is requesting a 1,500 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing a new iron and new table and special cleaning materials for clothes. This will improve the quality of his work and satisfy his customers and improve his income.

Emadedden is photographed in the dry cleaning business that he owns.

loans.use: To purchase a new iron, new table, and special cleaning materials for clothes

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en:
Naomi lives in Buchanan with her husband and three children. She stopped her education in grade six. Her children are between the ages of 7 months and 3 years old. Only of them is in school. 

Naomi has been selling underclothes for both men and women, children's socks, copybooks, pens and handkerchiefs for the past eight years. She has little income to buy more goods if she expands her business even more. She uses the profit to buy goods for the business and support her children. She likes this business because she is able to earn her own income and assist her husband in the home. She is requesting a loan to purchase more underclothes for both men and women, socks, copybooks, pens, and handkerchiefs for her business. Her plan for the future is to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more underclothes for both men and women, socks, copybooks, pens, and handkerchiefs for her business

loans.name: Wafaa

texts.en:
Wafaa, 38 years old, is a housewife married to a mechanic. They have two boys.

Wafaa bought a sewing machine a year ago and started a small tailoring business at home. Now she wants to expand the business and make more clothes so she has applied for this loan in order to buy more fabric and thread. In the future she wants to have her own tailoring workshop.

loans.use: to buy more fabric and thread.

loans.name: Fatmeh

texts.en:
Getting the previous loan has helped Fatmeh in increasing her productivity. She used to do the embroidery on black dresses, but now Fatmeh has added colorful pieces to what she makes, which has helped her attract more customers.
 
Now she has applied for another loan to buy more raw materials and add decorating accessories to the dresses such as adding beads.

loans.use: to buy more embroidery materials.

loans.name: Sonnie

texts.en:
Sonnie lives in Buchanan. She is 37 years old and married with five children. Her husband is a businessman, and her children are between the ages of 5 and 19  years old. Four of the children are in school.

Sonnie has been running a cook shop (restaurant) for the past 10 years now. She sells six days a week in order to have the attention of her customers and prepares different dishes every day. She is requesting a loan to purchase rice, fish, oil and other ingredients for the business. Her future plan is to expand her business and live a better life.

loans.use: to purchase rice, fish, oil and other ingredients for her business

loans.name: Julia Balbina

texts.es:
La Señora. Julia es socia del banco comunal Los Talvos, vive por una comunidad que  pertenece a la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, este sector se encuentra rodeado de montañas las cuales le dan un paisaje pintoresco, nos ofrece varios lugares para salir de la rutina de la ciudad, su tierra es fértil por lo que su gente se dedica a la agricultura, cría de animales y comercio, aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña Julia tiene 63 años, es divorciada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos quienes son todos mayores de edad, están casados y viven independientes. La casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

La Señora. Julia se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y para tener solvencia económica cría y vende animales como: pollos y cerdos.

Es socia del banco comunal hace 10 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos, cerdos alimento para los mismos.
 
Su meta es volver a tener su tienda la cual tuvo que cerrar por falta de tiempo para atenderla.
texts.en:
Julia is a member of "Los Talvos" communal bank. She lives in a community located in the parish of Valle, in Cuenca. This area is surrounded by mountains which give it a picturesque landscape. It also offers a variety of places where people can escape the routine of the city. Its lands are fertile, and for this reason its people work in farming, animal raising and trade. They still maintain the culture and traditions of their peoples. 

Julia is 63 years old. She is divorced, and from her marriage she has 3 children who are all adults, married and living independently. She owns the house where she lives. 

Julia dedicates herself to her household tasks, and to cover her economic needs, she raises and sells animals such as chickens and pigs. 

She has been a member of the communal bank for 10 years, and she will invest her new loan in buying chickens and pigs, as well as feed for these animals. 
 
Her goal is to have a store again; she previously had one but had to close it because she didn't have time to run it.

loans.use: to buy chickens, pigs and feed for these animals.

loans.name: Khosiyat

texts.ru:
Хосият – 20 лет, не замужем. Занимается продажей продуктов питания в торговом центре города Вахдат. Она арендует место торговли. Опыт в этой сфере деятельности более 2 лет. 
Этот кредит второй по счету. Она ни разу не нарушала условия кредитования, а также показала себя с хороший стороны. В течении кредитования она расширила свой бизнес. Хосият живет вместе с родителями и помогает им зарабатывая самостоятельно. На полученный кредит хочет увеличить ассортимент продуктов. Хосият выражает свою благодарность за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Khosiyat is 20 years old, and single. She sells groceries at the commercial center in the city of Bakhdat. She rents a retail stall. She has more than two years' experience in this type of work. This is her second loan. Not once has she violated the conditions of credit, and she also proved herself worthy. While she was receiving a loan, she expanded her business. Khosiyat lives together with her parents and helps them while she is earning money independently. She wants to use the loan to expand her range of groceries. Khosiyat expresses her thanks for your financial support.

loans.use: to expand her range of groceries

loans.name: Doaa

texts.en:
Doaa is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Mohammad appears in her Kiva profile photo.

Doaa is a 23-year-old young woman. She is married to Mohammad with no children yet. She is a tailor and has many loyal customers, and her husband Mohammad is a construction worker.

Doaa wants to finish buying furniture items for her house, so she is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing new home furniture, such as living room and dining room furniture. This will offer Doaa and her husband suitable home furniture and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase new home furniture.

loans.name: Fida

texts.en:
Fida, who appears in the picture with her younger son, is married and a mother to three sons and one daughter. Her husband is a worker who gets a low salary that is not enough to cover the family's needs.

Fida is a tailor and has a good reputation among her loyal customers. She wants to live with her family in suitable home conditions, so she is requesting a 3,000 USD loan from FATEN to help cover the costs to complete finishing the house by installing windows and doors, painting and installing tiles.  This will offer Fida and her family a suitable house and comfortable living conditions.

loans.use: To complete finishing the house.

loans.name: Fazah

texts.en: Fazah is a 55-year-old married woman from Bani Kenanah, Irbid, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 400 JD to make improvements on her home, including buying new furniture and painting the house. In the future she would like to build an additional room on the house.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements.

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en:
Cecelia, 50, lives in the Buchanan area. She is a widow and has a 32-year-old child who is a high school drop out and married. For the past 25 years Cecelia has been selling earrings, underwear for both women and men, and rubber bowls, She started this with the help of her son in-law who gave her the initial capital to start selling. She make lots of profit every day and uses the profit to buy more goods and to improve her life.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more underwear for both men and women, along with earrings and rubber bowls for her business. Her future plan is to build a house and live a better life.

loans.use: to purchase more underwear for both men and women, along with earrings and rubber bowls for her business.

loans.name: Alaa

texts.en: Alaa is a 24-year-old woman from Bani Kenanah, Irbid, Jordan who lives with 4 other family members. She is requesting a loan of 400 JD so that she can make home improvements. She would like to buy new furniture and paint. Since Alaa is under 30 years old her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements.

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es:
La Señorita. Sandra es socia del banco comunal Los Talvos, vive por una comunidad que  pertenece a la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, este sector se encuentra rodeado de montañas las cuales le dan un paisaje pintoresco, nos ofrece varios lugares para salir de la rutina de la ciudad, su tierra es fértil por lo que su gente se dedica a la agricultura, cría de animales y comercio, aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señorita Sandra tiene 20 años, es soltera y vive en casa de sus padres quienes se dedican a la agricultura y cría de animales, la casa en la que viven es propiedad de sus padres.
 
Nuestra socia trabaja en un taller de costura actividad que la viene desempeñando hace 3 meses, trabaja de lunes a viernes desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 5 de la tarde, es una profesional en esta actividad porque ha estudiado y ahora lo está ejerciendo.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace 3 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una máquina de coser.

Su meta es seguir comprando maquinas para tener un taller propio de costura en su casa.
texts.en:
Sandra is a member of Los Talvos communal bank.  She lives in a community that is located in Valle en Cuenca parish.  The area is surrounded by mountains that make the landscape picturesque, and offers numerous opportunities to get away from the city routine.  The land is fertile, and so the region’s residents make a living from farming, raising livestock, and commerce.  The residents also maintain their local culture and traditions. 

Sandra is 20 years old, single, and lives in her parents’ house.  Her parents make a living farming and raising livestock, and own the house where they live.

Sandra works in a sewing workshop, and has had a job there for 3 months.  She works Mondays to Fridays from 8 AM to 5 PM.  She is a professional in this activity, since she studied to be a seamstress and now sews for a living.

Sandra has been a member of her communal bank for 3 years, and will invest her new loan in the purchase of a sewing machine.  

Her goal is to keep purchasing sewing machines so she can have her own sewing workshop in her home.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine.

loans.name: Zafar

texts.ru: Зафар 1967 года рождения, женат имеет 3 детей. Шесть лет назад Зафар начинал свой бизнес с малого оборота, в то время у него не было магазина, он торговал возле своего дома в небольшом ларьке. Со временем  он увеличил  свой капитал и арендовал небольшой магазин. Его жена поддерживает в бизнесе работая в этом же магазине продавщицей. Они с женой мечтают в будущем хорошо обустроить своих дочерей и сына, также одна из дочерей учиться в другом городе в медицинском институте, они также копят денежные средства на ее обучение. Так как сейчас лето и очень жарко, сезон напитков и мороженного, на полученный кредит он хочет приобрести  холодильник в свой магазин. Они  благодарны за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Zafar was born in 1967.  He is married and has three children.  Six years ago, Zafar didn't yet have a store.  He started his business near his home in a small kiosk with low turnover.  In time, he increased his capital and rented a small store.  His wife supports him in his business by working in the store as a sales clerk.  He and his wife dream to one day get their son and daughters settled in their own lives.  One of their daughters is studying in a medical institute in a different city, and they are also saving money for her education.    

Since it's now summer and very hot--the season for cold drinks and ice cream--they want to use their loan to purchase a refrigerator for their store.  They are grateful for your financial support.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator for ice cream and drinks

loans.name: Abdullatef

texts.en:
Abdullatef is a 25-year-old single young man, who has an entertainment store in addition to his work in agriculture. Abdullatef wants to expand and improve the condition of his store, so he is requesting a 2,500 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing a new pool table, chairs, and tables. This will improve the store's condition and satisfy the customers needs, which will help increase the number of customers and improve Abdullatef's income.

Abdullatef is photographed in his store.

loans.use: to purchase a pool table, chairs, and tables for his project.

loans.name: Tatyana

texts.ru:
Татьяна вдова. У нее пять взрослых детей. Татьяна не работает сейчас, но она получает пенсию и также ей помогают дети.

Татьяна просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 5000 гривен на покупку новой бытовой техники, так как совсем недавно из за большого скачка электронапряжения во время бури ее бытовая техника сломалась.
texts.en:
Tatyana is a widow with five grown children.  Tatyana is not working right now, but she receives a pension and her children also help her.

Tatyana is requesting a loan of 5,000 hryven to purchase new household appliances because there was a large power surge during a recent storm and her old ones went dead.

loans.use: to purchase new household appliances

loans.name: Mariuxi Lissette

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Charapoto se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal La Rosa De Guadalupe. Esta localidad se conoce por su cultura tradicional y además por estar a pocos minutos de dos de las  mejores playas de la provincia como son San Jacinto y San Clemente.

En este lugar conocimos a la Señorita Mariuxi, tiene 20 años de edad, está soltera y estudia licenciatura en Educación Física en una universidad local. Ella vive en casa de sus padres. Lleva dos ciclos en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque con los créditos ha podido salir adelante en sus estudios.

Nuestra amiga tiene una sociedad con su papá, ellos se dedican a la venta de mariscos y nos cuenta que los fines de semana se desplazan hasta pedernales en el carro de su  papá para en ese lugar comprar todo tipo de mariscos y luego llevarlos a entregar a Guayaquil, Portoviejo y otros lugares donde entregan a comerciantes minoristas, llevan  cerca de un año con este negocio pero les va muy bien ya que cada vez tienen más clientes a quienes surtir de sus mariscos.

Este crédito es para comprar más mariscos para llevara a entregar esta semana.
 
Sus metas son terminar sus estudios  y ser una gran profesional.
texts.en:
In the city of Charapoto the communal bank La Rosa De Guadalupe meets every 15 days.  This region is known for its traditional culture and furthermore for being a few minutes from two of the better beaches of the province, as they are San Jacinto and San Clemente.

In this place we got to know Miss Mariuxi. She is 20 years old, is single and is studying for a degree in Physical Education at a local university.  She lives in her parents' house.  She has had two cycles with the communal bank and likes it because she has been able to get ahead in her studies with the loans.

Our friend has a company with her father.  They work in shellfish sales and tell us that on weekends they travel to Pedernales in her father's car to buy all kinds of shellfish in this place and later bring them to deliver in Guayaquil, Portoviejo and other places where they deliver them to retailers.  They have spent around a year in this business, but it's going very well for them, since each time they have more clients to supply with their shellfish.  This loan is to buy more shellfish to bring to the delivery this week.  Her goals are to finish her studies and be a great professional.

loans.use: to buy shellfish.

loans.name: Mamie

texts.en: Mamie, 46, lives in Buchanan, is married, and has nine children between the ages of 9 to 24. For the past 28 years, she has been selling palm oil, charcoal, and fufu (African food made of cassava). She started this business with money given to her by her mother. One problem she faces is transportation costs. She is proud of her business because she is able to contribute to the family. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fufu, rice, and charcoal for her business. Her plan is to build a house in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more fufu, rice, and charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Elena

texts.ru:
Елена целенаправленно вложила предыдущий кредит КИВА в развитие своего дела, получив дополнительную прибыль и приобретя автомобиль для работы и личных нужд семьи. 
Елена хотела бы вложить 21 000 гривен в увеличение ассортимента джинсовой одежды для привлечения разных возрастных категорий покупательниц. Со временем надеется за счет скопленных от работы бизнеса средств открыть новую точку с детскими товарами на том же рынке, охватив тем самым еще и этот покупательский сектор. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Elena invested her previous loan from Kiva in developing her business and, with her additional profits, bought a car for both work and family needs.  

Elena would like to invest 21,000 hryven in increasing her assortment of denim clothing in order to attract customers of various age groups.  With the money she saves from her business, she hopes in time to open an additional sales outlet at the same bazaar, but for children's goods and, in doing so, to capture a new segment of the market.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of denim clothing

loans.name: Santos Rafael

texts.es: Santos Rafael de treinta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos; Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le ayuda a mejorar cada día más su labor para así siempre obtener las mejores cosechas, el está orgulloso de su trabajo pues le ha dado muy buenos resultados, el terreno de siembra está ubicado en una zona con alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a su vivienda, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefiere porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable; Santos es un hombre emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir adelante y ganarse un futuro mejor, es muy luchador y no piensa rendirse hasta alcanzar su sueños; como aumento la demanda de clientes Santos quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital que lo  respalde para invertir en los insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante, insecticida, herbicida, herramientas, etc. Santos Rafael es muy responsable y con buenas referencias de pago, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y  a la vez darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Santos Rafael is 38 years old and lives with his life partner and children.  He makes a living cultivating corn and has several years working in agriculture.  He has gained a lot of experience which has helped him improve his work every day in order to always have the best crops.  He is proud of his work because it has given him great results.  His land is fertile and very close to his home.  He does business in all surrounding areas and has many customers. His customers prefer purchasing from him because he always has what they need at affordable prices.  Furthermore, the service is unmatched.  

Santos is an entrepreneur with a strong desire to come out ahead and work towards a better future.  He is a fighter and plans to keep working until he gets old.  Because his customers have a higher demand Santos wants to increase production but needs capital to support his investment in supplies.  This is why he is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to purchase corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, herbicide, and tools etc.  Santos Rafael is very responsible, has good references and insures he will be able to repay his loan while at the same time giving his family a good life.

loans.use: to purchase corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, herbicide, and tools

loans.name: Mondaymah

texts.en: Mondaymah is 48 years old, married, and lives in Congo Town with four children aged 8 to 15 years who all live at home. For the past twenty one years, she has been selling used clothes in the market.  She established the business with small loans from friends and says that she encounters few problems in her business other than the large amount of travel involved which can be difficult with a small child.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more used clothes for her business. Her plan is to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothes for her business

loans.name: Hawa

texts.en: Hawa, 39, lives in Buchanan with her husband, a tailor, and five children, ages 4 to 19. For the past 12 years, she has been involved in business to help her husband and to educate their children. She has a table in the market where she sells earrings, body spray, grease, powder,and finger rings. She is requesting a loan to buy more earrings, body spray, grease, powder, and finger rings for her business. Her plan is to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to buy earrings, body spray, grease, powder, and finger rings for her  business.

loans.name: Mamie

texts.en: Mamie is 38 years old and lives in Buchanan. She is married and her husband is a driver. They have three children, ages 8 to 15, who live at home and attend school. For 15 years, Marie has been operating a little restaurant where she sells Liberian food. She started this business with 4,500 Liberian dollars. She enjoys her business because she has a lot of customers. Mamie is requesting a loan to purchase rice, oil, palm oil, fish, and spices for her business. She plans to build a house in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase rice, oil, palm oil, fish, and spices for her business.

loans.name: Riham

texts.en:
Riham is a 40 year old woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 400 JOD so that she can buy blankets and cleaning supplies. She plans on selling thse general household goods from her home. This will help improve her economic situation. 

* Riham prefers not to upload her photo on the Internet, thus the above photo is of her sister

loans.use: to buy blankets and cleaning materials that will be sold from home.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is 42 years old and lives in Compound #3. She is married and has three children between the ages of  5 to 15 who attend school and live at home. For the past 20 years, she has been selling fresh and dried fish  in the local market. She likes her business because fish selling generates fast profits. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fresh cassava, butter nose, and fish  for her business. She plans to expand her business and help her friends with fish to sell to have some percentage of the profit.

loans.use: to purchase more fresh cassava, butter nose, and fish for her business.

loans.name: Fatu

texts.en: Fatu is 43 and lives in compound#3 with her husband and children. She is a hard working woman who wants to excel in her business and educate her children. For the past 12 years she has been selling food items like rice, flour, candy, butter, and Sardinia (brand of sardines). With the loan she received from her friends, since she started this business she has improved her living condition, She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, flour, candy, and Sardinia for her business. She plan to educate her children and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, flour, candy, and Sardinia for her business

loans.name: Marie

texts.en:
Marie lives in the Congo Town area with her husband and children. She is 26 years old and her children are between the ages of 4 to 9. All of the children stay at home with their parents and are in school. For the past nine years Marie has been operating a cook shop (restaurant). During the rainy season she faces some difficulties with buying.  

She learned this trade from her mother, and her husband had given her money to start this business. She is proud of her business because she is able to send her children to school. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, vita, palm oil, and other items for the business. Her future plan is to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, vita, palm oil, and other items for the business.

loans.name: Aysha

texts.en:
Aysha is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Odeh appears in her Kiva profile photo, pictured in his store. Aysha is a 56-year-old woman. She is a mother of four sons and eight daughters. Two of her sons and six of her daughters are married.

For the past one year, Aysha's husband has been selling electric extensions, which has been a profitable project and the only source of income to the family, but he also needs more support to cover the family's needs and the store's cost.

Aysha is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her husband cover the costs of purchasing necessary electric extensions for resale. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

loans.use: To buy electric extensions for resale

loans.name: José Antonio

texts.es: José Antonio de veintinueve años  de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia, el posee una venta de frutas y verduras de forma ambulante, vende tomates, cebollas, chiles, plátanos, papaya, naranjas etc. tiene diez años de tener el negocio  y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas, comercia en diferentes zonas y ya tiene clientela fija pues las personas lo prefieren porque siempre tienen lo que necesitan con producto de calidad, a precios accesibles pero sobre todo con un servicio excelente; José es un hombre dedicado a su labor, luchador, y con muchas metas por alcanzar, cada día se esfuerza al máximo para tener éxito, quiere aumentar sus ventas para aumentar sus ganancias pero necesita de un apoyo  de capital para invertir en insumo por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar fruta y verdura por mayor. José Antonio tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá saldar el financiamiento y a la vez confía que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: José Antonio is 29 and lives with his life companion and their children in his own home.  He sells fruits and vegetables as a street vendor.  He sells tomatoes, onions, chili peppers, plantains, papaya, oranges, etc.  He has had this business for 10 years and has earned a lot of sales experience.  He sells in different areas and has a fixed clientele.  People prefer him because he always has what they need with a high-quality product, accessible prices, and above all, excellent service.  José is dedicated to his work and is determined, with many goals.  Every day he puts forth maximum effort to succeed.  He wants to increase his sales to increase his profits, but he needs capital to invest in supplies.  This is why he is requesting a loan from Integral that will let him buy fruits and vegetables wholesale.  José Antonio has good credit references and impeccable morals.  He is sure that he will be able to pay off the financing and also trusts that he can bring his home economic security.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables wholesale.

loans.name: Yuri Vladimir

texts.es: Yuri Vladimir de treinta y dos años de edad vive junto a sus padres, sus hermanos y sus hijos en casa propia; él se dedica a la venta de tortas en sus variedades de pollo, jamon, carne y mixtas, bebidas y golosinas de forma ambulante, tiene diez años de tener el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas, comercia en una zona muy circulada de personas por lo que ya tiene muchos clientes que lo prefieren por el exquisito sabor de su comida, la higiene, calidad y los buenos precios, además de un servicio inigualable; Yuri se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad; es un hombre entregado a su trabajo, luchador, visionario y muy humilde, se esfuerza cada día para alcanzar el éxito; quiere hacer crecer su negocio porque de esta forma aumentara la ganancia, necesita de capital para invertir en los insumos necesarios por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar pan, jamón, carne, verdura, aderezos, golosinas, bebida, etc. Yuri es muy responsable, tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá cancelar en el periodo establecido el financiamiento y a la vez darle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en: Yuri Vladimir is 32 and lives with his parents, siblings, and children in his own home.  He makes a living selling a variety of sandwiches like chicken, ham, meat, and a combination of these ingredients in a very well-frequented area.  This is why he has many customers who prefer the exquisite flavor of his food, the cleanliness, quality, good prices, and unequaled service.  Yuri is characterized by his great friendliness.  He is dedicated to his work, is determined, a visionary, and very humble.  He works hard every day to be successful.  He wants to grow his business because in this way he will increase his profits.  He needs capital to invest in the necessary supplies, and this is why he is requesting a loan from Integral to buy bread, ham, meat, vegetables, seasonings, candy, drinks, etc.  Yuri is very responsible and has good credit references.  He is sure that he will be able to pay off his loan in the established timeframe while giving his family a better life.

loans.use: to buy bread, ham, meat, vegetables, seasonings, candy, and drinks.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia de treinta y siete años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo en casa de su tía; ella posee una venta de frutas y verduras, tiene tomates, cebollas, chiles, plátanos, limones entre otros; tiene varios años de tener el negocio y se siente satisfecha que le ha dado muy buenos resultados, su puesto está ubicado en el mercado de la localidad donde reside y ya tiene mucha clientela pues todas las personas la prefieren porque vende productos de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además  el servicio  es inigualable; Sonia es una mujer decidida y trabajadora siempre está buscando las mejores oportunidades para salir adelante , quiere hacer crecer el negocio pero necesita de capital para la inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar frutas y verduras por mayor. Sonia es muy responsable y tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Sonia is 37 and lives with her life companion and their son in her aunt's house.  She sells fruits and vegetables like tomatoes, onions, chili peppers, plantains, lemons, etc.  She has had her business for several years and is satisfied because it has given her good results.  Her stand is located in a market in the area where she lives, and she has a lot of customers.  People prefer her because she sells high-quality products at accesible prices, and her service is unequaled.  Sonia is decisive and hard-working and is always looking for the best opportunities to get ahead.  She wants to grow her business, but she needs investment capital.  This is why she is requesting a loan from Integral that will let her buy fruits and vegetables wholesale.  Sonia is very responsible and has good credit references.  She is sure that she will be able to pay off the loan while giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables wholesale.

loans.name: Flor Azucena

texts.es: Flor Azucena de cuarenta años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su nieta en casa propia, ella se dedica a la elaboración  y venta de plantillas para zapato, carteras y elaboración de piñatas, tiene varios años de  trabajar en el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas, su negocio está ubicado en su domicilio y es muy conocida en toda la localidad, ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Flor es una mujer visionaria con muchas ganas de salir adelante siempre está a la expectativa de oportunidades que le permitan alcanzar el éxito; quiere aumentar las ventas porque sabe que así aumentara sus ganancias quiere invertir en insumos pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cuero, papel, pegamento etc. Flor Azucena tiene buen record crediticio y buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Flor Azucena is 40 years old and lives with her partner and her granddaughter in their own house. She works making insoles for shoes, wallets, and piñatas. She has many years of experience working in this business and also has a lot of sales experience. Her business is located in her house and is very well known in the area. She has a lot of customers and people prefer her because she always has what they need at accessible prices and furthermore, her service is excellent.

Flor is a visionary woman who is eager to get ahead. She is always on the lookout for opportunities that will help her achieve success. She wants to increase her sales because she knows that this will increase her profits. She wants to invest in materials but needs the capital to do so, which is why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL so that she can buy leather, paper, glue, etc. Flor Azucena has a good credit history and good references, assuring that she will be able to pay off the debt and, at the same time, to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy leather, paper, glue, and other materials

loans.name: Viviana Maribel

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Charapoto se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal La Rosa De Guadalupe. Esta localidad se conoce por su cultura tradicional y además por estar a pocos minutos de dos de las  mejores playas de la provincia como son San Jacinto y San Clemente.

En este lugar vive la señora Viviana, tiene 28 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene una hija de 5 años de edad, la misma que estudia en escuela. El marido es comerciante. 

Nuestra amiga con su esposo se dedican al comercio, venden frutas al por mayor, nos cuenta que de jueves a domingo ellos en un camioncito de su propiedad se  desplazan a los campos a comprar piñas, melón, sandias, naranjas y otras frutas que puedan encontrar para luego llevarlos a entregar a comerciantes en Bahía de Caraquez, lugar donde muchos comerciantes minoristas les compran. Ella además en su casa también tiene un negocio de alquiler de sillas y mesas las cuales las utilizan para reuniones sociales, fiestas entre otras cosas, llevan más de 10 años con sus actividades comerciales.

Este crédito es para comprar más frutas de todo tipo. Lleva cinco ciclos en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la responsabilidad y seriedad del grupo y la institución.
 
Su sueño es comprar un camión más grande.
texts.en:
The members of the "La Rosa de Guadalupe" communal bank meet every two weeks in the town of Charapoto. This place is known for its traditional culture and also for being a few minutes from the best beaches in the province, such as San Jacinto and San Clemente.

Viviana lives here. She is 28, and in a common-law relationship. She has a five-year-old daughter who goes to school. Her husband is a business owner.

Our friend and her husband operate a business. They sell fruit at wholesale, and she tells us that from Thursday to Sunday, in a small truck they own, they travel to the countryside to buy pineapple, melons, watermelons, oranges and other fruit they can find. Then they take it to deliver to store owners in Bahía de Caraquez, where many retailers buy from them. 

She also has a business in her home renting chairs and tables used for social gatherings, parties and other events. They have been carrying on their businesses for more than ten years.

This loan is to buy more fruit of all kinds. She has been a member of the communal bank for five loan cycles, and likes it because of the responsibility and seriousness of the group and the institution. 

Her dream is to buy a larger truck.

loans.use: To buy fruit.

loans.name: Subhia

texts.en:
Subhia is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Naser appears in her Kiva profile photo.

Subhia is a thirty-year-old young woman and a mother to two sons and two daughters. Her husband is a taxi driver who earns a low income which is not enough to cover all of the family's needs and the taxi's costs.

Subhia wants to improve the living conditions of her family by sharing her husband's ambition to increase the family's income. She is requesting a 2,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help her husband cover the costs of insuring and licensing a taxi, the family's only source of income. This will enable Subhia's husband to travel freely and legally from one area to another and work extra hours, consequently increasing requests and improving the family's income.

loans.use: to pay for insuring and licensing a taxi.

loans.name: Jully Karina

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Charapoto se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal La Rosa De Guadalupe. Esta localidad se conoce por su cultura tradicional y además por estar a pocos minutos de dos de las  mejores playas de la provincia como son San Jacinto y San Clemente.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Jully, tiene 38 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 19, 18 y 8 años de edad, los dos mayores  estudian en universidad  y el menor en escuela. Su esposo trabaja en la Empresa Eléctrica.

Nuestra amiga con la intención de ganarse algo por su cuenta y sentirse independiente  se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes cuando necesitan de alguna prenda. Trabaja tres  días de la semana y en horarios variados, ella  deja a crédito su mercadería y cobra cada quince días. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a  Guayaquil cada quince días o al mes de acuerdo a lo que necesite. Tiene cinco años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace dos años, es la presidenta del mismo  y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos. 

Su sueño es ver que sus hijos terminen sus estudios y sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
The members of the "La Rosa De Guadalupe" communal bank meet every two weeks in the town of Charapoto. This place is known for its traditional culture and also for being a few minutes from two of the best beaches in the province, San Jacinto and San Clemente.

This is where we met Jully. She is 38, married, and has three children, ages 19, 18 and 8. The two eldest attend university and the youngest goes to school. Her husband works at the electric company.

With the intent of earning something on her own account and feeling independent, our friend sells clothing of all kinds. She sells door-to-door and also sells at her home, where her customers come when they need some article of clothing. 

She works three days a week, and her hours of work vary. She sells her merchandise on credit and collects every two weeks. She goes to Guayaquil to buy her merchandise every two weeks, or monthly, based on what she needs.

She has been in this business for five years, and it is going very well.

She is going to use this loan to buy more merchandise such as pants, blouses, T-shirts and children's clothing.  She has been a member of the communal bank for two years. She is the chairperson of the group, and likes it because of the help they provide through the loans.  

Her dream is to see that her children complete their studies and become good professionals.

loans.use: To buy pants, blouses, T-shirts and children's clothing.

loans.name: Juan Ernesto

texts.es: Juan Ernesto de cincuenta y siete años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su nieta; él se dedica a la venta de cinchos y tiene varios años de dedicarse al negocio, le ha dado muy buenos resultados y ha ganado mucha experiencia en las  ventas, comercia de forma ambulante y se ha hecho de mucha clientela las personas lo prefieren porque saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles y sobre todo con un servicio excelente se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad; Juan es un hombre visionario con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre pone todo de su parte para alcanzar el éxito, últimamente han aumentado las ventas y necesita de más mercadería para no decepcionar a la clientela por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cinchos por mayor. Juan Ernesto es muy responsable y tiene buenas referencias de pago tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en: Juan Ernesto, 57, lives with his wife and their granddaughter. For some years he has had a business selling belts, which has had good results. He has gained a lot of experience in sales - he works door-to-door and has a lot of customers who prefer him because they know that he sells good quality products at affordable prices, and above all with excellent service. He is known for his friendliness. Juan is a visionary man with a great desire to get ahead. He always gives it his all to be successful. Lately his sales have increased and he needs more merchandise so he doesn't disappoint his customers. For that reason he has asked INTEGRAL for a loan to buy belts in bulk. Juan Ernesto is very responsible and has good references. He is certain that he can pay off his debt and at the same time give his family a better life.

loans.use: to buy belts in bulk

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es: Pedro de sesenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo; él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz, tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a la localidad donde vive, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable; Pedro es un hombre enérgico muy dedicado a su labor, tiene muchos sueños que desea alcanzar y piensa trabajar duro para lograr el éxito, además aprovecha el terreno sembrando hortalizas; en la siembra pasada tuvo muchas pérdidas por eso en esta temporada quiere recuperarse y aumentar la producción por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante, insecticida, herramienta, etc. Pedro tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Pedro, 61, lives with his wife and son. He works in agriculture, specifically farming corn. He has been a farmer for some years and has a lot of experience that allows him to get the best harvests. He farms land in an agricultural zone close to where he lives, and sells his goods in all of the nearby areas. He already has a lot of clientele because people know that what he sells is of good quality at affordable prices. What's more, the service is unequaled. Pedro is an energetic man, very dedicated to his work. He has a lot of dreams that he wants to achieve, and plans to work hard to be successful. He also takes advantage of his land to plant vegetables. In the most recent planting he had a lot of losses, so this season he wants to recover and increase his production. For that reason he has asked INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, tools, etc. Pedro has good references and irreproachable morals. He is sure that he can pay off his debt and at the same time give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide and tools.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita de cuarenta y siete años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos. Ella posee un comedor, tiene desayunos y  almuerzos vende frijoles, plátanos, crema, sopas, carnes, ensaladas etc., está ubicada en el mercado municipal de la zona, es muy conocida se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues todo lo que prepara es exquisito, elaborado con material de calidad y a precios accesible además el servicio es inigualable; Margarita es una mujer  visionaria dispuesta a salir adelante, siempre está a la expectativa de oportunidades que ofrezcan un futuro más próspero; desde hace algún tiempo tiene la idea de hacer crece el negocio pero no había tenido la oportunidad porque no tiene suficiente capital para invertir en insumo por eso ahora le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, lácteos, embutidos, carnes, verduras, bebidas etc.  Margarita tiene buen record en crédito y tiene la capacidad de pago necesaria, asegura que podrá pagar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Margaritais is 47, and lives with her life companion and her three children. She owns an eatery, and offers breakfasts and lunches. She sells beans, plantains, sour cream, soups, meats, salads, etc. Her eatery is located in the area's municipal market. 

She is very well-known and has acquired a large clientele, because everything she prepares is delicious, made with quality ingredients, and offered at affordable prices. Besides, the service is unmatched.

Margarita is a visionary woman, ready to move forward in life. She is always on the lookout for opportunities that offer a more prosperous future. For some time she has had the idea of expanding her business, but had not had the opportunity, because she does not have sufficient working capital to invest in supplies. That is why she is now applying to Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy staple grains, dairy products, cold cuts, meats, vegetables, drinks, etc.  

Margarita has a good credit record and the necessary ability to pay. She says she will be able to pay the debt, and at the same time provide her family with a better life.

loans.use: To buy staple grains, dairy products, cold cuts, meats, vegetables and drinks.

loans.name: Oretha

texts.en: Oretha lives in Compound #3 in Liberia. She is thirty years old and married with three children who live at home and are in school. Oretha has been running a cook shop (small restaurant) for the past six years now. Her husband helped her financially to start her business. Oretha enjoys serving her customers. She makes more profit every day. A difficulty she faces with her business is that she receives less customers during the rainy season. Oretha is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, charcoal, fish, and other ingredients for her business. She plans to educate her children and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, charcoal, fish, and other ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Rosa María De La Paz
