texts.es: Rosa María de cincuenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos ; ella se dedica a la venta de verduras, tomates, chiles, cebollas, entre otros además vende miel y café, tiene varios años de tener el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas, su negocio está ubicado en el mercado de la localidad y ya tiene mucha clientela, la gente la prefiere porque siempre tiene lo que las personas necesitan con producto de calidad y a precios accesibles además del buen servicio; Rosa es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante siempre está a la expectativa de las nuevas oportunidades que se le presentan porque quiere alcanzar el éxito, desde hace algún tiempo quiere ampliar el negocio invirtiendo en insumo pero no posee de suficiente capital, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar verduras por mayor, miel y café. Rosa María tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable sabe que podrá pagar la deuda y a la vez confía en que su familia tendrá una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa Maria, 52, lives with her husband and their three children. She sells vegetables - tomatoes, peppers, onions, among others - and also sells honey and coffee. She has been in this business for some years and has a lot of experience in sales. Her business is located in the town market and she has a lot of customers. People prefer her because she always has what they need, with a quality product and affordable prices, in addition to good service. 

Rosa is an entrepreneurial woman with a great desire to get ahead. She is always looking out for new opportunities because she wants to be successful. For some time she has wanted to increase her business by investing in inputs, but she didn't have enough capital. For that reason she asks INTEGRAL for a loan to buy vegetables in bulk, honey and coffee. Rosa Maria has good references and is very responsible. She knows that she will be able to pay the debt and is also confident that her family will have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy vegetables in bulk, honey and coffee.

loans.name: Salomi

texts.en: Salomi, 22, is married with one child who is four years old and in school. She has been selling slippers for the past four years. With this loan, she will improve her business and family's lives. Salomi learned to sell from her mother. She is proud of her business, because she is able to pay her child's school fees with the profit that she earns from the business. Salomi is requesting a loan to purchase more women's and children's slippers for her business. Her future plan is to build herself a house.

loans.use: to purchase more women's and children's slippers for her business.

loans.name: Estela América

texts.es: Estela América de veintiuno años de edad vive junto a su madre y su hermano en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de ropa interior para dama y caballero,  es un pequeño bazar ubicado en una zona muy estratégica, se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas y se siente orgullosa de los resultados, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles, además el servicio es excelente; Estela es una mujer muy dedicada a su labor, siempre está dispuesta a superarse y no piensa rendirse hasta alcanzar el éxito; uno de sus más grandes sueños es hacer crecer su negocio porque así aumentara sus ganancias desea invertir en nuevos artículos,  pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa interior por mayor y en variedad de colores y tallas. Estela América es responsable y con gran capacidad de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Estela América is 21 years old.  She lives with her mother and her brother in a home they own.  She sells men's and women's underwear.  She has a small shop in a well located area.  She has gained a great deal of sales experience and she is proud of her results.  She has a large number of customers because they know that everything she sells is top quality at reasonable prices, and she provides excellent service.  Estela is very dedicated to her work.  She always tries to do better and doesn't consider giving up on her way to success.  One of her biggest dreams is to grow her business so that she can increase her earnings.  She would like to invest in additional inventory but she does not have capital to do this.  She is therefore requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will enable her to buy underwear wholesale in a variety of colors and sizes.  Estela América is responsible and very capable of making payments. She is sure she can pay the debt and at the same time provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase underwear wholesale.

loans.name: Glades

texts.en: Glades is a twenty-five-year-old single mother living in Kasese, Uganda. The responsibility of looking after the family rests on her, and her desire is to see her children become financially independent. Glades is a nurse and has been in service for two years. In order to supplement her salary, she opened a drug store, and the business is slowly growing despite the challenge of high taxes. Her goal is to educate her children and own a pharmacy. Glades wants a loan to buy medications to sell.

loans.use: to buy medications to sell.

loans.name: Cruz Noemí

texts.es: Cruz Noemí de cuarenta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida, su hija y su nieta; ella posee una pupusería donde vende por las mañanas cerca de un centro escolar, tiene de frijol con queso, revueltas, y de queso, ya lleva varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite mantener la calidad en su labor, la ubicación de su negocio es muy estratégica sus más grandes compradores son los estudiantes, cuenta con mucha su clientela, pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de calidad y a precios accesibles, además el servicio es excelente; Cruz es una mujer muy positiva, siempre está dispuesta a trabajar, quiere alcanzar sus sueños y no descansara hasta lograrlo; su más grande sueño es hacer crecer su negocio quiere invertir en insumos pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, queso, chicharrón , verduras etc. Cruz Noemí es muy responsable y tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que pagara el financiamiento y a la vez confía en que su familia tendrá una mejor vida.
texts.en: Cruz Noemí is 48 years old.  She lives with her life partner, her daughter and her granddaughter.  She has a pupusería where she sells pupusas in the morning near a school.  She makes bean and cheese pupusas, pork, bean and cheese pupusas ("revueltas"), and cheese pupusas. She has had this business for many years and has a lot of valuable experience so that her products are high quality.  Her business is strategically located and her biggest customers are students.  She has many customers because people know that her products are good quality and reasonably priced, and she provides excellent service.  Cruz is a very positive woman and a hard worker.  She wants to achieve her dreams and won't rest until she does.  Her biggest dream is to grow her business.  She wants to invest in ingredients but doesn't have enough capital to do so.  For this reason she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to purchase basic grains, cheese, pork, vegetables, etc.  Cruz Noemí is very responsible and has good payment references.  She is sure she will pay off the loan and she trusts that her family will have a better life.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, cheese, and pork.

loans.name: Ive

texts.es: Ive de cuarenta  y uno años de edad vive junto a su familia; ella se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, su negocio está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a su localidad, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Ive es una mujer activa, muy trabajadora, y sobre todo muy honesta siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan alcanzar el éxito, la última cosecha tuvo pérdidas debido a que no pudo asistir sus cultivos por falta de recursos, por lo cual perdió ganancias,  quiere recuperarse y aumentar la producción, comprara insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante, insecticida,  herramientas y control de plagas y maleza; Ive tiene buenas referencias de pago y tienen la certeza que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez confía que su familia tendrá una vida plena.
texts.en: Ive is 41 years old and lives with her family.  She works in agriculture, growing corn.  She has done this work for many years and has a lot of experience, which enables her to obtain the best crops.  Her business is located in a very agricultural area near her village.  She sells in the neighboring towns and has many customers because they know that all of her products are high quality at accessible prices, and she provides excellent customer service.  Ive is very active and hardworking, and above all she is honest.  She is always looking for new opportunities that will allow her to achieve success.  She suffered losses with her last harvest because she was not able to help her crops due to a lack of resources. This caused her to lose income.  She wants to recover from that loss, increase production, and purchase materials so she has requested a loan from INTEGRAL to purchase corn seed, fertilizer, insecticide, tools, and weed and disease control.  Ive has good credit references. She is sure she will be able to pay the debt and that her family will have a full life.

loans.use: to purchase corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay workers who are preparing land for the next planting season.

loans.name: Vicky Katherine

texts.es: Vichy a sus 21 años vive en Buena Fe cantón que pertenece a Quevedo. Se dedica a la venta de toldos, sabanas y toallas. Está casada con Héctor quien trabaja de manera independiente como chofer de taxi. Viven en la casa de sus padres ya que es de cemento tienen los servicios básicos y espacio hasta poder comprar una propia. Vichy nos comenta que lleva con el negocio 2 años y lo empezó cuando se caso ya que su esposo le dio el capital para poder empezar. La mercadería lo ofrece en la casa o recorriendo en el carro de sus esposo ofreciendo en varios puntos de la ciudad. El recorrido en carro lo hace cuando su esposo puede o no está muy ocupado desde las 8 de la mañana hasta la noche. De momento no ha tenido ningún problema y espera continuar así. Con el crédito piensa comprar mercadería para tener de stock y poder ofrecer fuera de la ciudad, también piensa adquirir una vitrina para exponer en su casa. Espera en algunos años tener su casa propia ya que muy pronto tendrá un bebe y empezara a formar su familia. Felicitaciones Vichy!!!
texts.en: Vicky is 21 years old.  She lives in the Buena Fe canton of Quevedo.  She sells bed netting, sheets, and towels.  She is married to Victor who works for himself as a taxi driver.  They live in her parents’ house which is made of cement.  They have basic services and space until they can purchase their own home.  Vicky tells us that she has had her business for 2 years and started when she got married.  Her husband gave her the capital to get started.  She sells her merchandise from home or traveling around the city in her husband's car to sell at different locations.  She uses the car when her husband is able and not very busy, from 8 in the morning until the night.  She has not had any problems so far and hopes that continues.  With this loan she plans to stock up on merchandise and to be able to sell outside of the city.  She would also like to obtain a display case to show her products at home.  She hopes that in a few years she will have her own home because very soon she will have a baby and start her family.  Congratulations Vicky!!!

loans.use: to purchase bed netting, sheets and towels.

loans.name: Maritza Marisol

texts.es: Maritza tiene 23 años, está casada con Gregorio quien labora en cosechadora de piña como obrero. Tienen una niña que asiste al kínder. Viven en Quevedo y su casa cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, menos alcantarillado y camino pavimentado. Maritza se dedica a la venta de ropa unisex, sabanas, toldos y colchas esto lo realiza por la insistencia de una amiga quien le enseño a vender y promocionar. Primero la acompañaba para aprender sus técnicas y de ahí poco a poco fue ganando la confianza necesaria para hacerlo sola. Su esposo Gregorio fue quien le ayudo con el capital necesario para empezar de esto han pasado 3 años. Ahora maneja su capital propio y tiene muchos clientes a quienes visita cuando la llaman, también recorre el sector ofreciendo sus productos. Empieza desde las 8 de la mañana hasta la noche donde llega a su casa a descansar. Martiza desea el crédito para poder comprar una vitrina, armadores y ropa para exhibir de una mejor manera esperando aumentar sus ventas y abrir una boutique así poder terminar su casa.
texts.en: Maritza is 23 years old.  She is married to Gregorio who works as a laborer harvesting pineapples. They have a daughter who is in kindergarten.  They live in Quevedo and their house has all basic services, except sewer service and paved roads.  Maritza sells unisex clothing, sheets, shades, and bedding.  A friend taught her to sell and promote these products.  At first she accompanied her friend to learn her techniques and then she gained confidence bit by bit in order to do it herself.  Her husband Gregorio helped her with the capital she needed to start her business 3 years ago.  Now she manages her own capital and has many customers whom she visits when they call her.  She also travels around the area selling her products.  She works from 8 in the morning until night when she arrives home to rest.  Maritza would like a loan to buy a display case, hangers and clothes to better display her products for sale.  She hopes this will increase her sales and she will be able to open a boutique and finish her house.

loans.use: to purchase unisex clothes, sheets, shades, and bedding.

loans.name: Abbia

texts.en: Abbia is a forty-year-old married woman with two children living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been dealing in goats for five years. She started with 1,500,000 shillings and now has 4,000,000 shillings as working capital. Her hardship is inadequate capital to purchase enough goats to meet demand. Her personal goal is to educate her children and her business goal is to expand her business into new markets. Abbia wants a loan to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Charity

texts.en: Charity is a thirty-year-old single mother of one child living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been an office attendant for Uganda wildlife centre for four years. She also trades produce, specifically dealing in maize. Her hardships are price fluctuation and inflation. Her personal goal is educating her children and her business goal is expanding the business into new markets. Charity wants money to buy maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is a twenty-nine-year-old married man with two children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been selling clothes for two years. He started with three million shillings and now has six million shillings as working capital. His hardships are seasonal weather, inadequate capital to purchase stock, price fluctuations and inflation. 

His personal goals are to educate his children and build a permanent house. His business goals are to expand his business into new markets and move his business to a more permanent location. Moses wants a loan to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en: Victoria, 31, lives in Buchanan with her husband and two children. Her children are four and ten years old and in school. Victoria stopped her education in the eighth grade, and has been involved in selling dishes, glasses, buckets, and blouses for the past nine years. Some difficulties she faces are transporting the goods from Monrovia to Buchanan and that sometimes costs are very high. With the loan given to her, she will improve her business and her living conditions. She is requesting a loan to purchase more dishes, glasses, buckets, and blouses for her business. She plans on having her own shop.

loans.use: to purchase more dishes, glasses, buckets, and blouses for her business.

loans.name: Kiketha

texts.en: Kiketha is a thirty-one-year-old married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He has a personal goal of building a permanent house as a residence. He has been a librarian for the last five years, and with the salary earnings, he has been able to pay school fees for his children. He faces the hardship of paying high taxes but has a vision of buying land on which to grow crops. Kiketha intends to use the loan to buy construction materials for his house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for his house.

loans.name: Vyizigiro Iii Group

texts.fr:
Maneno fait partie du groupe Vyizigiro III,  elle habite à Gitega. Elle a 26 ans et est mariée à Donatien, un enseignant. Ensemble ils ont  3 enfants  dont  2étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de riz depuis 10 ans. 

Elle est à son huitième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de riz à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait acheter une parcelle et construire une maison, elle voudrait en plus, voir ses enfants terminer leurs études.
texts.en:
Maneno, age 26, is a member of Vyizigiro III Group. She lives in Gitega and is married to Donatien, a teacher. Together, they have three children, out of which two go to school.

She's been selling rice for ten years and she's seeking her eighth loan from Kiva's partner, Turame. With this Kiva loan, she will bolster her working capital and buy a large quantity of rice to resell, in order to increase her income.

In the forthcoming years, she would like to buy a lot of land and build a house. In addition, she would like to see her children complete their studies.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of rice to resell

loans.name: Gioconda Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Gioconda es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien tiene una comideria desde hace 6 años en los cuales gracias a su ardua labor y los prestamos ha ido mejorando las condiciones del negocio con una cocina más amplia, techo en el local, exhibidores para la comida y las bebidas.
El crédito lo invertirá en granos básicos, carne y perecederos.
texts.en:
Gioconda is a hardworking and entrepreneurial woman who's had an eatery for six years. Thanks to her arduous work and the loans she's improved her business' condition with a more spacious kitchen, a roof for the premises, and showcases for the food and drinks.

She will invest the loan in basic grains, meat, and perishable items.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, meat, and perishable items.

loans.name: Siah

texts.en:
Siah lives in Compound #3 and is 42 years old. She is single with three children: two girls and one boy. They are between the ages of three and twelve and in school. Siah has been operating a table, where she sells grease, bowls, body cream and other items in the local market, for the past seventeen years. She learned to sell from her friends. 

With the loan, Siah will expand her business. She likes selling, because it makes her independent and allows her to support her children. Siah is requesting a loan to purchase more grease, bowls, body cream and other items for her business. She plans to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more grease, bowls, body cream and other items for her business.

loans.name: Ana Arabela

texts.es: Ana Arabela  de sesenta años de edad vive junto a  sus hijos en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de comida, desayunos y almuerzos vende plátanos fritos, frijoles, crema, sopas, carne asada, ensaladas, bebidas entre otros, el negocio está ubicado en su residencia y tiene varios años de tenerlo; con el tiempo se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en la cocina y en las ventas, tiene mucha clientela pues Ana prepara los platillos más exquisitos de la zona, la gente la prefiere porque todo es muy higiénico, elaborado con materia prima de primera calidad, precios accesibles y con el servicio más rápido; Ana es una mujer que ama su labor, se entrega día con día al máximo porque sabe que solo si pone todo el esfuerzo y motivación alcanzara el éxito, uno de sus más grandes sueños es hacer crecer su negocio. Ahora que aumentaron las ventas quiere aprovechar e invertir en insumos para la producción por eso le solicitan a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, carnes, embutidos, lácteos, verduras, bebidas, etc. Ana Arabela es muy responsable y tiene excelentes referencias crediticias por eso asegura que podrá pagar la deuda, y a la vez tiene la certeza que le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en: Ana Arabela is sixty years old and lives with her children in her own home. She makes a living selling food, breakfast, and lunch. She sells fried plantains, beans, cream, soup, grilled beef, salad, and drinks, among other items. Her business is located in her home and she's had it for several years. With time she has gained a lot of experience in the kitchen and with sales. She has a lot of customers as she prepares the most exquisite dishes in the area. People prefer her because everything is very hygienic, made with the best quality raw materials, at affordable prices, and has the fastest service. Ana is a woman who loves her work and devotes herself to it day after day because she knows that only if she puts in her best effort and motivation will she reach success. One of her biggest dreams is to expand her business. Now that they've increased sales she wants to take advantage of this and invest in supplies for production. For this reason they are requesting a loan from Integral that will allow her to buy basic grains, meat, sausage, dairy products, vegetables, drinks, etc. Ana Arabela is very responsible and has excellent credit references for which reason she is assured that she will be able to pay the debt and at the same time has the certainty that she will give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, meat, sausage, dairy products, vegetables, and drinks.

loans.name: Liliam

texts.es:
Liliam de Jesús es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora, madre soltera de un niño de 12 años. Ella se dedica a la venta de granos básicos desde hace 1 año la cual inicio vendiendo fresco, huevo, gelatina, chiverías y helados. 
En el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de gaseosas, arroz, azúcar, pollo y carne producto que invertirá por primera vez.
texts.en: Liliam de Jesús is a hard-working entrepreneur, and a single mother of a 12-year-old boy.  She has been selling basic grains for a year, and began business selling produce, eggs, gelatin, snacks and ice cream.  She will use the loan to buy sodas, rice, sugar, chicken, and meat for the first time.

loans.use: To buy sodas, rice, sugar, chicken and meat.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
El Sr Juan Antonio posee un negocio de venta de gaseosas, jugos, recargas telefónicas ubicado cerca de la terminal de buses del departamento de león.

El  crédito solicitado a Ceprodel será utilizado para compra de gaseosas, jugos, gas butano al por mayor ya que su clientela están buscando mas variedad de productos y para satisfacerles su demanda por lo que tendría mas ingresos para mejorar su nivel de vida de el y su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Antonio owns a business selling sodas, juices, and telephone recharges at a stand near the bus terminal in the department of León.

The loan requested from Ceprodel will be used to buy sodas, juices, and butane gas wholesale since his customers are seeking a wider variety of products.  He wants to satisfy demand and earn more income to improve his family's lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy sodas, juices, water, telephone recharges and butante gas.

loans.name: Hector Agustin

texts.es: Hector Agustín de 52 años, reside con su grupo familiar en una casa humilde pero propia, construida por el mismo,  es un hombre trabajador y siempre ha tenido grandes visiones y una de las razones para salir adelante es su familia, y siempre ha visto como lograr que sus hijos sean profesionales y que sean su mayor orgullo. Hector en su lugar de residencia es muy conocido por su forma de ser tiene un carisma enfocado a servir, y todos sus vecinos lo conocen así. Posee un negocio de venta de cereales e insumos básicos y se ha visto en la necesidad de invertir para mejorar los ingresos de su hogar, ya que es el único que trabaja y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Es por eso que solicita un crédito a INTEGRAL  para comprar insumos básicos como: semillas, abono, fertilizantes entre otros, para realizar buenas cosechas y que estos den  buenos frutos, Hector piensa que si recibe la ayuda tendrá el mejor futuro para él y su familia.
texts.en:
Héctor Agustín, 52, lives with his family group in a humble house that he built himself and which he owns.  He is a hard-working man and always has had great visions.  One of the reasons for wanting to get ahead is his family, and he has always wanted to see his children become professionals so he can be proud of them.  Héctor is very well-known in his community because of his charismatic personality focused on customer service, and all his neighbors think of him in this way.

He has a business selling cereals and basic supplies, and he finds himself in need of investing more to improve the household income, since he is the only one who works and earns a living for the household.  Therefore he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy basic supplies such as seeds, fertilizers, etc, to plant a good crop and obtain a good yield.  Hector believes that if he receives the help, he and his family will have a better future.

loans.use: To buy basic supplies such as seeds, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Abiezer Isai

texts.es: Abiezer Isai, reside con su grupo familiar en casa propia humilde, tiene 4 hijos uno de 3, 7, 11 y 14 años, es un hombre que  posee sueños y aspiraciones y  lo único que él desea en la vida es salir adelante por él y  su familia. Es muy responsable cuando se trata de trabajar, se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos como maíz, frijol, maicillo, y a parte en sus tiempos que no hay cosecha, se dedica a la albañilería.  Siempre con el deseo de que en su casa no falte el pan de cada día. Abiezer tiene un hijo enfermo, y últimamente ha estado gastando mucho dinero, es por eso que decidió acercarse a esta institución INTEGRAL y solicitar un crédito en el cual comprara insumos  agrícolas para seguir con su negocio necesita comprar: semillas, fertilizantes,   insecticidas, Herramientas como azadón, cuma, corbo, entre otros. Esta seguro que con la ayuda recibida solventará un poco las necesidades que está teniendo con su familia, en especial por la enfermedad de su hijo, y lograra pagar la deuda  antes de lo  acordado.
texts.en:
Abiezer Isai lives with his family group in the humble dwelling he owns.  He has four children, ages 3, 7, 11 and 14.  He is a man with dreams and aspirations, and with a sole desire of getting ahead for his family.  He is very responsible when it comes to working.  He grows basic grains such as corn, beans, and sorghum and, when crops are not in season, he works as a bricklayer.  He always makes sure there is food on the table every day.  

Abiezer has a son who is ill, so lately he has been spending a lot of money.  He decided to resort to the INTEGRAL Institution to request a loan to buy farm supplies such as: seeds, fertilizers, and insecticides, and tools such as a hoe, a curved machete, a knife, etc.  He is sure the financial help will take care of the family needs, especially regarding his son's illness.  He will be able to pay back the debt ahead of time.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, and tools such as a hoe, a curved machete and a knife.

loans.name: Mirna Del Carmen

texts.es: Mirna de 42 años, es una mujer trabajadora que cada mañana se levanta con el deseo de superarse, ella habita en su casa propia con su esposo y dos hijos una de 11 años y otro de 13, con mucho esfuerzo sus hijos están estudiando en la escuela, y por las tardes le ayudan en los oficios del hogar. Es trabajadora, honrada y muy humilde, pero siempre trata la manera de ver que hacer para que a sus hijos menores no les falte nada. Mirna tiene a sus esposo enfermo, él está en un tratamiento y le sale caro siente que no puede llevar el sustento por si sola a su hogar, es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, insecticidas, pesticidas entre otros, esta con la plena seguridad que con la ayuda brindada tendrá una de las mejores cosechas del año y así ella no estará en la incertidumbre de no tener como llevar el sustento a su familia.
texts.en:
Mirna, 42, is a hard-working woman who gets up early every morning in an effort to improve her lifestyle.  She lives in her own house with her husband and two children, ages 11 and 13.  Through much effort, her children are able to study at school.  In the afternoons they help with the housework.  She is a hard worker, honest and very humble, but she is always seeking ways to provide for her minor children.  

Mirna's husband is ill and in treatmen,t which is very expensive.  She does not feel like she can provide for the household alone, so she is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy farm supplies such as seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, pesticides, etc.  She is confident this help will give her the best crop yield this year, taking away any doubt she has about not being able to provide for her family.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies such as seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, pesticides, etc.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Martha, 47, is a mother of five children and lives with her husband in Buchanan. Her husband is a driver. Four of her children are responsible people and  are also involved in business, while the youngest one is in school. She received money from her oldest daughter to start this business. 

During her youth she stayed with her aunt and she was unable to attend school, but she was able to learn how to sell. She has been selling slippers and chains for the past 10 years. She makes a good profit because she has many customers. She has requested a loan to purchase more slippers and chains for her business. Her plan is to build a house and give her youngest child a good education.

loans.use: to purchase more slippers and chains for her business.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en: Evelyn is 35 years old and lives in Compound #3. She is married and her husband is a social worker. They have four children between the ages of 3 and 18. Three of them are attending school, while the youngest one stays at home. For the past 12 years Evelyn has been selling palm oil in the local market.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more palm oil for her business. She plans to sell and help her children to graduate from high school.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil for her business.

loans.name: Felecial

texts.en: Mary is 28 years old and lives in Compound #3. She is married and her husband is a driver. They have two children, ages 5 months and 13 years old. One of them is attending school and both of them live at home. For the past two years she has been selling table market (pepper, bitter ball, okra, oil, rice)  in the local market. She is requesting a loan to purchase more pepper, bitter ball, okra, oil and rice for her business. She plans to be a big businesswoman in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more pepper, bitter ball, okra, oil and rice for her business.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther lives in compound #3. She is 35 years old and a single mother with five children. She completed high school. Her children are between 7 and 20 years old. She received help from her friend to start this business. She has been selling oil and rice for the past 5 years. One of the challenges she is faced with is the unstable price of commodities on the market. She will use the loan to improve her business. She is requesting a loan to purchase more oil and rice for the business. She plans to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more oil and rice for the business.

loans.name: Gration

texts.en:
Gration works for Watu na Nuru, a Barefoot Power retailer in Tanzania. This is his story: I began working for the Diocese of Lweru in 2012 as Development Officer and have recently had the opportunity to begin a solar lighting retail business, working with my colleague from Switzerland, Daeni (on the left in the picture). This is an exciting new project where I can use my previous development project experience to build up the business. The current electricity supply does not reach every part of the country; this is especially true for rural areas. Solar lights prevent people from using kerosene lights, which are dangerous and very unhealthy. The main impacts of using solar lighting are that people save money by not using kerosene, charging their phones, and keeping their shops open in the evening; students and pupils are able to study more in the evening; and people reduce damage to their lungs and reduce the risk of burning themselves and their houses. The distribution of Barefoot Power products will benefit the community and Tanzanians as a whole by giving a reliable and sustainable source of light and, by providing this light source, helping to fight the three national enemies, which are limited education, disease, and poverty. We plan to distribute Barefoot Power products to micro-entrepreneurs and small businesses who want to sell them in villages and also train new staff and provide employment locally as the business grows.

Watu na Nuru, which means “Light for the People” in Swahili, is the name of a growing collection of businesses established with the support of the Anglican Church of Tanzania, with the aim of making high-quality, affordable solar lighting kits available to rural communities. Watu na Nuru needs to have sufficient quantities of the right products at the best time of year, which in this area is when the coffee harvest is in. We have developed a partnership with Barefoot Power Australia, who make what we believe are the best micro-solar systems on the market. When we are not selling product, we will provide training and technical support to retailers and micro-entrepreneurs because we want to ensure that these lights continue working for years. My greatest challenge in this role is ensuring that the products are available at the right time of year. Your loan will support our stock so that more village entrepreneurs can sell these lighting solutions. My favourite part of the job is to advertise and teach how to use solar lamps.

loans.use: To buy stock of micro-solar lighting kits from Barefoot Power.

loans.name: Yayah

texts.en: Yawah, 31, is married with four children and they all live in compound #3. Her children attend school and they are between the ages of 4 and 21. For the  past thirteen years Yawah has been selling goods in the local market, like body cream, bath soap, hair grease and shampoo. She sells six days a week and makes lots of profit when she sells. She uses the profit to improve the business. She is requesting a loan to purchase more body creams, bath soap and other items for the business. Her future plan is to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more body creams, bath soap and other items for the business.

loans.name: Ntizoguta Group

texts.fr:
Aline fait partie du groupe Ntizoguta, elle habite à Gitega. Elle a 37 ans et est mariée à Ernest,  un photographe.  Ensemble ils ont 2 enfants dont 1 étudie.

Elle  fait le commerce de boutique (haricot, sel, riz,…) depuis 9 ans.

Elle est à son septième  crédit à  Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité d’articles de sa boutique(haricot, sel, riz,…) , à revendre pour gagner plus.
texts.en:
Aline is a member of the Ntizoguta group and lives in Gitega. She is 37 years old and married to Ernest, a photographer. The couple have 2 children together, one of whom attends school.

Aline has run a shop - selling products like beans, salt and rice - for 9 years. This is her 7th loan with Turame. Her Kiva-sponsored loan will increase her capital and allow her to buy a large number of items (e.g. beans, salt, rice, etc.) so that she can resell them in her shop and earn more.

loans.use: to buy a large number of items for resale in her shop (beans, salt, rice, etc.).

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith, 32, lives in Compound #3 with her husband. She has five children between the ages of five and twelve and all are in school. Her husband is a businessman. 

She has been selling dishes for the past ten years. She will use the loan given to her to buy more dishes for the business. She learnt to sell from her mother. She is proud of her business because she is able to help her husband with the home. She is requesting a loan to purchase more dishes (bowls, cups) and other items such as baby tubs, soap and spoons for her business.

Her plan for the future is to educate her children and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more dishes and other items for her business.

loans.name: Ayaba Clarisse

texts.fr: Agée de 38 ans, Ayaba Clarisse est mariée et mère de trois enfants dont deux sont scolarisés. Elle a une boutique de vente de produits alimentaires et divers depuis des annéess ans et se ravitaille dans l'un des marchés de la place.Ayaba Clarisse  veut s'acheter des sacs de riz, des boîtes de conserve, de l'huile végétale et des cousse-cousses. En vue de répondre à la demande de sa clientèle et de satisfaire les besoins de leurs enfants (poursuite de la scolarité), elle a sollicité et a obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev.
texts.en:
The 38-year-old Ayaba Clarisse is married and the mother of 3 children, 2 of whom attend school. She has run a general store selling foodstuffs and various other products for several years and gets her supplies at one of her local markets.

Ayaba Clarisse would like to buy some sacs of rice and some boxes of canned goods, vegetable oil and couscous. She has therefore requested and received a microcredit loan from Finadev in order to be able to fulfil her customer demand and meet the needs of her children (pay for their continued schooling).

loans.use: to buy 10 x 25kg sacs of rice, 2 boxes of canned goods, 1 box of vegetable oil and 1 box of couscous.

loans.name: Al-Njah Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Njah. It consists of four members Fathiah, Badriah, Sabah and Hana. All of them are hardworking ladies. They took a loan of 200,000 YER. 

Badriah is 42 years old and lives in Taiz, Yemen. She is the one who is seated in the photo. She is married with four children. She sells incenses and perfumes to her customers who are her neighbors and friends. She has had this business for three years. She is professional in making incense and so her customers are comfortable with her. She requested a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to buy materials to make incense and perfumes for for her business.

She hopes to improve her business to offer good life for her family.

loans.use: to buy materials to make incense and perfumes.

loans.name: Raha Group

texts.en:
Regina, who is in her early 50s, is married with three children. Two of them go to school, one is still small. She has had a business selling chicken (layers and local chicken) for 20 years now. She works from 6.00 am to 6.00 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be her 2nd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to buy chicken feed and pay household expenses, and has paid back her loan successfully. She wants a loan to buy more chicks. Her dream is to one day own an incubator for her to sell chicks.

Regina will share this loan with her loan group "Raha" which has a total of 15 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more chicks.

loans.name: Iulia

texts.en:
Iulia is 31 years old and married with four children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for two years. 

Iulia has requested a loan to buy flour, sugar, baking powder and dripping oil for her business. She joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to capital. Iulia will use the profit from her earnings to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, baking powder and dripping oil.

loans.name: Phan

texts.en:
Phan is 51 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in an agricultural business for more than twenty years, has an extensive experience and is successful in her career. She is involved in growing rice and fattening up animals. Approximately, she earns $4 per day. Her husband runs a business purchasing mouldboard ploughs which are made of wood to resell. He earns about $4 per day. One of her children is employed in Thailand and earns about $7 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Phan is requesting a loan of $1,100 to purchase cattle to resell. By doing so, she will generate additional income to support her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to resell.

loans.name: Jeanne's Group

texts.fr: Il s'agit d'un groupe de deux personnes en caution solidaire. Jeanne, la responsable, est agée de 47 ans. Elle est mariée et mère d'un enfant scolarisé. Jeanne a un dépôt où elle commercialise les produits de la SOBEBRA et un peu de céréales depuis 03 ans. Elle s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. En vue de répondre à la demande de sa clientèle et de satisfaire les besoins de son enfant, Jeanne a sollicité et a obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev. Jeanne se retrouve à gauche de la photo.
texts.en:
Jeanne's group is a solidarity group made up of 2 people. Jeanne, the leader of the group, is 47 years old. She is married and the mother of one child who is educated. Jeanne owns a warehouse from which she has sold Sobebra products and some cereals for 3 years. She gets her supplies at one of Benin's markets.

With a view to being able to fulfil customer demand and meet her child's needs, Jeanne has requested and received a microcredit loan from Finadev. Jeanne is on the left of the photo.

loans.use: to buy 8 cases of sweets, 5 cases of beers, 1 sac of rice and 1 sac of beans.

loans.name: Meour

texts.en:
Meour is 39 years old. She is married and blessed with two children who live with her in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in cultivating agricultural crops for more than ten years, earning approximately $3 per day. Her husband runs a business buying cattle to resell. He earns about $5 per day. One of her children is a garment worker who earns about $4 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Meour is requesting a loan of $750 to purchase an ox for a crossbreeding service. This money will help her acquire the security to start the new business and earn more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her house to make it bigger and more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase an ox for her crossbreeding service.

loans.name: Djiguéne Bakhna 38 Group

texts.fr:
Djiguéne Bakhna 38 est une association de développement regroupant 5 membres et est située à environ 22 km de la ville principale. Cette association de femmes s’active dans la vente de fruits. Elle est dirigée par Mme Ndèye mariée et mère de famille.
Mme Ndèye demande ce crédit pour acheter et  revendre  des fruits (mangues, oranges, clémentines) selon les périodes .Elle pratique cette activité depuis plus de 5 ans.  
Avec les bénéfices, elle pourra aider son mari pour la dépense quotidienne de la maison. Mme Ndèye veut un jour  ouvrir un magasin de tissus pour diversifier son commerce et aussi améliorer les conditions alimentaires de la famille.
texts.en:
"Djiguéne Bakhna 38" is a development association which groups together 5 members and is located about 22 kilometres from the main town. This association of women is involved in the sale of fruit and the group's leader is Ndèye, who is married and a mother.

Ndèye is requesting this loan so that she can buy some fruit (mangoes, oranges and clementines) for seasonal resale. She has been in this line of work for over 5 years. The profits will enable her to support her husband with the daily household expenses. Ndèye would like to diversify her business and one day open a shop selling fabrics, and she would like to improve her family's food conditions.

loans.use: to buy fruit (mangoes, oranges and clementines) for resale.

loans.name: Phal

texts.en:
Phal is 37 years old. He is married and blessed with five children. They live in Takeo Province, Cambodia. He has been running a business purchasing mats, carpets, pillows and quilts to resell for more than two years, earning approximately $10 per day. His wife is involved in cultivating rice and fattening up pigs. In addition, she is involved weaving hammocks to sell. Approximately, she earns $4 per day. All of his children are still in their care. 

In order to improve his family’s finances, Phal is requesting a loan of $1,300 to raise capital to purchase more mats, carpets, pillows and quilts to resell. By doing so, he will earn more income to support the family. In the future, he would like to purchase a small truck to use to carry his goods to sell. He would also like to help his children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, he hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase more mats, carpets, pillows and quilts to resell.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes es una mujer de 58 años, actualmente vive con su grupo familiar, es una mujer trabajadora, que siempre dentro de sus sueños ha sido salir  adelante para darle lo mejor a sus hijos, es humilde y muy emprendedora siempre buscando realizar lo mejor. En la zona donde reside mercedes es muy conocida por su manera de ser con los demás, buscando siempre hacer el bien. Ella es empleada domestica es decir lava, plancha, cocina y aparte de  las labores domésticas, cosecha maíz, frijol, maicillo, entre otros, es una mujer que con tal que sus hijos salgan adelante hace lo imposible para ellos, Con el fin de mejorar sus entradas económicas mercedes se acerco a INTEGRAL,  para solicitar un crédito y comprar insumos agrícolas como semillas, abonos, fertilizantes entre otros y a su vez entregarles un mejor futuro a sus hijos
texts.en: Mercedes is a 58 year old woman. She lives with her family. She is a hardworking woman who has always dreamed of getting ahead to give her children the best. She is humble and enterprising and always seeking to do the best. In the area where she lives Mercedes is very well known for the way she treats others and seeks to do good. She is a doemstic employee which means she washes, irons, and cooks. Aside from the domestic work she plants corn, beans, and maicillo, among other things. She is a woman who in order to get her children ahead will do the impossible. In order to improve her finances Mercedes went to INTEGRAL to ask for a loan and to buy agricultural materials such as seeds, fertilizers and more, so that she can give her children a better future.

loans.use: to buy agricultural materials such as seeds, fertilizers and more.

loans.name: Henriette Baïvi

texts.fr: Henriette Baïvi est mariée et mère d'1 enfant âgé de 19 ans scolarisé. Elle vend des produits de la SOBEBRA depuis 05 ans. Elle se ravitaille à la SOBEBRA. Ses clients sont des hommes et des femmes. Henriette Baïvi veut s'acheter des casiers de sucrerie, de bière et de l'eau minérale. Henriette Baï veut augmenter son capital avec le financement. Aussi elle voudrait qu'avec les marges bénéficiaire, son enfant puisse poursuivre les études universitaires.
texts.en:
Henriette Baïvi is married and the mother of a 19-year-old child, who is attending school. She has been selling Sobebra ("Société Béninoise De Brasseries", the Beninese society of brasseries) products for 5 years. She gets her supplies from Sobebra. Her customers are men and women.

Henriette Baïvi would like to increase her capital with this loan; she would like to buy some cases of sweets, beer and mineral water. She would also like to use her profit margin to enable her child to pursue university studies.

loans.use: to buy 25 cases of sweets, 15 cases of beer, and 3 dozen cases of mineral water.

loans.name: Abner Otoniel

texts.es: Abner Otoniel  de 41 años de edad, es un hombre honrado, y honesto, vive con su familia en una casa  propia, desde pequeño aprendió a cultivar maíz, frijoles, y diversos cultivos básicos, es por eso que en la actualidad se dedica al cultivo del maíz y sorgo.  Siempre ha buscado realizar bien su trabajo, de la mejor manera para que nunca haga falta la comida en su casa, mucho menos que a sus hijos les haga falta algo. Abner ha tenido complicaciones con las cosechas pasadas debido a muchas lluvias y plagas que no han dejado que los cultivos den frutos, y es por eso que se acerco a  INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual, le permita comprar insumos agrícolas como semillas, abonos, fertizantes y otros para asistir oportunamente sus cultivos. Abner esta con la plena confianza que con la ayuda recibida tendrá mejores cosechas y podrá realizar su sueño y a su vez pagar la deuda adquirida.
texts.en: Abner Otoniel  is 41 years old. He is an honorable and honest man. He lives with his family in their own home. He learned how to plant corn, beans and other basic crops when he was little. That is why now he grows corn and sorghum. He has always done his job well in the best way so that there is never a lack of food in his house, and even more so his children will never lack for anything. Abner has had complications with previous crops because of heavy rains and pests that haven't allowed his crops to bear fruit. That is why he has gone to INTEGRAL to ask for a loan. This will allow him to buy agricultural materials such as seeds, fertilizer and more to help his crops in a timely manner. Abner is confident that with the help he receives he will have better crops and be able to make his dream come true and also pay off his acquired debt.

loans.use: to buy agricultural materials such as seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural materials such as fertilizers, seeds and insecticides.

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en: Cecelia is 43 years old and lives in Buchanan with her husband, who is a fisherman. She has six children who are between the ages of 6 and 25; three are attending school and all of them live at home. She has been selling fish in the market for the past 20 years. She says some problems she faces are when her husband does not have partner to go fishing and also the process of drying the fish. She is proud of her business because she earns her own money and helps her children. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fishing nets and hooks to improve their business. Her plan for the future is to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more fishing nets and hooks to improve their business

loans.name: Rachal Y.

texts.en: Rachel lives in Buchanan and she is a high school graduate. She is married with two children between the aged of 5 and 14 that are in school and live at home. For the past five years she has been involved in business, and currently she is operating a salon in her community. She says she enjoys the business because of the way her customers wait after one another (the flow of her customers). Some customers refuse to dress their hair in another salon because she is the best hairdresser, they say. She started this business with money given to her by her mother. She is requesting a loan to purchase more hair spray, artificial hair, hair grease, and other items for her business. Her dream is to expand her salon and attend university.

loans.use: to purchase more hair spray, artificial hair, hair grease, and other items for her business

loans.name: Meadea

texts.en: Meadea is single with two children. The older one is 5 and the younger one is 2 year old. Her children are not in school. They have been living in compound #3 for the past eight years. She has been selling slippers in the local market. She sells children slippers for both boys and girls. She is requesting a loan to purchase more slippers for the business which will enable her to educate her children. Her plans are to expand her business and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more slippers for her business

loans.name: Djiguéne Bakhna 39 Group

texts.fr:
Djiguéne Bakhna 39 est une association de développement  composé de  5 membres, elle se situe  à environ 22 km de  la ville principale. Cette association s’active dans l’achat et la revente de légumes, elle est dirigée par Mme Mame K. mariée et mère de famille.
 Mme Mame  K. achète et revend des  fruits selon les périodes (mangues, clémentines, oranges, pastèques) depuis plus de 5 ans .Elle demande ce crédit pour acheter et revendre ces mêmes produits.
 Les bénéfices lui permettront  d’appuyer  son mari sur les dépenses quotidiennes de la maison. Mme Mame K .veut dans le future  ouvrir un magasin de fruits témoin.
texts.en:
"Djiguéne Bakhna 39" is a development association which groups together 5 members and is located about 22 kilometres from the main town. This association is involved in the buying and selling of fruit. The group's leader is Mame K., who is married and mother.

Mame K. has been buying fruit (mangoes, clementines, oranges and watermelons) according to the seasons for over 5 years. She is requesting this loan so that she can continue buying and selling the same produce. The profits will allow her to support her husband with the daily household expenses. She would one day like to open a shop selling organic fruit.

loans.use: to buy fruit (mangoes, clementines, oranges and watermelons).

loans.name: Diomedes

texts.en:
Diomedes is 59 years old and is married with seven children. Diomedes is recognized as a responsible person with her family. She involved herself in managing their rice field. She has been in her business for 30 years and she usually earns a net profit of PHP 20,000 every crop season.

Right now, Diomedes is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 27,000 to buy fertilizers, rice seeds and insecticides to sustain her rice farmland. Diomedes hopes to harvest more rice and earn more profit to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, rice seeds and insecticides to sustain her rice farmland

loans.name: Severino

texts.en:
Severino is 50 years old and is married with three children. He has been energetically farming in the village where they are living for over 20 years. His farm produces almost 25,000 PHP with every harvest. His wife also sells vegetable for their additional income. They both work hard to give their children a good quality of life. 

Now Severino has requested a loan of 20,000 PHP from ASKI to buy seedlings, fertilizers and insecticides for his rice field. Severino hopes to grow his business and harvest more rice to sell. He expects major changes in his family’s living standard.

loans.use: to buy seedlings, fertilizers and insecticides for his rice field

loans.name: Sopheap

texts.en:
Sopheap is 34 years old. She is married and resides with a child and a brother in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been selling groceries and breeding pigs for more than two years, earning approximately $8 per day. Her husband runs a taxi service (motor taxi). He earns about $5 per day.

 Due to lack of funds, Sopheap is requesting a loan of $1500 to purchase piglets and fodder to use for breeding pigs. This money will help her expand her business and earn more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her child earn a bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase piglets and fodder to use for breeding pigs

loans.name: Shirly

texts.en:
Shirly is 38 years old and is married with two school-aged children. To make a living, Shirly owns and operates a farming business together with her husband. Her main source of income comes from planting and harvesting rice for sale. Shirly has been engaged in her business for over ten years and earns approximately 25,000 PHP every season (every four months). She is also engaged in a hog-raising business for their additional income. 

Shirly needs both sources of income in order to cover the family's daily needs and to afford sending her children to school. She would like to request a loan in the amount of PHP 25,000 in order to buy seeds, insecticides, and fertilizers for her rice farm production. She hopes that she will make more improvements in her business through this loan, and hopes that her patience and sacrifices will lead her to reach her goals in the future.

loans.use: to buy seeds, insecticides, and fertilizers for her rice farm production

loans.name: Sour

texts.en: Sour is 68 years old. She is widowed and resides with two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been making brooms to resell for more than seven years, earning approximately $3 per day. Her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $7 per day. Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Sour is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the  money saved on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Samneang

texts.en:
Samneang is 26 years old. He is married and resides with two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. He has been running a business purchasing junk materials to resell for more than seven years, earning approximately $10 per day. His wife is a garment worker who earns about $3 per day. 

In order to improve his family’s finances, Samneang is requesting a loan of $800 to purchase mechanical tools to run a repair shop. This money will help him acquire the security to start up the new business and earn more income to support the family. In the future, he would like to build a new house and help his children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase mechanical tools to run the repair shop

loans.name: Seum

texts.en: Seum is 52 years old. She is widowed and resides with five children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $17 per day. Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Seum is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the money saved on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to purchase piglets to breed in order to generate more income to support the family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Trinidad  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Trinidad está formado por 10 socias quienes viven por lugares aledaños a la parroquia de Turi en Cuenca, esta parroquia es muy reconocida por ser el mirador de la ciudad de Cuenca ya que se puede observar gran parte de la ciudad, existen varios lugares para disfrutar de la gastronomía y pasar momentos amenos, su gente es hospitalaria y amable como nuestras socias, quienes laboran en diferentes actividades como la agricultura, cría de animales y muchos laboran en la ciudad ejerciendo diferentes actividades, las que le permiten aportar a la economía de sus hogares y sacar adelante a sus familias, se caracterizan también porque aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos. 

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Claudia, tiene 34 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 7 hijos de 15, 11, 8, 7, 5, 4 y 3 años de edad, su primera hija estudia en el colegio y sus cuatro hijos siguientes en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo labora en el área de la construcción como albañil, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

Doña Claudia se dedica al cuidado de su hogar, pero también labora realizando la limpieza en una casa y labrando terrenos ajenos cuando le llaman. En su casa cría cuyes, cerdos y pollos. 

Este es el primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal  y lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y cuyes. 

Sus metas son sacar a sus hijos adelante y cada día mejorar el criadero de animales.

En la foto se encuentran las 10 socias más dos niñas en brazos de sus mamás y una jovencita con una chompa verde con rosado a cuadros que es hija de una de las socias.
texts.en:
The 'Trinidad' community bank has 10 members who live in areas neighboring Turi parish in Cuenca.  This parish is very well known for being the viewpoint of the city of Cuenca because you can see a large part of the city from there.  There are a number of places where people can enjoy the local cuisine and spend pleasant moments.  The locals are hospitable and friendly, as are our members who work in different business activities such as farming and livestock raising.  Some also work in the city in different jobs.  This allows them to contribute towards their households and provide for their families.  They are known for maintaining the culture and traditions of their people.

One of the members of this group is Claudia.  Claudia is 34 years old, married, and has seven children who are 15, 11, 8, 7, 5, 4 and 3 years old.  Her eldest daughter attends high school and the next four attend elementary school in the town.  He husband works as a builder.  They own their own home.

Claudia takes care of her home but also works cleaning somebody else's house and laboring on other people's land when they need it.  At home she raises guinea pigs, pigs and chickens.

This is Claudia's first loan as a member of her community bank and she will invest it in buying chickens and guinea pigs.  Her goals are to provide for her children and to some day improve her animal farm.  

The ten women who belong to this group can be seen in the photo.  There are also two little girls in their moms' arms and a young woman wearing a green and pink checked jacket who is the daughter of one of the members.

loans.use: to buy chickens and guinea pigs

loans.name: Vicky

texts.en:
Vicky, age 34, lives in the village of Luzon with her husband and two school-aged children. To earn a living, Vicky owns and operates a farming business. Her main source of income comes from planting and harvesting rice for sale. She has been engaged in her business for more than 10 years and earns approximately 20,000 PHP every crop season. 

Vicky needs this business as a source of income in order to provide for her family's daily needs. Right now she would like to request a loan in the amount of 20,000 PHP in order to purchase seeds, insecticides and fertilizers for her farming business.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, insecticides and fertilizers for her farming business.

loans.name: Francisco Jeronimo

texts.es: Francisco de 41 años vive en casa propia con su madre de 76 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador, alegre, colaborador, atento, responsable, que tiene sueños y aspiraciones desea salir adelante por él y su mamá. Desde hace un tiempo posee una tienda, donde vende productos de primera necesidad como lo son: huevos, leche, frijol, arroz, azúcar entre otros. Francisco por su manera de atender es muy cortes, educado y los clientes prefieren ir a su tienda, posee gran clientela y se ha hecho de muy buenos conocidos que siempre lo prefieren, él desea ampliar su negocio es decir comprar mas insumos y cereales para tener la tienda mas surtida y es por eso que se acerco a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y comprar cereales, huevos, leche, pasta dental, aceite u otros. Tiene la plena seguridad que con la ayuda brindada y los clientes que posee lograra saldar la cuenta antes de lo acordado. Y sobre todo nunca faltara el sustento en su casa, y su mamá se sentirá orgullosa de él.
texts.en:
Francisco is 41 years old and lives in his own home together with his 76-year-old mother.  He is a hard-working, cheerful, cooperative, attentive, responsible man with dreams and aspirations.  He would like to do well in life for his own sake as well as that of his mom.

Francisco has owned a store for some time now.  He sells basic household product such as eggs, milk, beans, rice, sugar, etc.  He is very polite and well-mannered when he serves his customers and so they prefer to shop in his store.  He has a large number of customers who prefer to shop with him.  Francisco would like to expand his business, buying more supplies and cereals so that his store is better stocked.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy cereals, eggs, milk, toothpaste, oil, etc.  He is completely certain that, with the help he is receiving and the customers he has, he will be able to repay his loan ahead of schedule.  Above all, his household will never lack the basics and his mom will feel proud of him.

loans.use: to buy cereals, eggs, milk, toothpaste, oil, etc.

loans.name: Maun

texts.en:
Maun is 43 years old. She is married and blessed with two children. She and her family live in Takeo, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for more than three years, earning approximately $5 per day. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $4 per day. 

Maun wants to build a new house. With this goal in mind, Maun is requesting a loan of $1,200 to purchase timber to use for building her house. This money will help her provide better living conditions for her family. 

In the future, Maun would like to start a grocery-store business out of her home and help her children pursue higher education.

loans.use: to purchase timber to use for building her house.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.en:
Alejandro is 63 years old and married with five adult-aged children. Alejandro is a farmer in the Philippines. He earns PHP 20,000 per harvest. 

Alejandro is asking for a loan of PHP 30,000 to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other products for his farming business. Alejandro has been growing rice for 35 years. 

In the future, Alejandro hopes that his farming business will be more progressive and enable him to support the needs of his family.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other products for farming.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is a 56-year-old married woman with four grown-up children. She is very hard-working mother so that she can secure all the needs of her family. 

Rebecca has managed a farm for ten years. She plans to expand her business and she is requesting a loan of PHP 14,000 to buy seed and fertilizer for her farm to be able to cover the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer for her farm business

loans.name: Reith

texts.en:
Reith is 48 years old. She is married and blessed with three children in Takeo, Cambodia. She has been involved in cultivating rice and fattening animals for more than 20 years, earning approximately $2 per day. Her husband is a chef who earns about $5 per day. Two of her children are employed at a garment factory. They earn about $8 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Reith is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the money saved on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to run a pig farm and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.en:
Tomas, age 44, is a rice farmer. He and his wife have a rice field that serves as their primary source of income. His wife also engages in a hog-raising business to earn extra income. They work hard to lift their two children from their poor standard of living. The family lives in the village of Luzon.

Tomas is requesting a loan of 20,000 PHP to buy farm inputs such as seedlings, fertilizers and insecticides to sustain his farm. He hopes that he can receive the amount he has requested to further grow his farm and harvest more rice to offer for sale.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as seedlings, fertilizers and insecticides to sustain his farm.

loans.name: Lucas

texts.en: A very diligent and loving father of two adult-aged children, Lucas, together with his spouse Sylvia, has managed a farm for 12 years in order to have  income to cover the needs of his family. He is requesting a loan amounting to PHP 15,000 to buy fertilizer and rice seed for his farm business. Lucas dreams that he might be able to renovate his house for their convenient living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and rice seed for his farm business

loans.name: Sam Art

texts.en: Sam Art is 39 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been selling food for more than ten years, earning approximately 3 USD per day. Her husband sells vegetables and earns about 5 USD per day. One of her children is a construction worker who earns about 3 USD per day. Due to her family's difficulty with transportation, Sam Art is requesting a loan of 1,300 USD to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she plans to build a new kitchen and bathroom.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Flordeliza

texts.en:
Flordeliza is in the farming business. She has grown rice crops since 1973. She is now 59 years of age, married and has three children. All of them are married and living separately from her. She works tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to expand her farmland area and to save some amount for emergency purposes when she and her husband get weak.

Flordeliza is raising rice crops on her eight hectares of farmland. With this amount of farmland, she needs greater profits to buy necessary farm inputs for the land's processing to obtain plentiful yields this crops season. So, she is applying for PHP 27,000. She knows that through this loan amount she can be a successful owner and farmer some day.

loans.use: to buy necessary farm inputs for her farming business.

loans.name: Reith

texts.en:
Reith is 43 years old. She is widowed and resides with her mother and her sister in Takeo Province, Cambodia. 

She has been working in a garment factory for more than four years, earning approximately $4 per day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Reith is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase clothes to resell. By doing so, she would be able to generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to resell.

loans.name: Teodora Beatriz

texts.es: Teodora Beatriz de 30 años vive con su familia, su esposo y dos hijos; su esposo es cobrador de microbuses de transporte público, Teodora mientras con su trabajo se esmera para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y darles un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Actualmente se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol. Es una mujer trabajadora dedicada a su familia, siempre teniendo en cuenta que no hay nada mejor para ella que el futuro de sus hijos. Ya que el sueldo que su esposo gana no alcanza para cubrir las necesidades del hogar,  ella se preocupa de realizar trabajos día a día. Teodora busca la manera de ser emprendedora y siente que a su cosecha le hace falta más, es por eso que decidió buscar ayuda en INTEGRAL para comprar insumos Agrícolas, ella desea tener las mejores cosechas, y a su vez generar ganancias vendiendo el maíz, frijol, maicillo entre otros. Tiene la confianza que recibirá la ayuda y que cuando haya tiempo de cosechar tendrá las mejores de la zona.
texts.en: Teodora Beatriz is 30 years old and lives together with her husband and two children.  Her husband works as a bus conductor on public transport microbuses.  Teodora works to support her husband with the household expenses and offer her children a better future.  She is currently growing corn and beans.  Teodora is a hard-working woman who is devoted to her family.  There is nothing more important to her than her children's future.  As her husband's wage isn't enough to cover their household expenses, Teodora works every day.  She is looking for ways to be entrepreneurial and feels that her harvest could be better.  For this reason, she decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL to buy farming supplies.  She would like to experience better harvests and make profits selling corn, beans, sorghum etc.  She is confident that she will receive help and that, when harvest season comes around, she will have the best harvest in her area.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies such as seeds, manure, fertilizers, pesticides etc.

loans.name: Vivencia

texts.en:
Vivencia is a caring woman and the mother of three children. Two are Overseas Filipino Workers and one is married. She is widower who works hard to provide good living conditions for her family.

Vivencia has been involved in agricultural for 35 years. She grows rice on her one hectare of farmland and corn crops on her other hectare of farmland. The profits gained from her farming business were used to educate her three children and some was used for her hog-raising business.

She plans to buy fertilizer and insecticides for her crops but she suffers from a shortage of funds due to the high cost of basic commodities and the high price of the farm inputs needed in processing her farming business. So she is applying for a loan of PHP 27,000. She knows that this amount will help her in obtaining plentiful yields this next crop season.

In the future, she hopes to improve her hog-raising business to be able to increase her income, which will serve as her savings for emergency purposes when she gets weak.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and insecticide to improve the growth of her crops.

loans.name: Hedaya

texts.en: Hedaya is a 22-year-old single lady who has seven siblings. Hedaya is a very active person. She travels a lot from the capital to Aqaba to bring goods such as blankets and clothes, where she can find them there at a good price or in the wholesale market, then she sells those goods at a higher price back where she lives. Now Hedaya has applied for this youth loan to bring a larger quantity of goods from the free zone market.

loans.use: to bring a larger quantity of goods from the free zone market

loans.name: Hayat

texts.en:
Hayat is a 48-year-old married woman. She is caring for 5 sons and daughters.

Hayat has been in the clothing sales business for 3 years now. She has already made regular customers and is depending on the word of mouth for her business to expand. She has applied for this loan to get more summer clothes.

loans.use: to get more summer clothes

loans.name: Saroeurn

texts.en:
Saroeurn is 61 years old. He is married and resides with four children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. He has been a carpenter for more than 20 years, earning approximately $3 per day. His wife is running a business of selling sweet A Kor cake. She earns about $2 per day. Two of his children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $6 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in his family’s transportation, Saroeurn is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable him to use the money saved on transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, he would like to expand his wife’s business and help his children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, he hopes to rebuild their kitchen.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Reith

texts.en:
Reith is 36 years old. He is married and resides with two children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. He has been producing Tro (Khmer stringed instrument similar to a violin; it has two strings and is played with a bow) to sell for more than seven years, earning approximately 9 USD per day. His wife helps him run the business. 

In order to improve his business, Reith is requesting a loan of 1,200 USD to purchase more tools to use for producing Tro to sell. This money will help him expand his business and earn more money to support the family. In the future, he would like to rebuild his present house to make it more comfortable for his family and help his children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase more tools to use for producing Tro sell

loans.name: Soeurn

texts.en:
Soeurn is 40 years old. She is married and resides with four children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. 

She has been selling vegetables and rice for more than ten years, earning approximately $4 per day. Her husband is a teacher who earns about $4 per day. Two of her children are employed. They earn about $6 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Soeurn is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the money saved on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Chork

texts.en:
Chork is 32 years old. He is married and blessed with three children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. His children are still in his care.

He and his wife are construction workers. They earn about $10 per day. Due to the difficulty in his family’s transportation, Chork is requesting a loan of $400 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable him to use the money saved on his transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, he would like to expand his business to be the construction foreman and help his children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, he plans to build a concrete house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Macaria

texts.en:
Macaria runs a small store selling grocery items to the people in her village. Her customers are mostly her neighbors who are looking for the affordable prices she offers. She earns about 8,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) each month from her store.
