She would like to earn more profits from her business, which is why she is asking for additional capital of 18,000 PHP to buy merchandise to sell in her store. She will buy canned good, biscuits, noodles and shampoo to sell. This will help increase sales capacity and will increase her profits too. 

Macaria is now 39 years old, married and has four children attending school. She hopes to keep offering good service and affordable prices to her customers so that she will earn more income and be able to pay her children's school fees. She hopes her children will become professionals someday.

loans.use: to buy canned good, biscuits, noodles and shampoo to sell

loans.name: Jarkynaiym

texts.ru: Жаркынайым 61 год. Жаркынайым на протяжении 20 лет занимается разведением скота, служащим  основным источником дохода для ее семьи. Начав этот бизнес с суммы 5,000 сом, использованную на покупку 2 голов рогатого скота, на сегодняшний  день  Жаркынайым имеет в хозяйстве уже 8  коров. Ежемесячный доход от хозяйства составляет сумму около 20,000 сом. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Жаркынайым обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота для откорма и перепродажи.  Доходы от кредита Жаркынайым планирует вложить в увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en:
Jarkynaiym is 61 years old. For the past 20 years, she has been raising livestock, thereby providing the main source of income for her family. After starting her business with 5,000 som to buy 2 animals, Jarkynaiym has expanded it and currently keeps 8 cows. Her monthly profits amount to roughly 20,000 som.

In order to continue developing her business, Jarkynaiym has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to purchase livestock for fattening and resale. She plans to invest her profits from this loan into further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Soeurn

texts.en:
Soeurn is 45 years old. She is widowed and resides with five children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Three of her children are employed. They earn about $14 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Soeurn is requesting a loan of $1,300 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the money saved on her transportation expenses to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to run the agricultural business of cultivating vegetables to sell and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her house to make it bigger and more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Bilal

texts.en:
Bilal is a 24-year-old single man who has two older brothers.

Bilal worked in a well known supermarket. Using his experience there, he opened a small market in his neighborhood to start making his own money from his own business.

He has applied for this youth loan to fill his store with more goods and food products.

loans.use: to fill his store with more goods and food products.

loans.name: Alwafa Group

texts.en:
This group is called Alwafa which consists of the four members Hayah, Amnh, Khamisa and Saeedh who are ladies and operate different businesses. They live in Aden, Yemen. They requested a loan of 180,000 Yemeni Rial (YER). 

Khamisa is 52 years old, a married woman (she is the second woman from the right in the photo). She has six children. She describes herself as honest, trustworthy, and courteous. She sells fruits and tea. She has been involved in this business for 15 years and her primary customers are local residents. 

She is applying for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to purchase tea, bananas, apples, etc. for resale. Her business goal is to run it well and she hopes that in the future she will be a wholesaler.

loans.use: to purchase tea, bananas, apples…etc for resale

loans.name: Ysmael

texts.es: Ysmael de 66 años vive con su esposa y con sus 8 hijos, tiene 4 hijos mayores de edad que le ayudan un poco en la agricultura y en las siembras, mientras los otros 4 estudian, viven en casa propia. Posee una forma y manera de ser muy atenta hacia los demás, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 35 años, es decir a la siembra de maíz, frijol, por su forma de ser Ysmael es muy conocido en la zona donde residencia es muy responsable. Siempre a buscado un mejor futuro para su familia y siempre lo ha logrado es por eso que hoy decidió pedir un crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar insumos agrícolas para su siembra de maíz como lo son: Semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas y otros. Esta muy feliz de haber tomado esta decisión, ya que ello garantiza que las cosechas que tendrá este año serán de éxito y lograra su sueño que es que a su casa no falte el pan de cada día, y además se compromete a saldar la deuda esperando que sea antes de lo acordado.
texts.en:
Ysmael is 66 years old and lives together with his wife and eight children.  Four of his children are adults and help him a little with his farming and sowing.  The other four are in school.  They live in their own home.  Ysmael is very attentive towards other people.  He has been farming for 35 years, growing corn and beans.  He is very well known in his area and is very responsible.  He is always looking to provide a better future for his family and he has always achieved this.

Ysmael has decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL to buy farming supplies for sowing his corn such as: seeds, manure, fertilizers, pesticides, etc.  He is very happy to have taken this decision because it will guarantee that this year's harvests are successful and he will be able to fulfill his dream of ensuring that his family do not lack the basics.  He pledges to make his loan repayment on time and even hopes that he will be able to do so before the scheduled repayment date.

loans.use: to buy basic supplies such as seeds, manure, fertilizers and pesticides

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is a 36-year-old married woman with two young children. She is married to Marcelo, who is her partner in managing their small business. She sells fruits and vegetables to the people in her village. The couple uses the motorcycle taken from this photo to transport their products from the nearby villages and offer fruits and vegetables. They have been doing it for eight years and earn about 10,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP). 

Virginia is now applying for a loan of 17,000 PHP to buy cabbages, tomatoes, eggplant and string beans to sell. This will help increase her sales and profits too. 

Someday, Virginia hopes to keep making better sales so that she can bring her family out of poverty.

loans.use: to buy cabbages, tomatoes, eggplant and string beans to sell

loans.name: Nilda

texts.en:
Nilda lives at her small house at Estefania with her spouse and four children. Her spouse is a farmer while she is a vendor selling grocery items to the people in her village. She has been doing this for over five years now and earns approximately 7,000 Philippine Peso (PHP) each month which goes for their meals and daily expenses of their children. 

She is looking for the development of her small business so she is asking for additional capital of 17,000 PHP to buy eggs, vinegar, cooking oil, sugar and biscuits to sell. 

With good income from the business, she hopes to continuously pay for her children's education. She will be very happy and proud to see them working as professionals some day.

loans.use: to buy eggs, vinegar, cooking oil, sugar and biscuits to sell

loans.name: Olivia

texts.en:
Olivia is a 42-year-old married woman who has two children. Aside from selling dried fish to the people in her village, she also raises hogs and re-sells them for profit. From her businesses, she earns about 10,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP). It goes for their meals and school fees of her children. 

Olivia is now borrowing a loan of 12,000 PHP to further improve her hog-raising business. She will buy hog feed and medicines for sustainability. This will help ensure healthier hogs and allow her to soon sell them at a good price. Olivia also promises to pay back her loan in full. 

Someday, Olivia hopes to strengthen her sales leading to economic stability and become a successful businesswoman too.

loans.use: to buy hog feed and medicines for sustainability

loans.name: Djiguéne Bakhna 40 Group

texts.fr:
Djiguéne Bakhna 40 est une association de femmes au développement comptant 5 membres s’activant dans l’achat et la revente de légumes, et est située à environ 22 km de la ville principale. Elle est dirigée par Mme Astou mariée et mère de famille.
Mme Astou achète et revend des légumes (choux, aubergines, carottes, maniocs) depuis plus de 10 ans, elle demande ce crédit pour mener à bien cette activité et les bénéfices générés l’aideront à appuyer son mari aux besoins quotidiennes de la maison .Mme Astou veut augmenter son pouvoir d’achat pour satisfaire la demande.
texts.en:
Djiguéne Bakhna 40, an association for the empowerment of women, is made up of 5 members who are active in buying and selling vegetables, and is located about 22 km from the main town. The association is led by Astou, who is both a wife and a mother.

Astou has been buying and reselling vegetables (cabbage, eggplant, carrots, manioc) for over ten years now. She is seeking this loan to help her successfully run her business, and the profits earned will help her to support her husband in taking care of the daily household needs. Astou wishes to increase her purchasing power in order to meet demand.

loans.use: to buy vegetables (cabbage, eggplant, carrots, manioc) to resell individually

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
Zenaida is a responsible and helpful mother. She is married to a farmer and sometimes helps her spouse with his farming activities. Aside from their farming business, Zenaida sells dried fish to the people in her village. She goes down to the market once a week to purchase dried fish and sells them to the people in her village at a profit.

Zenaida is 36 years old, married, and has two children who are attending school. She would like to keep her business profitable, so she is asking for a loan of PHP 13,000 to buy more dried fish to sell. 

Zenaida hopes to earn a good profit from her business so that she can pay for her children's education and someday achieve a better life for her family.

loans.use: To buy more dried fish to sell

loans.name: Ana Silvia

texts.es: Ana Silvia, vive con sus dos hijos menores de edad, uno de 14 y otro de16 años, con esfuerzo y dedicación están estudiando en la escuela. Ana es madre soltera y eso hace que ella día a día tenga el deseo de superarse por sus hijos. Es una mujer emprendedora, trabajadora, responsable, honesta, y que nunca ha quedado mal con nadie. Ana actualmente tiene un negocio cerca por la zona donde reside, vende ropa interior para mujer, y artículos femeninos,  ella siente que le va bien en su negocio pero necesita extenderse un poco y es por eso que ha solicitado a INTEGRAL un crédito para la compra de mas productos de ropa interior, y artículos femeninos, gracias a su carisma y manera de ser. Ana posee una gran clientela y está segura que con la ayuda recibida tendrá mejores ingresos y una vida plena para ella y sus hijos.
texts.en:
Ana Silvia lives with her dependent children (one is 14 and the other is 16 years old), and they are studying hard in school.  Ana is a single mother and every day she has the desire to overcome all of her obstacles for her children.  She is an entrepreneurial, hard-working, responsible, and honest woman and has never had problems with anyone.

Ana has a business near the area in which she resides.  She sells lingerie and feminine items.  She feels that it is going well but she needs to expand her business, and for this reason she is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL so that she can buy more lingerie products and feminine items.  Thanks to her charisma and her personality, Ana has great customers and is sure that with the help she receives she will earn more income and can provide a better life for herself and her children.

loans.use: to buy lingerie and feminine products for sale.

loans.name: Noura

texts.en:
Noura is 52 years old. A conservative woman, she asked her husband to take her place in the photo. Noura and her husband are supporting eleven sons and daughters with the profits from her husband's business. He runs a coffee and hot-drink store. Noura helps her husband make the coffee at home using a special machine which you can see in the photo. 

They now hope to make and sell juices as well. Noura has applied for this loan to buy a machine to make different types of juice.

loans.use: to buy a machine to make different types of juice.

loans.name: Kefah

texts.en:
Kefah is 42 years old. A conservative woman, she asked her husband to appear in the photo instead of her.

Kefah cares for six sons. Her husband has a small shop selling fruits and vegetables. This is their only source of income, which is why Kefah decided to help her husband and support the shop by applying for this loan in order to bring in new types of fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to bring in new types of fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Rehab

texts.en:
Rehab is a 55-year-old woman. Because she is a conservative woman, her her husband has agreed to take her place in the photo.

Rehab is a housewife caring for three sons and one daughter. Her husband has a shop selling hookahs and their flavors and accessories. 

Rehab has applied for this loan in order to support her husband’s business by purchasing more goods and hookahs to sell in the store.

loans.use: to purchase more goods and hookahs to sell in the store.

loans.name: Karla Marisol

texts.es: Karla de 21 años vive con su compañero de vida y su hijo de 3 años, la casa donde ellos viven es de su suegro, es decir no es propia. Ella es una madre responsable, atenta, cariñosa, honesta, y muy dedicada a su hijo posee un negocio de venta de chocolate en tablilla, mejor conocido como artesanal y además tiene una venta de helados como paleta, sorbete, charamuscas entre otros. Karla es muy conocida por sus vecinos por su manera de ser y sabe cómo atenderlos posee abundante clientela y eso ha hecho que su negocio se mantenga constante, aunque ella desea expandirse y vender un poco mas chocolates y helados es por eso que se acerco a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito en el cual ella lo utilizara para comprar materia prima como: cacao, azúcar, papel aluminio, bolsas, entre otros que le harán que su negocio crezca, tiene la seguridad que con la ayuda brindada saldrá adelante y a su familia no le faltara el alimento diario.
texts.en:
Karla is 21 years old and she lives with her husband and their three year old son.  The house in which they live is owned by her father-in-law, so it is now her own.  She is a responsible mother, attentive, caring, honest and very dedicated to her son.  

She owns a business in which she sells craft chocolate, better known as artisan chocolate.  She also sells ice cream such as popsicles, sorbet, sherbet and others.  Karla is well-known by her neighbors for her personality and for her good service.  She has a large customer base and this has brought her a steady stream of business.  She wants to expand her business to sell more chocolates and ice cream and so she approached INTEGRAL to ask for a loan so that she can buy raw materials such as cocoa, sugar, aluminum foil, bags and other items that will help her to grow her business.  She is certain that with the help she receives she will be able to get ahead and her family will not lack in daily necessities.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as cocoa, sugar, aluminum foil, and bags.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard needs another loan to pay school fees for his children.He is a 37-year-old married man with four children living in a permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. He owns a butcher shop and has worked for over seven years. He started by working in farming where he managed to earn his capital. The two main hardships he faces are price fluctuations and seasonal weather. His dream is to educate his children, buy a car, diversify the business and buy land to grow crops.He says he has great motivation to educate his children because they have shown a lot of interest in studies.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Jackline

texts.en:
Jackline is a thirty-four-year-old married woman with four children living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been selling clothes for ten years. She started with one million and now has three million as working capital. Her hardships are customers who do not pay on time and inadequate capital to purchase enough stock. 

Her personal goal is educating her children and her business goal is to expand her business into new markets. Jackline wants money to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en: Vincent intends to use this loan to buy a grass cutting machine. He is a 46-year-old married man with two children living in a semi-permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. He has been a brick layer for 13 years, and this has enabled him to pay his children’s school fees. He started as a farmer and later switched to brick making but, being an ambitious man, he wants to diversify his income sources and venture into grass cutting for schools and hospitals.

loans.use: to buy a new grass cutting machine

loans.name: Aquilino

texts.es: Aquilino de 57 años vive con su esposa y sus hijos, es un hombre trabajador, dispuesto a que sus hijos crezcan con las mejores condiciones, es muy honesto, trabajador, alegre, atento y siempre  buscando hacer el bien. Aquilino se dedica al cultivo de maíz, frijol, Arroz, entre otros y siempre ha sido trabajador con tal que el alimento no falte en su casa. Es el único que lleva el sustento a su familia y es por eso que se interesa por realizar bien su trabajo, en aprender trabajos nuevos e ir creciendo poco a poco. El cree que necesita incrementar su cosecha, comprar semillas e insumor para cosechar mas y es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas como: semillas  fertilizantes, pesticidas, abonos entre otros, teniendo en cuenta que con esta cosecha el lograra una de las mejores para solventar la deuda y tener el sustento en su casa siempre. Es así como aquilino agradece la ayuda que recibirá y confía en que todo le saldrá bien.
texts.en:
Aquilino is 57 years old and lives with his wife and their children.  He is a hard-working man that wants his children to grow up in better conditions.  He is very honest, hard-working, happy, attentive, and he is always striving to do good.  Aquilino grows corn, beans, rice, and other things and has always worked so that his household does not lack for food.  He is the sole provider for his family and because of this he is dedicated to working hard, to learning new jobs, and to growing little by little.

He needs to expand his crops and so he needs seeds to increase his harvest.  This is why he is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL.  He will buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, manure, and other items.  He knows that with this harvest he will be able to pay down his debt and to provide for his family as always.  Aquilino is grateful for the help he is receiving and he is confident that all will go well.

loans.use: to buy basic supplies such as seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, and manure.

loans.name: Anaya

texts.en: From Al-Hashmi, Amman Jordan, Anaya, 44 years old, is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to buy clothes that she will be selling in a small shop. Her future plan is to buy a home.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to sell.

loans.name: Alsobl Group

texts.en:
This group, called Alsobl, consists of Sala, Aftkhar and Mriam. They have been working hard so that their businesses will provide them with the money they need to improve their own living conditions as well as those of their families. They live in Aden, Yemen. They have applied for a loan of 180,000 YER. 

Aftkhar is 40 years old (she is the middle woman in the photo). She is a very hard-working person who has fought hard for a long time in order to get her family ahead in life. She sells many types of goods such as mobile phones and clothes. She has managed to attract a large number of customers. As a result, she enjoys very good sales. She is looking for a loan of 80,000 YER so that she can buy clothes, perfume and phones to meet the high level of demand that she has for her products. This will enable her to keep making progress in her business and she will be able to make the income she needs to support her household.

loans.use: to buy clothes, perfume and phones to sell

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en: Christopher needs a loan to buy local brew to sell. He is 35 years old, married, and has six children living in his house in Fort Portal, Uganda.He has a dream of educating his children up to tertiary level. For two years, Christopher has been in the motorcycle business and the sector has helped him to promptly provide basic needs for his family. However, he wishes to diversify his income sources so he has ventured into the local brew trade since it's very lucrative.

loans.use: to buy local brew to sell.

loans.name: Zainab

texts.en: Zainab is a 31-year-old woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan who has four family members. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to buy blankets from Aqaba which she will sell to neighbors and family to increase her family's income.

loans.use: to pay for blankets to sell.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is a 26-year-old married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He has a personal goal of educating his children and buying a car. He is a farmer and has been in the agricultural sector for two years. He faces hardships of the high cost of inputs and seasonal weather. He has a vision of expanding his farming activities since the sector is very profitable. John needs a loan to pay workers who are preparing the garden for the next planting season

loans.use: to pay workers who are preparing the garden for the next planting season.

loans.name: Abdul

texts.en: Abdul is a 49-year-old married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He has a personal goal of educating his children up to the university level. He has been operating a retail shop for the last 10 years.He faces hardships of price fluctuation and inflation. However, he has a vision of diversifying his business to include farming. Abdul needs a loan to buy general merchandise, such as soap and sugar, to sell.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise, such as soap and sugar, to sell.

loans.name: Rawa

texts.en: Rawa, 22 years old, is from Al Russeifeh, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to purchase clothes and blankets which she will sell to friends and relatives to increase her income. She sucessfully completed a similar project of a smaller scale, but wishes to expand by opening a small shop at her home. Since Rawa is under 30 years old, her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy clothes and blankets to sell.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis, a 35-year-old married father of four children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda, owns a retail shop that he started with capital earned from cocoa farming. He has been in the business for five years, and within this period he has been able to construct a semi-permanent house and educate his children. Inadequate capital to meet the high demand is the main hardship this client is facing. Francis's business goal is to expand into new markets and buy land to grow crops.

Francis dreams of building a permanent residence and educating his children. For the later purpose he is requesting a loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: José Elmer

texts.es: José Elmer se dedica al oficio de la agricultura desde la edad de 12 años, este es un trabajo que aprendió de su abuelo y gracias al cual ha logrado salir adelante hasta ahora. José reside en una zona rural donde la agricultura es la principal actividad económica y vive junto a su esposa e hijos. José siembra frijoles y maíz, dos de los granos más vendidos en este país por ser parte de la dieta principal. Este es el negocio que le permite sostener a su familia, razón por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el deseo de contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de frijoles y maíz para sembrar, con esto José espera sembrar muchas más semillas y poder percibir más ganancias que el año anterior, así también desea comprar abono y otros suministros básicos para el cultivo, lo que le permita mejorar su negocio.
texts.en: José Elmer has been a farmer for 12 years, a job he has learned from his grandfather and thanks to which he has succeeded in getting ahead up to now. José lives with his wife and children in a rural area where agriculture is the main economic activity. José grows beans and corn, two of the most sold basic grains of the country as they are important elements of the main diet. He is requesting a loan to INTEGRAL as he wishes to have enough money to buy a higher quantity of beans and cord to plant, since this is the activity that allows him to provide for his family. José hopes to plant many more seeds and to be able to earn more than last year. He also wants to buy manure and other basic equipment for his crops in order to improve his activity.

loans.use: To buy beans and corn seeds.

loans.name: Silvia Yaneth

texts.es: Silvia de 33 años de edad vive con su esposo e hijo de 8 años, es una mujer muy emprendedora soñadora, alegre. Junto a su esposo desean que su hijo salga adelante y desean aperturar oportunidades para él, cuenta con toda la disposición del mundo para que a su hijo nunca le falte nada. Silvia posee un comedor, donde vende todas las tardes almuerzos y tortillas, ubicado en su casa. Desea ampliar su negocio como toda mujer emprendedora que siempre realiza lo mejor para su familia, es por eso que se acerco a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual lo ocupara para invertir en comprar: maíz, cal, gas propano, verduras, entre otros para tener su comedor muy completo con variedad y nuevas comidas y así llenar las expectativas de los clientes que a su vez la prefieren. Cuenta con abundante clientela que prefieren sus platos de comida. Esta segura que con la ayuda recibida le dará un mejor futuro a su familia
texts.en:
Silvia is 33 years old and lives together with her husband and 8-year-old son.  She is a very entrepreneurial, cheerful woman who dreams big.  She and her husband would like their son to do well and they would like to open opportunities for him.  Silvia is determined that her son will never want for anything. 

Silvia has an eatery in her home where she sells lunches and tortillas every afternoon.  She would like to expand her business.  In common with all entrepreneurial women, she always does her best for her family.  She approached INTEGRAL to request a loan so that she can invest in buying corn, lime, propane gas, vegetables and other supplies that she needs in order to offer a good variety of dishes and new dishes in her business.  This will meet her loyal customers' expectations.  Silvia has a large number of customers who enjoy her food.  She is certain that, with the help she is receiving, she will be able to give her family a better future.

loans.use: to buy corn, lime, propane gas and vegetables

loans.name: Munira

texts.en: Munira is a 36-year-old married woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan. Now requesting a loan of 500 JOD to make home improvements, she will be repainting her whole house. Munira has ambitions to do further home improvements and thus is planning on requesting further loans in the future.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements.

loans.name: Sonia Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Sonia es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien se dedica al comercio de ropa desde hace 18 años negocio que inicio con la venta de toallas luego compro pacas de ropa y empezó a vender en los departamentos. El crédito lo invertirá en surtir su negocio. 
Ella tiene 5 hijos de los cuales a cargo solo tiene la menor de 9 años de edad.
texts.en:
Sonia is a hard-working, entrepreneurial woman who has been selling clothing for 18 years.  She started out selling towels, then bought bundles of clothing and started selling in different regions.  She will invest her loan in stocking her business.

Sonia has five children but only her youngest daughter, who is 9 years old, is still in her care.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (clothing)

loans.name: Vicent

texts.en:
Vicent is a 50-year-old married man with seven children living in Kyenjojo, Uganda. For 15 years. he has been raising and selling cattle.
He is faced with the problem of price fluctuations and inflation which leads to higher operational costs. His personal goal is educating his children and his business goal is hiring employees to help expand his business.
Vicent wants a loan to buy exotic cattle breeds to raise.

loans.use: to buy exotic cattle breeds to raise.

loans.name: Laura Aleyda

texts.es: Laura Aleyda de 25 años de edad, es una joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, vive junto a su esposo y su pequeño bebé quien es el mayor incentivo para ella en la vida de triunfar y vencer todas las barreras. Laura trabaja haciendo tortillas de lunes a domingo lo que le permite contar con más clientes, su jornada inicia a las 6 de la mañana cuando se dirige al molino e inicia a las 11 de la mañana a hacer tortillas, este es un trabajo bastante pesado, pero el bienestar de su hijo es más importante que cualquier sacrificio. Laura desea incrementar la producción de tortillas, por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de maíz para elaborar la masa de las tortillas, así mismo para comprar cal para cocinar el maíz. Laura es una joven muy alegre que cuenta con grandes sueños para salir adelante.
texts.en: Laura Aleyda is 25 years old and she is a young woman who strongly wants to progress in life. She lives with her husband and their little baby, who is her greatest motivation to be successful in life and to overcome all obstacles. Laura prepares tortillas form Mondays to Sundays as this allows her to have more customers. Her daily working routine starts at 6 am, when she goes to the mill, and then at 11 am she starts preparing tortillas. This is a rather demanding job, but her son’s wellbeing in more important than any sacrifice she has to make. Laura wants to increase her tortilla production and she is requesting a loan to INTEGRAL to invest it in the purchase of more quantities of corn to prepare the tortilla dough, as well as to buy lime to cook the corn. Laura is a very cheerful young lady with great projects to progress in life.

loans.use: To buy corn and lime.

loans.name: Joaquin

texts.es: Joaquín vive con su esposa, en casa propia. Es una persona muy trabajadora que siempre su deseo ha sido darle lo mejor a su esposa, es el único que lleva el sustento a su casa y cada mañana se levanta con nuevas aspiraciones y deseos de superarse. Joaquín se dedica a la agricultura siembra en épocas que sabe que habrá abundante cosecha, desde hace un tiempo se a dedicado al cultivo de granos básicos como maíz, frijol, maicillo entre otros. Además cuenta con algunas vacas de las que extrae leche y vende por las mañanas. Desea ampliar su siembra y es por eso que se acerco a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar insumos agrícolas para realizar una buena siembra como son: Fertilizantes, Pesticidas, Abono, Semillas, así como también algunas herramientas que necesita como Arado, Cuma, entre otros para realizar bien su trabajo, cuenta con la seguridad que con el crédito el podrá darle una buena condición de vida a su familia y podrá pagar su deuda sin mayor problema.
texts.en:
Joaquín lives with his wife in his own home.  He is a very hard-working person whose desire has always been to provide his wife with the best in life.  He is the only one who supports their household.

Every morning, Joaquín gets up with new goals and a desire to improve himself.  He is a farmer and he sows his crops in periods when he knows there will be an abundant harvest.  He has been growing basic grains such as corn, beans and sorghum for some time.  In addition, he also has some dairy cows.  In the mornings he milks his cows and then sells their milk.

Joaquín would like to expand his plantings and he approached INTEGRAL to request a loan that will allow him to buy farming supplies so that he can sow his crops well.  He will buy fertilizers, pesticides, manure, seeds and also some tools that he needs such as a plow, a 'cuma' (curved machete) etc. so that he can do his work well.  He feels safe in the knowledge that this loan will enable him to provide his family with good living conditions.  He will be able to repay his loan without problems.

loans.use: to buy basic supplies such as fertilizers, pesticides, manure and seeds

loans.name: Ana Dolores

texts.es: Ana Dolores de cuarenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus cuatro hijos en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas y pupusas en variedad de queso, revueltas, frijol con queso entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite elaborar las mejores pupusas, comercia desde su residencia y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que se prepara es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además con el mejor servicio; Ana Dolores es una mujer activa entregada a su labor, lo que más desea en su vida es cumplir sus sueños, por eso trabaja con mucho esfuerzo sabe que así alcanzara el éxito; desde hace algún tiempo aumento la demanda y no quiere decepcionar a sus clientes, es así como decidió aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital que le permita invertir en insumos, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz, queso, frijol, chicharrón, bebidas, leña etc. Ana Dolores tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que saldara la deuda y a la vez le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ana Dolores is 45 years old and lives together with her life partner and four children in her own home.  Her business is selling tortillas and pupusas.  She sells cheese pupusas, cheese and bean pupusas and 'pupusas revueltas' (pupusas stuffed with meat, beans and cheese).  She has been in the business for a number of years and has gained very valuable experience that allows her to make the best pupusas.  She makes her sales from home and already has a lot of customers because people know that everything she prepares is top quality and sold at affordable prices.  She also provides the best service.

Ana Dolores is an active woman who is committed to her work.  What she most wants in life is to fulfill her dreams.  She works very hard because she knows that this is how she will achieve success.  For some time now, Ana Dolores' demand has been growing.  She does not want to let her customers down and so she decided to increase her production.  In order to do this, she needs capital to invest in supplies.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy corn, cheese, beans, chicharrón (ground, cooked pork), drinks, firewood, etc.  Ana Dolores has good credit references and is very responsible.  She assures us that she will repay her loan and, at the same time, provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cheese, beans, chicharrón, drinks and firewood

loans.name: Julio Francisco

texts.es: El señor Julio Francisco es un hombre trabajador y emprendedor quien tiene un puesto de quesillo y venta de gaseosa desde hace 10 años e invertirá el crédito en queso quesillo, crema, tortillas, cebolla…etc. y su meta es logar tener otros puestos de quesillo.
texts.en: Julio Francisco is a hard-working, entrepreneurial man who has been running a stall where he sells 'quesillo' (a thick corn tortilla wrapped around soft cheese, pickled onions, and a sauce of sour cream or liquid cheese and vinegar) and soda for 10 years.  He will invest his loan in buying cheese, 'quesillo' (soft cheese), cream, tortillas, onions, etc.  His goal is to have additional sales stalls.

loans.use: to buy cheese, quesillo (soft cheese), cream, tortillas, onions, etc.

loans.name: Telma Isabel

texts.es: Telma Isabel de 46 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo quien trabaja como albañil en diferentes proyectos, así mismo vive junto a su único hijo de 12 años de edad quien estudia. Telma es una mujer muy responsable quien desea el mejor futuro para su hijo por lo que trabaja comercializando productos lácteos como: diferentes tipos de queso, crema y requesón, los cuales comercializa de forma ambulante por diferentes colonias y cantones, así mismo vende productos de belleza por catalogo de diferentes marcas y precios, lo que le ayuda mucho a obtener más ganancias. Telma solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad y variedad de productos lácteos y así mismo hacer más pedido de cosméticos para comercializar.
texts.en:
Telma Isabel is 46 years old and lives together with her husband who works as a builder on different projects.  She also lives with her only son who is 12 years old and attends school.  Telma is a very responsible woman who would like a better future for her son.  With this in mind, she works selling dairy products such as: different types of cheese, cream and 'requesón' (a ricotta like cheese).  She makes her sales as an itinerant vendor, traveling to different districts and cantons.  She also sells different brands of beauty products through catalogs.  This helps her to make more profits.  

Telma is requesting a loan so that she can buy a larger quantity and variety of dairy products.  She would also like to order more cosmetics to sell.

loans.use: to buy cheese and cream to sell

loans.name: Rosa Ermelinda

texts.es: Rosa Ermelinda, vive junto a su pequeño hijo, quien es la mayor razón de esforzarse y salir adelante. Ella posee una tienda en la cual comercializa productos perecederos y de primera necesidad para el hogar. Este negocio es el cual le ha permitido poder contar con todo lo necesario para salir adelante, y así mismo contar con los alimentos y todo lo necesario para vivir dignamente. Es por esto que Rosa desea contar con más productos en la tienda, ya que la colonia ha ido creciendo necesita más productos para atender a todas las personas que piden productos con los que no cuenta, razón por la cual solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar arroz, frijoles, azúcar, lácteos, bebidas y otros más los cuales son necesarios en una buena tienda. Esto es muy importante para Rosa ya que así no perderá a nuevos clientes y podrá aumentar en gran manera sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Rosa Ermelinda lives with her small son, who is her biggest reason to make an effort and get ahead.  She has a store in which she markets perishable and essential products for the home.  This business is that which has permitted her to be able to count on having all that is necessary to get ahead, and at the same time count on all of the food and what is necessary to live with dignity.

It is because of this that Rosa would like to count on more products in the store. Since the colony has been growing it needs more products to attend to all of the people that order products with which she doesn't have, which is the reason she requests a loan through which she can buy rice, beans, sugar, dairy products, drinks and more others which are necessary in a good store.  This is very important for Rosa, since in this way she won't lose new clients and will be able to increase her earnings in a big way.

loans.use: to buy cheese, basic grains and bread to market

loans.name: 12 De Octubre Group

texts.es:
El grupo 12 de Octubre está conformado por tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Luisa de 24 años de edad quien se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y ropa desde hace 3 años negocio que inicio con el fin de salir adelante y trabajar. El crédito lo invertirá con la compra mayor cantidad de producto.
Las otras integrantes son Iliana de 55 años quien se dedica al comercio de mercadería general (cosméticos, ropa, zapatos…etc.) desde hace 5 años y Ana de 27 años quien vende ropa desde hace 6 años.
texts.en:
The '12 de Octubre' group is made up of three hard-working and entrepreneurial people.  One of them is 24-year-old Luisa who has been selling cosmetics and clothing for three years.  She started her business with the goal of working and getting ahead in life.  She will invest her loan in buying a larger quantity of products.

The other members of the group are 55-year-old Ileana, who has been selling general merchandise (cosmetics, clothing, shoes, etc.) for five years, and 27-year-old Ana, who has been selling clothing for six years.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (clothing and cosmetics)

loans.name: Blanca Estela

texts.es: Blanca Estela de 44 años de edad, una persona muy trabajadora quien vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos menores de edad. Como toda madre responsable, quien ha debido trabajar muy duro para salir adelante junto a su compañero de vida, se dedica a la venta de ropa para hombres, mujeres y niños, la cual comercializa en su casa o de forma ambulante por distintas colonias y departamentos, Blanca vende la ropa a muy buenos precios, así mismo es una persona muy amable y positiva, razón por la que cuenta con varios clientes. Ella solicita un préstamo con el deseo de poder contar con el monto necesario para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de prendas de vestir, con lo que espera obtener mayores ganancias, las cuales sean de gran beneficio para sus hijos como también para su hogar.
texts.en: Blanca Estela is 44 years old.  She is a very hard-working person who lives together with her husband and two dependent children.  Like all responsible mothers, Blanca has had to work very hard to get ahead in life.  Her business is selling men's, women's and children's clothing.  She makes her sales from home and also as an itinerant vendor, traveling to different districts and departments.  Blanca sells her clothing at very good prices and she is a very kind and positive woman, which is why she has a lot of customers.  She is requesting a loan as she would like to have the money she needs to invest in buying a large quantity of clothing.  She hopes that this will make her more profits.  This would be of great benefit to her children and her household.

loans.use: to buy blouses, shorts and other clothing to sell

loans.name: Elba Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Elba es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora de 50 años la cual tiene una pulpería y vende calzado y ropa usada desde hace varios años e invertirá el crédito en la compra de mercadería para regar.
Ella tiene 6 hijos de los cuales los dos mejores de 23 años y 9 años los cuales estudian y le ayudan en el negocio en su tiempo libre.
texts.en:
Elba del Carmen is a hardworking, enterprising, 50-year-old woman who has a grocery store.  She has also been selling shoes and used clothes for several years.  

She will use the loan to buy merchandise to sell.

She has six children. The two youngest, ages 23 and 9, go to school and help her in the business in their free time.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, clothes, shoes and silver.

loans.name: Los Angeles  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Los Ángeles está formado por 6 socias y 3 socios quienes viven por diferentes sectores de la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que tiene una gran riqueza cultural ya que es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, también natural ya que esta bañada por 4 ríos y varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza, la gastronomía es muy variada la misma que cautiva el paladar de propios y extraños. Su gente es amable, gentil y de un corazón cálido como nuestras socias quienes laboran en diferentes actividades las mismas que le permiten aportar a la economía de sus hogares y sacar adelante a sus familias, aun mantienen la Cultura y Tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Ruth, tiene 50 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos quienes son mayores de edad, solo uno de sus hijos está casado pero vive en su casa compartiendo los gastos del hogar, sus dos hijos solteros trabajan para sus gastos personales, su esposo se dedica al comercio, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.

Doña Ruth se dedica a las bienes raíces, esta actividad la desempeña hace 22 años, trabaja de lunes a sábados sin un horario fijo, también se dedica a la venta de aros y llantas de vehículos.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace 3 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de aros y llantas para vehículos para continuar con su negocio.
 
El sueño de nuestra socia es muy especial ya que desea realizar una fundación para niños con capacidades diferentes.

La foto pequeña es de una socia que no pudo estar presente cuando se tomó la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
The 'Los Ángeles' community bank is made up of six women and three men who live in different areas of the city of Cuenca.  This city has great cultural wealth and in December 1999 it was declared a World Heritage Site.  It also has great natural beauty as it is surrounded by four rivers and a number of places where people can go to enjoy nature.  The local cuisine is very varied and delights the palates of locals and visitors alike.  The local people are kind, friendly, and have warm hearts, as do our members.   Our members work in different business activities that allow them to contribute financially towards their households and provide for their families.  They continue to maintain the culture and traditions of their people.

Ruth is one of the members of this group.  She is 50 years old, married, and has three children who are all adults.  Only one of her children is married but he still lives at home, sharing the household expenses.  Her two single children work to cover their own personal expenses.  Her husband works in commerce.  They do not own their own home but rent instead.  

Ruth works in real estate.  She has been in this business for 22 years.  She works from Monday to Saturday and does not work regular hours.  She also sells hubcaps and tires.

Ruth has been a member of her community bank for three years and she will invest her new loan in buying hubcaps and tires so that she she can continue in her business.

Our member's dream is very special as she would like to set up a foundation for children with different abilities.

The small photo is of a member who was not able to be present when the group photo was taken.

loans.use: to buy hubcaps and tires

loans.name: Jaime Alfredo

texts.es: Jaime Alfredo de 40 años de edad, vive junto su esposa quien se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar y así mismo junto a sus hijos. Jaime posee un camión, en el cual se dedica  a hacer viajes a diferentes partes del país. Él transporta frutas, muebles, personas y todo lo que se le solicita, la zona en la cual él se colocada a diario es muy buena ya que es cerca de un mercado, lugar donde hay una gran fuente de trabajo para él, asímismo para obtener ganancias extras Jaime trabaja para una empresa privada transportando cemento. Él solicita un préstamo con el enorme deseo de poder brindarle mantenimiento necesario al camión y realizar compras de repuestos y de esta forma brindar un servicio más seguro y contar con más trabajo para sostener su hogar.
texts.en: Jaime Alfredo is 40 years old.  He lives together with his wife, who takes care of the household chores, and their children.  Jaime owns a truck which he uses to make trips to different parts of the country.  He transports fruit, furniture, people, and anything else that people request.  The area where he parks each day is very good because it is near a market where there is a good source of work for him.  In order to make extra income, Jaime also works for a private company, transporting cement.  He is requesting a loan because he would really like to be able to have necessary maintenance work carried out on his truck and buy spare parts.  This will enable him to provide a safer service and do more work so that he can support his household.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his vehicle

loans.name: Luisa Amanda

texts.es:
La señora Luisa Amanda  es madre soltera de 6 hijos, comerciante ambulante donde su negocio principal es la venta  de productos plástico como bolsas de diferentes tamaños y formas, compra sus productos en la ciudad de Managua, posteriormente realiza sus ventas en la calles de la ciudad de león y Chinandega, tiene más de 20 años de dedicarse a este arduo pero importante fuente de ingresos para ella y su familia.

El  crédito solicitado fue utilizado para comprar al por mayor su producto donde obtendrá mayores ingresos y así mejorar su calidad de vida y de sus hijos.

Cabe mencionar que la señora a logrado mejorar su vivienda gracias a los créditos brindados por CEPRODEL.
texts.en:
Luisa Amanda is a single mother of six children; she’s a street vendor and her main business is selling plastic items like bags in assorted sizes and shapes.  She buys her merchandise in Managua and then sells in the streets of León and Chinandega.  She has more than 20 years’ experience in this hard but important source of income for her and her family. 

The loan she requested was used to buy larger amounts of products to earn higher income thus improving her and her children’s quality of life.  It’s worth pointing out that she managed to make home improvements thanks to Ceprodel loans.

loans.use: to buy plastic tableware.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es: Tomas de 56 años de edad, es un señor muy trabajador quien vive únicamente junto a su esposa. Él posee una pequeña parcela en la cual se encarga de sembrar maíz y frijoles, los cuales posteriormente comercializa por mayor a diferentes clientes ya sea en mercados o tiendas, su negocio es bastante estable, en el cual desea invertir, y de esta forma obtener mayores ganancias. Tomas solicita un préstamo con el cual pueda invertir en insumos agrícolas para mejorar sus cultivos y mejorar su casa ya que se aproxima la temporada lluviosa y es necesario que haga reparaciones en el techo y paredes, con esto Tomas espera tener cosechas abundantes y una casa más fuerte que pueda resguardarlos de los duros inviernos sin tener ningún tipo de goteras o riesgo, esta muy feliz porque contará con los recursos necesarios para realizar sus propósitos y la vida al lado de su esposa será mas próspera
texts.en:
Tomas, 56, is a hardworking man who lives just with his wife.  He has a small parcel of land where he grows corn and beans that he subsequently sells at wholesale to various customers be they markets or stores.  His business is quite stable and he wants to invest in it in order to earn higher profits.

Tomas is asking for a loan to buy farm supplies to improve his crops and also to make some improvements to his house because the rainy season is approaching and he needs to repair the roof and walls.

With this Tomas hopes to have abundant harvests and a stronger house that can withstand the severe winter without leaks or risks.  He’s very happy because he’ll have the resources necessary to reach his goals and life alongside his wife will be more prosperous.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies and to do home improvements.

loans.name: Mansouratou

texts.fr: Mansouratou est mariée et mère de 04 enfants. Le plus âgé a 25 ans et le moins âgé a 15 ans. Quatre vont à l'école. Elle vend des divers depuis quelques années. Mansouratou s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés de la place. Mansouratou veut s'acheter des cartons de lait, de sucre, d'huile et de sardine. Mansouratou avec ses économies veut répondre à ses besoins élémentaires et surtout la poursuite des études de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Mansouratou is married and the mother of four children.  Her eldest child is 25 years old and her youngest is 15.  Four of her children attend school.

Mansouratou has been selling miscellaneous goods for some years.  She stocks up in one of the local markets.  She would like to buy boxes of milk, sugar, oil and sardines.

Mansouratou would like to use her savings to meet her basic needs and, above all, to ensure the continuation of her children's schooling.

loans.use: to buy five boxes of milk, five boxes of sugar, five boxes of oil and three boxes of sardines

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy manure.

loans.name: Adjouavi Victoire

texts.fr: Adjouavi Victoire est mariée et mère de 03 enfants. Le plus âgé a 30 ans et le moins âgé a 15 ans.Tous les deux derniers sont encore scolarisés donc 02 personnes à charge. Elle vend des mèches et des divers depuis des années. Adjouavi Victoire s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Ses clients sont uniquement les femmes. Adjouavi Victoire veut s'acheter des cartons de mèche, de lait, de sucre, d'huile et sac de riz. Adjouavi Victoire avec ses économies veut participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants.
texts.en: Adjouavi Victoire is married and the mother of three children.  Her eldest child is 30 years old and her youngest is 15.  Both of her younger children are still in school and so she has two people in her care.  Adjouavi Victoire has been selling hair extensions and other goods for years.  She stocks up in one of the markets in Benin.  All of her customers are women.  Adjouavi Victoire would like to buy boxes of hair extensions, milk, sugar and oil, and sacks of rice.  She would like to use her savings to help pay for her children's schooling.

loans.use: to buy six boxes of hair extensions, two boxes of milk, one box of sugar, one box of 1 liter bottles of oil and five 5kg sacks of rice

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: El señor José es un hombre trabajador y emprendedor quien trabaja en un hospital público de Managua  y requiere el crédito para construcción de vivienda. Él está casado y tiene dos hijos de 11 y 6 años los cuales son su motivación para salir adelante.
texts.en:
José is a hardworking and enterprising man.  He works in a public hospital in Managua.

He needs the loan to for home construction.

He is married and has two children, ages 11 and 6.  His children are his motivation to get ahead.

loans.use: to build a room.

loans.name: José Ventura

texts.es: José Ventura de 50 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa quien le ayuda con el negocio. Desde hace 35 años que José se dedica a la siembra de frijoles y maíz, con lo que ha podido salir adelante, comprar su propia casa y así mismo su parcela. Él desea aumentar sus ventas y así poder comprar una parcela más y cultivar mayor cantidad de granos básicos para comercializar. José solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar maíz, frijoles, pesticidas y abono para mejorar sus cosechas y sembrar más, de este modo José espera percibir más ganancias las cuales sean de mucho beneficio para la estabilidad del hogar y poder tener una vida mejor junto a su esposa.
texts.en:
José Ventura, 50, lives with his wife who helps him with the business.  José has been growing beans and corn for the last 35 years; he’s supported himself this way and has bought his own house as well as his parcel of land.

He wants to increase sales to buy another parcel and grow larger amounts of basic grains to sell which is why José requests a loan from INTEGRAL to buy corn, beans, pesticides and manure to improve his crops and to plant more.  In this way, José hopes to earn higher profits that will be of great benefit for his home’s stability and to be able to have a better life with his wife.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Mouhamadou

texts.fr:
Mouhamadou est un jeune boutiquier âgé de  37 ans, marié et père de famille habitant dans la ville principale.IL  vend des produits divers (alimentaires et non alimentaires) depuis 15 ans.
IL demande un  crédit de 400 000 pour renforcer son fond de roulement et développer son commerce en achetant plus de marchandises pour générer plus de bénéfices afin de pouvoir payer la location de la boutique et prendre en charge sa famille.
Soucieux  d’agrandir son commerce Mouhamadou veut un jour devenir grossiste ce qui lui permettra de mieux s’occuper de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mouhamadou is a young shopkeeper of 37.  He is married, a father, and lives in the main city.  He has been selling miscellaneous products (both food items and non-food items) for 15 years.

Mouhamadou is requesting a loan for 400,000 francs to strengthen his working capital and develop his business by purchasing more merchandise.  This will make him more profits which will mean he can pay the rent on his store and look after his family.

Mouhamadou is keen to grow his business and would like, one day, to become a wholesaler.  This will allow him to take better care of his family.

loans.use: to strengthen his working capital and to buy more merchandise so that he can make more profits

loans.name: Las Esmeraldas Group

texts.es: La Sra. Amelia, tiene 3 hijos  es conviviente  y lleva trabajando con Edaprospo desde hace 1 año y 4 meses , Amelia  es tesorera del grupo “Las Esmeraldas”, grupo conformado por 9 socias que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio . Amelia  trabaja vendiendo productos de belleza  desde hace 10 años y a su vez también vende gaseosa y los domingos comida a su vez vende prendas de vestir, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a  logrado mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos, brindándoles educación  y con el fin de seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar mercadería prendas de vestir. Amelia  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Amelia has three children, and she is in a common-law marriage.  She has been working with Edaprospo for one year and four months.  Amelia is the treasurer of the Las Esmeraldas communal bank.  The group is comprised of nine members who devote themselves to different business activities.

Amelia has worked selling beauty products for ten years.  She also sells soft drinks, and on Sundays she sells food.  She also sells clothing.  Thanks to her effort and dedication, she has managed to improve her children’s quality of life and give them an education.

In order to continue growing, she has requested a new loan to buy clothing merchandise.  Amelia will meet her goals with a lot of work and effort.  The loans from Edaprospo will help her.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
La señora Gladys es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora de 58 años quien se dedica a la venta de ropa usada desde hace varios años y trabaja con ADIM desde sus inicios. El crédito lo invertirá en productos para el negocio  y su meta es salir adelante.
Ella gracias a su arduo trabajo y los créditos con las ganancias a logrado realizar mejoras en su hogar.
texts.en:
Gladys is a hard-working, entrepreneurial woman of 58 who has been selling used clothing for some years.  She has been working with ADIM since she started.  She will invest her loan in buying products for her business.  Her goal is to make progress in life.

Thanks to her hard work and the loans that she has taken out, Gladys has been able to use her profits to make improvements to her home.

loans.use: to buy bundles of clothing

loans.name: Ola

texts.en:
Ola (husband, Bashar in photo) is a 37-year-old married woman and the mother to three sons and two daughters.  She makes embroideries, upon her customers request.

For the past year, Ola's husband has been selling cosmetics and accessories, which has been a profitable endeavor, but the profit is not enough to cover the family's needs and the store's costs.

Ola is requesting a $3,000 loan from FATEN to help cover the costs of purchasing more cosmetics and accessories for resale. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

Ola (husband in photo) is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online.

loans.use: to help cover the costs of purchasing more cosmetics and accessories for resale.

loans.name: Kuessiba Rose's Group

texts.fr: Il s'agit d'un groupe de deux personnes en caution solidaire. Kuessiba Rose,la responsable, est âgée de 32 ans. Mariée et sans enfant, Kuessiba Rose vend des pagnes et des mèches depuis des années. Elle s'approvisionne dans les marchés du Benin. En vue de répondre à la demande de sa clientèle et de contribuer aux dépenses du foyer, Kuessiba Rose a sollicité et a obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev. Le présent crédit lui permettra de maximiser son profit et d'épargner. Kuessiba Rose se retrouve à gauche de la photo.
texts.en: This is a two-person group with joint liability.  Kuessiba Rose, the person in charge, is 32 years old, married and doesn't have any children.  She has been selling 'pagnes' (traditional, colorful, wraparound fabric) and hair extensions for years.  She stocks up in the markets in Benin.  In order to respond to her customer demand and contribute towards her household expenses, Kuessiba Rose has requested and obtained a micro loan from Finadev.  This loan will allow her to maximize her profits and to save.  Kuessiba Rose is on the left of the photo.

loans.use: to buy one dryer and 15 Hitarget 'pagnes'

loans.name: María Etelvina Hortencia

texts.es: María Etelvina Hortencia de 65 años de edad, es una señora muy trabajadora y responsable, ella vive junto a su compañero de vida quien es jubilado y junto a tres nietas quienes se dedican a estudiar.  María trabaja muy duro de lunes a domingo elaborando pupusas, las cuales son un alimento muy típico de este país, el cual está hecho a base de masa de maíz o de arroz y se rellena de queso, chicharrón y frijoles, por lo que es un negocio bastante estable, en el cual se cuenta con muchos clientes a pesar de poseer diferente competencia. María y su familia depende en gran manera de las ganancias de este negocio por lo que es de mucha importancia poder mejorar sus ventas, es por ello que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL con el deseo de comprar maíz por mayor, así mismo comprar tambos de gas propano, repollo, queso, tomates, frijoles y otros ingredientes más. Esto lo hace con el deseo de contar con mayor cantidad de materia prima de su negocio y así obtener mayores ganancias, las cuales sean de mucho beneficio para su familia.
texts.en:
María Etelvina Hortensia, 65, is a very hardworking, responsible lady.  She lives with her life companion who is retired and with three granddaughters who are students.  María works very hard from Monday through Sunday making ‘pupusas’ which are a very typical food of this country that’s made from corn or rice flour stuffed with cheese, fried pork and beans; it’s quite a stable business in that she has many customers despite having competition.

María and her family depend to a large extent on profits from this business which is why her sales are so important and why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan because she wants to buy corn at wholesale as well as to buy a tank of propane, cabbage, cheese, tomatoes, beans and some other ingredients. She does this hoping to have a larger amount of raw materials for her business and to earn higher profits that will be of great benefit for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy corn, cheese and fried pork skin.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a 48 year old, hard working man with three children, who lives in Kagadi,Uganda.

He has operated a poultry business for six years.  Inadequate capital, high fuel and transport costs are factors affecting his operations.  He would like to build a permanent home and buy land to grow crops.  

Joseph intends to use the loan to buy chicks and poultry feeds for his project.

loans.use: to buy chicks and poultry feeds for his project.

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en:
Godfrey is a married man with three children who live in Kagadi, Uganda.  

For eleven years he has been trading produce.  He started as a farmer but decided to buy produce from other farmers and sell at a profit.

He would like to educate his children and expand his business to new markets.  Godfrey wants the loan to buy maize and beans for sale.

loans.use: to buy maize and beans for sale.

loans.name: Moctar

texts.fr:
Moctar est un gérant de quincaillerie, âgé de 48 ans marié et père de famille, il s’active dans ce domaine depuis  9 ans et habite dans la ville principale.IL achète des produits de quincaillerie à Dakar et à Thiès pour ensuite les revendre.
Moctar sollicite un crédit de 100 000 pour acheter des câbles, des fils, des tuyaux  afin d’augmenter le matériel  demandé  par ses clients, ce qui lui permettra de générer plus de bénéfices et renforcer son fond de roulement.
Les bénéfices issus de ces ventes lui permettront d’assurer les charges familiales.
Moctar envisage de renforcer son fond de roulement  .
texts.en:
Moctar is a hardware store manager.  He is 48 years old, married, and a father.  He has been in this line of work for nine years and lives in the main town.  He buys his hardware products in Dakar and Thiès and then re-sells them.

Moctar is requesting a loan for 100,000 francs to buy cables, wires and pipes in order to increase his stock of the materials his customers require.  This will allow him to make more profits and strengthen his working capital.

The profits he makes from his sales will allow Moctar to provide for his family.

Moctar plans to strengthen his working capital.

loans.use: to buy cables, wires and pipes in order to increase his stock

loans.name: Pedro Santos

texts.es: Pedro Santos de 47 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa con quien se dedica al trabajo de la agricultura desde hace 30 años, contando con una amplia experiencia, lo que le permite tener  muy buenas referencias y así mismo poseer varios clientes fijos quienes consumen sus productos. Pedro desea contar con más mayor cantidad de los productos que cultiva, ya que con esto podrá percibir mayores ganancias, razón por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el monto necesario para comprar mayor cantidad de semillas, pesticidas y abono para cultivar frijoles y maíz y así de esta manera aumentar sus ventas y poder vivir de una forma mejor.
texts.en:
Pedro Santos, 47, lives with his wife who he’s worked with in agriculture for 30 years; he has vast experience which allows him to have very good references and several regular customers who consume his products.

Pedro wants to produce more in order to earn higher profits which is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy the larger amount of seeds he needs, pesticides and manure to grow beans and corn thus increasing sales and being able to live better.

loans.use: to buy beans to plant.

loans.name: Justus

texts.en:
Justus is a 49 year old man married with four children, living in Bundibugyo, Uganda.

He owns a retail shop which he started from agricultural sales.  He has been in the business for ten years.  Inadequate capital to purchase enough stock, price fluctuations, customers not paying on time are his main hardships.  Justus wants to build a permanent residential house and educate his children.

His business goals are to expand into new markets, buy land to grow crops and move his business to more permanent location. The purpose of the loan is to buy more merchandise such as sugar for sale and pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise such as sugar for sale.

loans.name: Huda

texts.en:
Huda is a conservative person, so she is unwilling to upload her picture to the Internet. The man in the photo is her husband.

Huda is a 35-year-old married woman from Hay Nazal, Jordan. She supports four members of her family. She is looking to improve her family's living conditions, so she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to repaint her house. Huda is planning to purchase her own car.

loans.use: to repaint her house

loans.name: Ligia Antonia

texts.es:
La señora Ligia Antonia es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien tiene una pulpería hace 1 ½ año la cual inicio con ayuda de mamá  e invertirá el crédito en la compra de mercadería en especial granos básicos.
Ella con el crédito anterior logro comprar un frízer.
texts.en: Ligia Antonia is a hardworking, enterprising woman who has had a grocery store for the last year and a half that she started with help from her mother.  She will use the loan to buy merchandise, especially basic grains.  She used her previous loan to buy a freezer.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Vilma Del Socorro

texts.es:
La señora Vilma del Socorro es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora de 27 años de edad quien se dedica a la venta de comida negocio que comenzó hace poco. Ella inicio  vendiendo tajadas con queso para el colegio y tortilla de papa luego con las ganancias empezó a realizar bistec, pollo…etc.
El crédito lo invertirá en una cocina industrial y extender el negocio.
texts.en: Vilma del Socorro is a hardworking, enterprising, 27-year-old woman who sells food, a business she started a short time ago.  She started out selling fried plantain slices with cheese and potato omelets at a school and then used profits to start making steaks, chicken, etc.  She will use the loan to buy an industrial stove and to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy an industrial stove and ingredients like grains, meat, etc.

loans.name: Caxton

texts.en:
Caxton is a 44 year old man, married with four children, living in Bundibugyo, Uganda.

His has been a policeman for twelve years.  

Caxton's main hardships is his low pay, though he has managed to pay school fees for his children.  His dream is to build a permanent house and start up an income generating activity. 

The purpose of the loan is to complete building his residential house.

loans.use: to complete building his residential house.

loans.name: Zain

texts.en:
Zain is a 47 year old man from Jabal Al Hussain Amman, Jordan.  He supports five members of his family. 

He is requesting a loan of 1000JOD to buy clothes that he will sell to companies and shops.  He previously had a smaller business selling clothes to individuals, but would like to expand his business. 

In the future he would like to see his children married and be able to buy a car.

loans.use: to pay for clothes to sell

loans.name: Majeda

texts.en:
Majeda is a 53-year-old woman, married and the mother of six sons and four daughters.  One of her sons and one of her daughters are employed, but their salaries are not enough to cover all the needs and costs.  Majeda lives in the old city of Hebron.  

She wants to change the old furniture she has and purchase new one to improve her family's living conditions.  Majeda is requesting a $1,200 loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs. 

This will improve the family's living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase new home furniture

loans.name: Eric George

texts.en:
Eric George is a 38 year old married man with two children living in Kagadi, Uganda. 

He has two years of experience in the produce business. He says customers who do not pay on time and inadequate capital are affecting his business' growth.  He wants a loan to buy maize and beans for resale.

Eric George would like to educate his children and buy land for farming.

loans.use: to buy maize and beans for resale.

loans.name: Degsy

texts.es:
La señora Degsy es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora de 25 años quien se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace 5 años en el Mercadito. Ella inicio en ADIM en el grupo solidario Concepción actualmente  se graduó a crédito individual. 
Degsy es casada y tiene un niño de 7  años y su meta es aumentar su negocio.
texts.en: Degsy is a hardworking, enterprising, 25-year-old woman who has been selling clothes for five years in the market.  She started out with ADIM as part of the Concepción communal bank and has since graduated to individual loans.  Degsy is married and has a 7-year-old son; her goal is to increase her business.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Silma Lorena

texts.es:
La señora Silma es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien tiene una sala de belleza la cual inicio hace 15 años con una silla plástica, un espejo de pata de león y una tijera de barata. Actualmente gracias a su ardua labor y los créditos ha mejorado el negocio con tratamientos, pone uñas acrílicas, maquillaje y peinados. Además ha invertido en productos de belleza para vender.
El crédito lo invertirá en productos para el día de las madres principalmente tintes, alisados, tratamientos y encargos que tiene para el día de las madres. Ella tiene tres hijos de los cuales dos son menores de edad de 13 y 11 años.
texts.en:
Silma is a hardworking, enterprising woman who has a beauty salon she started 15 years ago with a plastic chair, a lion’s claw-style mirror and a cheap scissors.  Thanks to her hard work and loans she’s managed to improve the business.  She now does hair treatments, attaches acrylic nails, does make-up and hair styling.  She’s also invested in beauty products to sell.

She will use the loan to buy products for Mother’s Day, especially dyes, straighteners, treatments and orders she has pending for Mother’s Day.  She has three children two of which are minors; they are 13 and 11 years of age.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Leoncia María

texts.es:
La señora Leoncia es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien se dedica a la venta interior lovable desde hace 8 años. Este negocio lo inicio su madre y luego ella continúo con él. 
Ella está casada y tiene dos hijos de 2 y 8 años de edad por los cuales trabaja arduamente y son su motivación.
texts.en:
Leoncia is a hard-working, entrepreneurial woman who has been selling Lovable underwear for eight years.  Her mother started the business and she is continuing with it.

Leoncia is married and has two children who are 2 and 8 years old.  She works very hard for her children and they are her motivation.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (clothing)

loans.name: Tibbes

texts.en:
Tibbes is a 40-year-old married man with four children. The family lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He is a teacher and has been in service for over 15 years. He says exchanging ideas with his students inspires him, and his dream is to see them become better in life. 

He also wants to construct a permanent home. Tibbes wants a loan to buy construction materials for his house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for his house.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is a 30-year-old married man with four children. They live in Kasese, Uganda. 

He has been in the retail business for 12 years. His hardships are inadequate capital to purchase enough stock, price fluctuations and inflation. 

His personal goals are educating his children and building a permanent home. Stephen wants money to buy soda, sugar and salt for resale.

loans.use: to buy soda, sugar and salt for resale.

loans.name: Murida

texts.en: Murida is a 50-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to buy baby and women's clothes, which she will sell. She is planning to open a small shop to sell these clothes. She hopes to increase her income and her standard of living in this way.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell

loans.name: Asmaa

texts.en:
Asmaa is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online so her husband Ibrahem appears in her Kiva profile photo.
Asmaa is a 30-year-old young woman. She is married to Ibrahem and a mother to one son and three daughters. Her husband Ibrahem is a schoolteacher who gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's needs.

Asmaa wants to improve her family's home living conditions, so she is requesting a 3,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing new home furniture such as bedroom furniture for her children, living room seats and dinning room furniture. 

Taking this loan will provide Asmaa and her family with comfortable home furniture to enjoy their home life.

loans.use: To purchase home furniture

loans.name: Nuevo Inicio Group

texts.es:
El grupo Nuevo Inicio lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Wendy Carolina quien se dedica desde muy joven al comercio de comida ya que su madre tenía una comideria la cual desde hace 5 años ella administra. El crédito lo invertirá en granos básicos, carne y perecederos etc.
Las otras integrantes del grupo son María de Lourdes quien tiene una repostería y Karla quien vende ropa desde hace 4 años.
texts.en:
The 'Nuevo Inicio' (New Beginning) group is made up of three hard-working, entrepreneurial people.  One of them is Wendy Carolina, who has been selling food since she was very young because her mother had an eatery which she has been running for 5 years now.  She will invest her loan in buying basic grains, meat, perishables, etc.

The other members of this group are María de Lourdes, who has a confectionery business, and Karla, who has been selling clothing for four years.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, meat and perishables

loans.name: Khadija

texts.en: Khadija is a 60-year-old woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 600 JOD to do home improvements. She will be improving her living room and bathroom, repainting and buying new furniture.

loans.use: to do home improvements

loans.name: Kyakatwire Tweyambe Group

texts.en:
Edith is a 42 year married old woman with five children living in Kyenjojo, Uganda.

For fifteen years she has operated a bar.  Edith started with 50,000 shillings but now has 1,000,000 shillings as working capital.  She is faced with the hardship of customers not paying on time, which affects her business' growth.  Edith wants a loan to buy sodas and beers for sell.

She says her personal goal is to build a permanent house for residence and her business goal is to expand into new markets.  She is a member of a group where each member guarantees the loan.

loans.use: to buy sodas and beers for sell.

loans.name: Yelena

texts.ru:
Елена – из города Мелитополь. Она торгует на местном рынке женской обувью. У нее собственное торговое место. Опыт работы – 17 лет. Елена, как и многие рыночные предприниматели в Украине, часто сталкивается с проблемой изменения курса доллара и спадами в торговле. Тем не менее, она никогда не опускает рук, а продолжает трудиться и ответственно подходить к развитию своего дела, вкладывая в него всю себя.  

Елена обратилась в КИВА за кредитом суммой в 15 000 гривен с намерением закупить сезонный товар на лето. Она знает, что наиболее популярной разновидностью товара среди ее клиентов является кожаная женская обувь, поэтому хотела бы пополнить ее запасы для последующей реализации.  
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en: Yelena is from the city of Melitopol.  She sells women's shoes at a local market.  She owns her retail outlet.  She has 17 years of experience in this work.  Yelena, much like other market entrepreneurs in the Ukraine, often comes across the problem of the changing dollar currency rate and reductions in sales.  Despite that, she never puts her hands down and continues to work hard and approach her business development responsibly by emerging herself in it.
