Zulfi lives in the city of Istaravshan. She's fifty-nine years old, married and she has three children. One of her sons works in "MLO Humo and Partners". For the past eight years, she's made a living by farming and cultivating plants. 

Zulfi is asking for a loan in order to purchase some livestock and mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to purchase a bull and some mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Cholpon

texts.ru: Чолпон 38 лет, воспитывает 4 детей. В 1997 году, в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи, Чолпон начала свой бизнес в животноводстве и полеводстве со стартовой суммой в 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря настойчивости  и упорному труду, Чолпон сумела развить свой бизнес  с хозяйством, насчитывающем 2 коровы с приплодом, 10 голов мелкого рогатого скота, плодоносящий сад, ежемесячный доход от продажи молока составляет сумму около 3,500 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Чолпон обратилась  в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 35,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов мелкого скота.  Доходы от кредита Чолпон планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие бизнеса.
texts.en:
Cholpon is a thirty-eight-year-old mother of 4. In 1997, looking for a new way to provide for her family, she began a farming and animal raising business from a starting capital of 10,000 soms. Thanks to her hard work and dedication, she was able to expand her business to include 2 cows with offspring, 10 heads of small-horned cattle and a monthly income of 3,500 soms generated by selling milk. 

Hoping to expand her business even more, she approached "Bai Tushum and Partners" with a request for a loan of 35,000 soms in order to purchase some livestock. Cholpon plans to reinvest profits from the loan back into her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Francisco Gonzalo

texts.es: Francisco vive en Montecristi ciudad cercana a Manta. Tiene 37 años y está casado con Maria quien es ama de casa. Tienen 3 hijos de 14, 11 y 7 años de edad quienes asisten a los establecimientos educativos del gobierno. Francisco tiene una pequeña microempresa de producción de botones de tagua, antes se dedicaba a la construcción como obrero pero se dio cuenta que este negocio le generaba mejores beneficios. Empezó el negocio porque un vecino la realiza y le iba bien, busco información dándose cuenta que el producto en otros países es muy apreciado. Tiene 10 años en el negocio contando con varias maquinas y el espacio adecuado para la producción. Ahora maneja una cartera de clientes y proveedores siendo así que tiene 2 ayudantes para la producción quienes trabajan de 7 de la mañana hasta las 5 de la tarde, su esposa Maria también le ayuda en sus ratos libres. Sus principales cliente son los talleres que confeccionan pantalones y camisas para la exportación. Recuerda cuando recién empezó y nunca imagino lo lejos que llegaría en su negocio tanto como para ser su principal fuente de ingresos y poder dar trabajo a personas que lo necesitan. El préstamo que solicita es para comprar pepas de tagua por sacos para la producción. Su meta a futura es comprar otras maquinas para poder producir más botones.
texts.en:
Francisco lives in Montecristi, a city close to Manta. He is 37 years old and is married to Maria, who is a housewife. They have three children who are 14, 11 and 7 years old, all of whom are attending government run schools. 

Francisco has a small business, making buttons from tagua seeds. Before he was working in construction as a laborer, but he realized this business would be more beneficial. He started the business because a neighbor had a similar business that was going well, he researched and found out that the product has a high value in other countries. He has had his business for ten years now, with various machines and a workspace for production. He now manages a portfolio of clients and providers. He has two employees who work in production from 7 a.m. until 5 p.m. His wife, Maria, also helps in her free time. His main clients are clothing workshops where they make pants and shirts for export. He remembers when he first started his business, that he never would have imagined how far he has come, that it has become his principal form of income and that he is able to give work to others that need it.   

The loan that he has requested is to buy bags of tagua seeds for production. His goal for the future is to buy more machines so that he can increase his production of buttons.

loans.use: to buy bags of tagua seeds to manufacture buttons.

loans.name: Las Triunfadoras De Canto Grande Group

texts.es: La Sra. Vanessa de 27 años de edad, es casada y tiene 1 hijo el cual aún depende de ella. Junto a su esposo, se dedica a la venta y reparación de muebles desde hace 10 años, negocio al cual le pusieron el nombre de “YONJIN” en honor a su primer hijo. Comenzó con la idea de obtener su terreno y construir su casa. Con su esfuerzo y trabajo ha logrado construir su casa y poder abrir su propio negocio. Actualmente su ingreso lo destina a cubrir los gastos de agua, luz y teléfono; mientras que su esposo cubre los gastos de alimentación. Su plan para el futuro es terminar de construir el segundo piso de su casa y comprarse un auto. Ella usó el crédito en la compra de materia prima para la carpintería. Vanessa pertenece a la alcancía comunal “Las Triunfadoras de Canto Grande”, el cual esta conformado por 7 personas y le pusieron dicho nombre debido a que en la zona donde viven las socias lleva el nombre de Canto Grande. Ella ocupa el cargo de presidenta desde hace 4 meses.
texts.en: Vanessa is 27; she is married and has one son who is still depends on her. Together with her husband, she has been selling and repairing furniture for the last ten years, a business which they have named ‘YONJIN’ in honour of their first son. She started out with the idea of acquiring land and building her house. With effort and work she has succeeded in building her house and has been able to open her own business. Currently her income goes to covering the gas, electric and telephone bills; whilst her husband covers food costs. Her plan for the future is to finish the second floor of her house and buy a car. She used the loan to buy raw material for the carpentry. Vanessa belongs to ‘Las Triunfadoras de Canto Grande’ communal bank, which is made up of 7 people and was given that name due to the area in which the members live being called Canto Grande. She has held the position of president for the last 4 months.

loans.use: to buy raw material for her business.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en: Stephen is a thirty-two-year-old married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He has a personal goal of educating his children to attain degrees as a minimum qualification. He has been operating a retail shop for ten years and his main hardship is inadequate capital to purchase enough stock that meets the demand. He has a vision of diversifying his business to include farming. Stephen needs a loan to buy general merchandise such as soap and salt to sell.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise such as soap and salt to sell.

loans.name: Houn

texts.en:
Houn is 40 years old. She is married and blessed with one child who lives with her in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in cultivating flowers and breeding pigs to sell for more than six years, earning approximately $2 per day. Her husband is a driver who earns about $6 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Houn is requesting a loan of $1,200 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Kahanda Tweyimukye Group

texts.en:
Muhamad is 45-year-old married man with six children living in Kyenjojo, Uganda. He is a tailor and has been in this field for fifteen years. He started as a farmer where he accumulated capital to start his current business. He faces a problem of inadequate capital to purchase stock. 

He has personal goals of educating his children and building a permanent home coupled with a business goal of expanding his business into new market areas. Muhamad wants a loan to buy cloth to sew. He is a member of a group where each member guarantees each other in accessing a loan.

loans.use: to buy cloth.

loans.name: Najah

texts.en:
Najah, 34 years old, is an illiterate woman. She is a housewife caring for five daughters and one son. 

Having a big family, Najah started a small business to help her husband and the family financially. Her business is selling female clothes and dresses.
Now she has applied for a loan in order to increase the quantity of clothes she has to sell in order to increase her revenue.

loans.use: to increase the quantity of clothes she has to sell.

loans.name: Las Divinas De La Union Group

texts.es: Sinónimo de perseverancia es "las Divinas de la Union", un grupo de mujeres  y hombres optimistas y  luchadores. Este grupo lleva ya formado 2 años, con 6 socias que son ejemplo de personas trabajadoras. La confianza que hay entre ellos no solo transcurre por el tiempo que llevan como grupo, también a su vez son vecinos. Seria grato comentar de cada una de las integrantes pero faltarían palabras. Por tanto mencionaremos a la señora Lourdes, una integrante de 40 años de edad esposa y madre de 2 hijos. Ella comienza su labor diaria con la venta de su bodega y por las tardes vende salchipapas, el cual le ha dado muchos frutos económicos desde hace más de 8 años, pudiendo ahorrar para los gastos de la casa y los estudios de sus hijos en el colegio. Con el presente préstamo lo invertirá en mejoras de su negocio e implementación del mismo. "La Divinas de la Union" un grupo de mujeres que con esmero y dedicación saben salir adelante con el paso de cada día
texts.en: The "Divinas de la Union" (Divine Ones of the Union) are synonymous with perseverance; they are a group of optimistic and strong-spirited men and women. This group has been together for 2 years and has 6 members who are all fine examples of hard-working people. The level of trust among the group has grown not only because of the time they have spent together as a group, but also because they are neighbors. We would love to be able to tell you about each of the members but we would run out of space. However, we will just mention Lourdes - a 40 year old member, wife and mother of 2 children. She starts work each day selling in her shop, and in the afternoons she sells 'salchipapas' (a dish of sliced frankfurter and chips), which has brought her much economic reward for the last 8 years and allowed her to save her money for household expenses and her children's education at school. She will invest this current loan in improving her business and its implementation. The "Divinas de  la Union" are a group of women who, with great care and dedication, know how to succeed with each passing day.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Sadeq

texts.en:
Sadig is a 33-year-old married man. He lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He is blessed with four children. He has been working in the ministry of finance with a monthly salary which he uses to support his family. 

He is applying for a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB. He will use the loan to purchase a laptop. He aspires to buy a house to live in with his family.

loans.use: to purchase a laptop for personal use.

loans.name: Mai

texts.en:
Mai is a 25-year-old single lady. She has two brothers and one sister, and she is the youngest of all of them.

Mai works in a factory to help support herself and the family. She also has a number of sheep and goats that she raises to sell and she also sells the milk. 

She has applied for this youth loan to buy a better quality of food and enhance her barn.

loans.use: to buy a better quality of food and enhance her barn.

loans.name: Sanaa

texts.en:
Sanaa, 20 years old, is a single lady, with four brothers. 

Sanaa is a university student majoring in business administration; she has applied for this loan to pay her fees for the semester.

Sanaa hope that after graduation she will find a job in her field to help her family and support herself.

loans.use: to pay her fees for the semester.

loans.name: Sor

texts.en:
Sor is 38 years old. She is married and resides with four children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband is a policeman in APSARA authority. He earns about $10 per day. Her children are still in her care. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Sor is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase will enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to run an additional business of selling vegetables in order to generate more income to support the family and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Leap

texts.en:
Leap is 31 years old. She is married and blessed with two children who live with her in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for more than two years, earning approximately $3 per day. Her husband runs a business purchasing brooms to resell. He earns about $5 per day.

In order to improve her family’s finances, Leap is requesting a loan of $1,000 to raise capital for her husband business so he can purchase more brooms to resell. By doing so, he will earn more profit to support the family. In the future, she would like to use the profit to expand her husband’s business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger so as to provide enough space for her family.

loans.use: to raise capital for her husband's business so he can purchase more brooms to resell.

loans.name: Rith

texts.en: Rith is 52 years old. She is married and resides with five children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been selling vegetables for more than three years, earning approximately $3 per day. Her husband is a soldier, who earns about $3 per day. Two of her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $6 per day. Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Rith is requesting a loan of $1,200 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would help her reduce her family's transportation expenses and help her children go to work on time. In the future, she would like to purchase cattle to breed and sell and help her children earn bachelors degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: To purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Mohammed

texts.en:
Mohammed is 31 years old. A single man, he lives in Taiz, Yemen. He tells us that with the help of his uncle, he has been able to move forward and maintain his business. He makes a living by distributing gas cylinders. Little by little he has moved forward. 

Currently, he applied for a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to buy gas cylinders for his business. He hopes to be able to expand his business so that he can get married.

loans.use: to buy gas cylinders for his business.

loans.name: Oumy

texts.fr:
Mme Oumy  mariée et mère de famille habite à quelques kilomètres de la ville principale, depuis 10 ans  elle  s’active dans l’artisanat en achetant des céréales qu’elle transforme ensuite  en couscous, sankal pour ensuite les revendre. Mme Oumy travaille de 10 h à 15 h, elle demande un crédit de 150 000 pour accroitre la quantité de céréales afin d’avoir plus de bénéfices pour pouvoir subvenir  à ses besoins. Avec l’octroi du crédit elle pourra aussi diversifier  les produits.
Mme Oumy  projette d’ augmenter son fond de roulement.
texts.en: Oumy is a married mother who lives a few kilometers from the main town.  She has been in the craft industry for 10 years, buying cereal, turning it into couscous and sankal, and then re-selling it.  Oumy works from 10.00am to 3.00pm.  She is requesting a loan for 150,000 francs to increase the quantity of cereals she has so that she can make more profits with which to cover her needs.  With the granting of her loan, Oumy will be able to diversify her products as well.  She plans to increase her working capital.

loans.use: to buy millet and corn to turn into couscous and sankal, and then sell

loans.name: Shafiqa

texts.en:
Shafiqa is 63 years old and the mother of 5 children. Her husband is a pickup driver. She sells clothes, and has a good reputation in the area she lives in. 
Her goal is to increase her capital, to buy more goods and to expand her business to include more areas in addition to where she lives. For that reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to buy more goods to sell.

loans.name: Chela Beatriz

texts.es:
La Señora Chela es socia del banco comunal Yanbal, vive por el sector de Balzay en Cuenca, este lugar tiene varios lugares  para visitar y practicar la pesca, existen cabañas para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente es amable, gentil y aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señora. Chela tiene 42 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos  de 18, 17 y 15 años de edad, su primer hijo cursa los estudios universitario y sus dos hijos siguientes están estudiando en un colegio de la ciudad, su esposo es ebanista y tiene su propio taller, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.
 
Doña Chela se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y cuidar de sus hijos, pero para aportar a la economía de su hogar labora en la venta de cosméticos de la marca Yanbal y trabaja en esta actividad de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo.

 Es socia del banco comunal hace 7 años, el dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir comprando cosméticos para tener una mayor variedad de productos. 

Su meta es ver que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Chela is a member of the communal bank "Yanbal."  She lives in the Balzay neighborhood of Cuenca.  In this area there are a lot of places to visit and places to fish, and there are cabins where one can enjoy nature.  The people here are friendly and gracious, and they still maintain the culture and traditions of their towns.

Chela is 42 years old and is married.  She and her husband have 3 children, aged 18, 17 and 13.  Her oldest son has completed some university classes, and the other two continue to study in a school in the city.  Her husband is a cabinetmaker and has his own workshop.  They own the house that they live in.

Chela devotes herself to the household chores and care of their children, but in order to support the household finances she also works selling Yanbal brand cosmetics.  She works in this activity every day without a fixed schedule.

Chela has been a member of her communal bank for 7 years.  She will use the money from this loan to buy cosmetics so that she has a greater variety of products.  Her goal is to see her children become professionals.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics

loans.name: Alicia Guillermina

texts.es:
La Señora Alicia es socia del banco comunal Yanbal, vive por el sector de Hierba Buena en Cuenca, este lugar que es de clima frió, tiene varios lugares  para visitar y disfrutar de la belleza que nos regala la naturaleza, su gente es amable, gentil y aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señora Alicia tiene 25 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 9 y 7 años de edad que están estudiando en una escuelita de la localidad, su esposo es de profesión chofer y labora realizando fletes a diferentes lugares, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

Doña Alicia se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y al cuidado de sus hijos, también tiene una tienda desde hace 5 años y  trabaja de domingo a domingo desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche. En su casa cría cuyes, cerdos y pollos a los que los vende en su comunidad. 

En el banco comunal se encuentra en el cuarto crédito y lo va a invertir comprando víveres para surtir su tienda.

Su meta es agrandar mucho mas se negocio.
texts.en:
Alicia is a member of the communal bank "Yanbal."  She lives in the Hierba Buena neighborhood of Cuenca.  This is a place with a cold climate, where there are various places to visit and enjoy the beauty of nature.  The people here are friendly and gracious, and they still maintain the culture and traditions of their towns.

Alicia is 25 years old and married.  She and her husband have 2 children aged 9 and 7 who study in the local school.  Her husband is a driver who transports freight to different places.  They own the house that they live in.

Alicia devotes herself to the household chores and care of their children, and she also works in a store that she's had for 5 years.  She works in the store every day from 6am until 7pm.  At her house she also raises guinea pigs, pigs and chickens that she sells in her community.

In her communal bank, she is in her 4th loan cycle, and she will use this loan to buy groceries to stock her store.

Her goal is expand the business a lot.

loans.use: to buy groceries

loans.name: Luz Esperanza

texts.es:
La Señora. Luz es socia del banco comunal Yanbal, vive por el sector de Balzay en Cuenca, este lugar tiene varios lugares  para visitar y practicar la pesca, existen cabañas para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente es amable, gentil y aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña Luz tiene 40 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 16, 14 y 8 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos estudian en el colegio y su ultima hija está en la escuela, su esposo es de profesión chofer y labora conduciendo transporte pesado, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.
 
La Señora Luz tiene un restaurante hace 12 años y labora de viernes a domingo sin horario, los demás días se dedica a su familia y también en sus tiempos libres vende cosméticos de la marca Yanbal. 

Es socia de la banca comunal hace 5 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir comprando víveres para su restaurante.

Su sueño es viajar por el mundo.
texts.en:
Luz is a member of Yanbal communal bank. She lives in the Balzay area of Cuenca. This area has several places to visit and fish; there are cabins to enjoy nature and its people are kind and courteous, and still maintain the culture and traditions of their towns.

Luz is 40; she is married and her marriage has produced three children aged 16, 14 and 8. Her first two children study in secondary school and their last daughter is in primary school. Her husband is a driver and works driving heavy goods transport. The house in which she lives is her property.

Luz has had a restaurant for 12 years and works from Friday to Sunday without fixed hours. The other days she looks after her family, and in her spare time she also sells Yanbal branded cosmetics.

She has been a member of the communal bank for 5 years and she is going to invest her new loan in buying supplies for her restaurant.

Her dream is to travel the world.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Jose Heriberto

texts.es: Don Heriberto tiene 47 años de edad, es casado  y tiene cinco hijos, su esposa se dedica  a los quehaceres del hogar, ellos residen en la Aldea las Piñuelas, Catacamas, Olancho. Don Heriberto desde hace nueve años comenzó a trabajar la agricultura e inicio sembrando maíz y frijoles, con el tiempo comenzó a tomar experiencia y en la actualidad también se dedica a cultivar sandia, su horario de trabajo es de todo el día, la ventaja es que cuando el clima esta bien la cosecha se produce bien. El préstamo que solicita don Heriberto lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de abono, urea, fertilizantes y pago de mano de obra. Los problemas que enfrenta son el riego del cultivo que en algunas ocasiones puede ser mucha agua que dañe el cultivo o falta de agua para el cultivo, las plagas que perjudican el grano y al momento de vender el producto la baja de los precios. Su meta es hacer crecer sus cultivos y que este en buenas condiciones para la venta. Don Heriberto tiene 3 ciclos de trabajar con los préstamos de FAMA y ha cancelado sus cuotas de manera puntual y los préstamos obtenidos le han ayudado a mejorar su condición de vida.
texts.en: Heriberto is 47 years old, married, and has five children. His wife tends to the house; they live in the village of Las Piñuelas, Catacamas, Olancho. Heriberto has been working in agriculture for nine years: he started with sweetcorn and black beans, and, with time, became more experienced. He now also grows watermelons. He works all day long. An advantage he has is that when the weather is favourable, the crops grow well. Heriberto asks for a loan because he needs the money to buy manure, urea, and chemical fertilisers, and to hire help. The problems he faces have to do with watering the crops (sometimes there is too much water, which is harmful, and sometimes there is not enough water), fighting parasites, and, when the times come to sell the produce, the risk of a drop in prices. His goal is to make his crops grow and to have a harvest in good condition for selling. Heriberto is in his third cycle with field partner FAMA's loans; he has always been punctual with his repayments and the loans he obtained helped him improve his standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertiliser and to hire help.

loans.name: Srey Leak

texts.en:
Srey Leak is 24 years old. She is married and resides with her two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia.

To earn a living, she has been running a nail salon for more than five years. By doing so, she earns approximately $3 per day. Her husband runs a motor taxi service, which enables him to earn approximately $4 per day.

Because her husband's current present motorbike is old, Srey Leak is requesting a loan in the amount of $700 to purchase a new motorbike for her husband so that he can better run his service. Specifically, this purchase would enable her husband to attract more customers and earn more income to support their family. In the future, she would like to run a pig farm and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she plans to build a new kitchen.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorbike for her husband's taxi service

loans.name: Patilpamba  (Nabón) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Patilpamba está formado por 7 socias y 1 socio, quienes viven por el cantón Nabón, lugar de clima frió que está rodeado por una exuberante vegetación donde se puede respirar la tranquilidad del campo. Su gente es amable, gentil y aun mantienen su vestimenta, tradiciones y cultura de sus pueblos, se dedican a laborares del campo, a la cría de animales y muchos en especial los jóvenes salen diariamente a la ciudad a laborar en diferentes actividades económicas. 

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Lidia, tiene 44 años, esa casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 9 hijos, 3 viven independientes, 2 trabajan, le ayudan económicamente y estudian a distancia, 3 estudian en una escuela de la localidad y su ultimo hijo pasa en casa ya que tiene 5 años de edad. Su esposo labora como jornalero, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

Doña Lidia se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y para mejora su situación económica se dedica a la cría de borregos, gallinas, cuyes, cerdos y ganado a los cuales los vende en su comunidad. También se dedica  a la agricultura y lo que su cosecha es para su consumo y para la venta.
  
Este es el primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada por una vecina. Su crédito lo va a invertir comprando animales y abono para sus potreros.
 
Su meta es construir un galpón más grande para la cría de gallinas.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Patilpamba" is made up of 7 women and 1 man.  They live in the Nabon canton, a place with a cold climate that is surrounded by lush vegetation, where the landscapes give one a peaceful feeling. The people here are gracious and friendly, and they still maintain their traditional clothing, culture and other traditions in their towns.  The population of this area works in agriculture and livestock production, and many, especially the youths, leave daily to go to the city and work in a variety of economic activities.

Lidia devotes herself to the household chores, and to improve her financial situation she also raises sheep, hens, guinea pigs, pigs and cows that she sells in her community.  She also grows crops; part of the harvest is for her family's consumption and she sells the other part.

This is the first loan that she has taken from her communal bank, where she was invited to join by a neighbor.  She will use the loan to buy animals  and fertilizers for her fields.  Her goal is to build a bigger shed for raising hens.

loans.use: to buy animals and fertilizer

loans.name: Thoung

texts.en:
Thoung is 30 years old. She is married and blessed with one child. She and her family live in Takeo Province, Cambodia.

To earn a living, she has been involved in cultivating agricultural crops for more than seven years. By doing so, she earns approximately $2 per day. Her husband runs a motor taxi service, which allows him to earn approximately $4 per day.

Because her husband's current motorbike is old, Thoung is requesting a loan in the amount of $700 to purchase a new motorbike for her husband so that he can better run his service. Specifically, this purchase would help him attract more customers and earn more income to support their family. In the future, she would like to build a new house and to send her child to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorbike for her husband's taxi service

loans.name: Hilda Geraldine

texts.es: Común mente vemos historias de personas emprendedoras y con mucho positivismo para los negocios, pero en este caso esta es la historia de una joven estudiante con muchos deseos se surgir, con estudios que en el futuro le aseguren un puesto de trabajo y así desempeñarse en un ámbito laboral estable. Este es el caso de Hilda Geraldine de 20 años de edad, ella vive en casa de sus padres los cuales le dan todo el apoyo necesario para salir adelante en los estudios. Hilda Geraldine estudia Ciencias de la Comunicacion  en la universidad Alas Peruanas, ella se esmera todo el día para poder obtener buenas calificaciones y estar entre los primeros de su clase, en el futuro tiene pensado especializar su carrera y así surgir económicamente y darse un estilo de vida estable. Con el reciente préstamo lo invertirá en pago de sus estudios y juntar para la titulación, el cual le es un poco costoso. No puedo concluir sin antes mencionar el empeño y deseo de superación de Hilda Geraldine para salir adelante y abrirse paso entre tanta competitividad que hoy en día hay.
texts.en: It is common to see stories of entrepreneurial people with great positive energy for their businesses, but in this case we have the story of a young student with a great desire to get ahead, through studies that will ensure her a job in the future so that she can reach her potential in a stable work environment. This is the case of Hilda Geraldine, who is 20 years old. She lives in the home of her parents, who give her all of the necessary support to be successful in her studies. Hilda Geraldine is studying Communication Sciences, at the Alas Peruanas University. She works hard all day so that she can obtain good qualifications and be among the top students of her class. In the future she plans to become a specialist and thus get ahead economically and provide herself with a stable standard of living. She will invest the recent loan in paying for her studies and saving up for the awarding of her degree, which is a bit expensive. In conclusion, it should be noted that Hilda Geraldine is highly dedicated with a great desire to improve herself, get ahead, and make a place for herself in today's competitive environment.

loans.use: to pay her monthly tuition.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco de 40 años de edad, vive junto a su madre y una hermana, juntos se dedican  a la agricultura de frijoles y maíz, los cuales comercializan por mayor en diferentes lugares de la zona. Así mismo cría ganado vacuno de engorde el cual posteriormente comercializa a muy buenos precios. Francisco solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar alimento para las vacas, así mismo para comprar semillas de frijoles y maíz para sembrar, este es la única fuente de ingresos con la que cuenta por lo que desea mucho mejorarlo. Él es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora, quien desea salir adelante junto a su madre y su hermana para poder contar con una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Francisco is 40, and lives with his mother and one sister. Together they farm, growing beans and corn, which they sell at wholesale in various places in the area. As well, he raises cattle for fattening, that he later sells at very good prices. 

Francisco is applying for a loan that will enable him to buy cattle feed, as well as corn and bean seeds for planting. This is the only source of income he has, so he greatly wishes to improve it. 

He is a very responsible and hard-working person, who wishes to succeed, together with his mother and sister, so that they can have a better life.

loans.use: To buy cows to sell.

loans.name: Ciudad Real Group

texts.es: Ciudad Real asi se llama este grupo de mujeres luchadoras y optimistas para los negocios propios que tiene como fuente de ingresos para ella y sus familias. Este grupo lleva ya formado 6 años, es un grupo de muy buenas expectativas de negocio, conformado por 7 integrantes, el cual todas con una historia en particular, tal es así el caso de la señora Fany de 33 años de edad, conviviente y madre de 2 hijos los cuales aun siguen en  el colegio. Ella se dedica todos los días a la venta de desayunos en un puesto de mercado, el cual le ha generado ganancias para sustentar los gastos en el hogar. Con el reciente préstamo piensa invertirlo en la compra de mercadería para su negocio. Como la señora Fany, cada integrante del grupo tiene una historia en particular pero entre todas coinciden en el deseo y el esfuerzo de salir siempre adelante por el bienestar de ellas y sus familias
texts.en: Ciudad Real (Royal City) is the name of this group of women who fight for and are optimistic about their businesses.  These businesses are a source of income for the women and their families.  This group formed six years ago and has high expectations for the businesses.  It is made up of seven members, each with their own history, as is the case with Fany.  Fany is 33-years-old and lives with her two children who are still in school.  She works every day selling breakfasts in a market stall.  This has generated profits that support the household expenses.  With her recent loan, she is planning to invest in merchandise for her business.  Like Fany, each group member has her own story, but all have the same hope and effort to always move forward for their well-being and that of their families.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Khem

texts.en:
From Takeo Province, Cambodia, Khem is 47 years old, married and has three children. For ten years she has farmed rice and fattened animals to sell, earning approximately 2 USD a day. Her husband is employed in a resort. He earns about 4 USD a day. Her children are employed and earn about 12 USD a day.

Because of difficulties with her family’s transportation, Khem is requesting a loan of 500 USD from KREDIT to buy a motorbike for commuting purposes. This purchase would enable her to save money on transportation expenses that could be used to support the family.

Khem’s ambition is to increase her income and rebuild her house to make it more convenient and comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Vanny

texts.en:
From Takeo Province, Cambodia, Vanny is 43 years old, married and has three children. She has been selling groceries for more than two years, earning approximately 5 USD a day. Her husband is a policeman who earns about 3 USD a day. Her children are still in her care.

Because of difficulties with her family’s transportation, Vanny is requesting a loan of 1000 USD from KREDIT to buy a motorbike for commuting purposes. This purchase would enable her to save money on transportation expenses that could be used to support the family.

Vanny’s ambition is to expand her grocery store and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. She would also like to build a fence around her house.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike for commuting purposes.

loans.name: Srey Mom

texts.en:
Srey Mom is 27 years old. She is married and blessed with one child. She and her family live in Kandal Province, Cambodia.

To earn a living, she has been selling groceries for more than six years. Additionally, she is a tailor. She explains that she earns approximately $5 per day. Her husband is a construction worker, but he also works as a rice farmer, and he typically earns approximately $500 per day.

In order to improve her family's standard of living, Srey Mom is requesting a loan in the amount of $500 to purchase fertilizer and rice seeds in order to cultivate rice. By doing so, she should be able to earn more money to support her family. In the future, she would like to expand her grocery store and to send her child to a good school. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and rice seeds for rice cultivation

loans.name: Mujeres Triunfadoras Group

texts.es: Ricardo de 62 años es viudo y tiene 04 hijos 01 de ellos aún dependiente.  Actualmente cuenta con un negocio de cabinas de internet, lleva en este negocio hace mas de 02 años, también brinda servicio de gasfitería de donde obtiene un ingreso mas para su hogar. Ricardo es un padre empeñoso pues con su trabajo y esfuerzo a podido mejorar su negocio, ya que en la actualidad cuenta con 10 máquinas. Él fue uno de los afectados por el huayco, donde se dañaron algunas de sus máquinas. Con el fin de mejorar solicito el crédito, ya que lo utilizara para el mantenimiento de sus computadoras.  Ricardo es integrante de la Alcancía Comunal “Mujeres Triunfadoras” y está conformado por 09 socios. Ellos agradecen el crédito brindado.   Ricardo está ubicado en la parte posterior, es el tercero del lado derecho viste casaca azul y polo blanco.
texts.en: Ricardo is 62-years-old and is a widower with four children, one of which is still dependent on him.  Currently, he has an internet café business which he has had for more than two years.  He also has a plumbing business where he earns more income for his household.  Ricardo is a determined father.  With his work and effort he has been able to improve his business which currently has 10 computers.  He was one of the people affected by a mudslide which damaged some of his machines.  He is requesting the loan to improve things so he will use it to do maintenance on his computers.  Ricardo is a member of the communal bank “Mujeres Triunfadores” (Triumphant Women), which is made up of nine members.  They are thankful for the loans they have been offered.  Ricardo is located in the back of the photo, he is the third from the right, dressed in a blue jacket and a white shirt.

loans.use: to do maintenance on computers.

loans.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es:
La Sra. Rosa es una mujer quien trabaja como profesora en una escuela de primaria pública desde hace 18 años, es casada y cuya familia está conformada 2 hijos y su esposo.

La Sra. Rosa es su segundo crédito que tiene con nuestra institución y lo quiere para comprar material para construcción como: cemento, bloque, hierro y pago de mano de obra para darle mejor condición de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa is a woman who works as a teacher in a public primary school.  She has worked there for 18 months, is married, and has a family made up of two children and her husband.

This is Rosa’s second loan with our organization and she wants to use it to buy construction material like: cement, concrete blocks, rebar and to pay laborers.  This will improve the living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to improve the house by repairing the bedroom.

loans.name: Samphors

texts.en:
Samphors, age 25, is a tailor. She in unmarried and lives with her mother and other family members in Battambang Province, Cambodia, and they are both involved in tailoring. They earn about $6 per day. 

Samphors wants to help to repair and rebuild the house where they live. With this goal in mind, Samphors is requesting a loan of $700 to purchase timbers for building. This money will help her provide better living conditions for her family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her tailoring business in order to generate more income to support the family.

loans.use: to purchase timbers for making essential repairs to her house

loans.name: Savan

texts.en:
From Prey Veng Province, Cambodia, Savan is 35 years old, married and blessed with one child. She has been making baskets to sell for more than four years and earns approximately 3 USD a day. Her husband is an arc welder who earns about 7 USD a day.

In order to improve her husband’s business, Savan is requesting a 1000 USD loan from KREDIT to buy more steel for her husband to use in his business. This money will help build her husband’s business and earn more income to support the family.

Savan’s ambition is to rebuild her present house to make it more convenient and comfortable for her family and send her child to a good school.

loans.use: to buy more steel.

loans.name: Jumagul

texts.ru: Жумагул 62 года, вдова, воспитала 2 детей, заботится о племяннике 13 лет. В 1996 году, в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи, Жумагул начала свой бизнес в животноводстве и полеводстве со стартовой суммой в 15,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря настойчивости  и упорному труду, Жумагул сумела развить свой бизнес  с хозяйством, насчитывающем 6 коров с приплодом, 10 голов мелкого рогатого скота, 2 лошади, 3 га орошаемой земли с картофелем и зерновыми культурами, ежемесячный доход от продажи молока составляет сумму около 7,500 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Жумагул обратилась  в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов мелкого скота.  Доходы от кредита Жумагул планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие бизнеса.
texts.en:
Jumagul is a sixty-two year old widow. She's raised two children and is now caring for her thirteen-year-old nephew. In 1996, searching for a new source of income, she began a farming and animal raising business from a starting capital of 15,000 soms (KGS). Thanks to her hard work and dedication, her business has grown to include 6 cows with offspring, 10 heads of small-horned cattle, 2 horses, 3 hectares of land she uses to grow potatoes and grain crops on and a monthly income of 7,500 soms (KGS) by selling milk. 

Hoping to expand to her business even further, Jumagul approached "Bai Tushum and Partners" with a request for a loan of 70,000 soms (KGS) in order to purchase some small-horned cattle. She plans to reinvest the profits from the loan back into her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Sareith

texts.en:
Sareith is a 42-year-old, married woman. She resides with her husband and three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia.

To earn a living, she works as a tailor. By doing so, she earns approximately $3 per day. Her husband is a chef, as well as a rice farmer, and he typically earns approximately $4 per day.

In order to improve her family’s standard of living, Sareith is requesting a loan in the amount of $1,000 to purchase more farmland to use for cultivating rice. In this way, she should be able to generate more income to support her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and to help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more farmland for rice cultivation

loans.name: Sovan

texts.en:
Sovan, age 53, is a farmer. He has been involved in growing agricultural crops for more than ten years, earning approximately $8 per day. He resides with his wife in Battambang Province, Cambodia. His wife helps him run the business. 

In order to improve his family’s finances, Sovan is requesting a loan in the amount of $1,000 to purchase piglets to breed, fatten, and eventually offer for sale. By entering into this venture, he will earn an additional line of income to support the family. 

In the future, he would like to expand his business and to rebuild the house in which they live in order to make it more comfortable for the family.

loans.use: to purchase piglets to breed, fatten, and eventually offer for sale

loans.name: Saroeurn

texts.en: Saroeurn is 42 years old. She is married and blessed with three children. She lives in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice and fattening animals for more than twenty years, earning approximately $2 per day. Her husband runs a taxi service (motor taxi). He earns about $7 per day. Her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $12 per day. Because their present motorbike is old, Saroeurn is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase a new motorbike for her husband to run his service. This purchase will help her husband attract more customers and earn more income to support their family. In the future, she would like to run an additional business that distills alcohol. She also would like to rebuild her house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: To purchase a new motorbike for her husband to run his taxi service

loans.name: Touch

texts.en:
Touch is a 40-year-old, married woman. She and her husband reside with their five children in Takeo Province, Cambodia.

To earn a living, she has been involved in the agricultural business for more than twenty years. Specifically, she cultivates rice and raises pigs. She explains that she has extensive experience and has been successful throughout her career. She typically earns approximately $5 per day from her work. Her husband helps her run the business. Two of her children are employed in a garment factory, and they earn approximately $4 per day.

Due to difficulties relating to her family’s transportation needs, Touch is requesting a loan in the amount of $1,200 to purchase a motorbike for her family's commuting needs to better support their family. In the future, she would like to expand her pig farm and to help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting purposes

loans.name: Fe En Dios Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece  al banco comunal FE EN DIOS; este banco está situado en el distrito de  Wanchaq en la provincia  de Cusco departamento de Cusco.

La socia Yomira tiene 32 años es separada  y tiene 2 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ropa, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone  a su negocio, la socia cuenta con una pequeña tienda donde vende toda su mercadería a la vez la socia también lo distribuye  a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia es una persona  alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de casacas para su negocio.

Los otros socios se dedican a la venta de repuestos para autos, manualidades, venta de productos naturales, fotocopiadora, restaurante.

Las socias que salieron adjuntas en la foto son socias que pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunion por motivos de trabajo.

La socia agradece este medio por el cual le facilita el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.
texts.en:
Yomira is a member of the Communal Bank “Fe en Dios” (Faith in God), which is located in the District of Wanchaq in Cusco Province, Department of Cusco.

She is 32 years old, separated from her spouse, and has two children.  Yomira divides her time between her daily activities and her business of buying and selling clothes.  She has been in this business for years and has done well thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  Yomira has a small shop where she sells all of her merchandise, but she also delivers goods to her customers upon request.  She is a cheerful and responsible person who has the drive to continue working on behalf of her family.  The loan she is requesting will be used to buy jackets for her business.  

The other members have businesses that involve selling auto parts, producing handmade goods, selling natural products, offering photocopy services, and managing a restaurant.  

Yomira is grateful to have this means of accessing credit and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy jackets.

loans.name: Khalida

texts.en:
Khalida, age 38, makes and sells a local kind of yogurt called jameed, which is a specialty from her city. She has developed the skill to prepare this product through years of experience, which led her to start a business selling it to nearby shops and neighbors. 

Khalida's husband husband serves with the military. They have four children.

Khalida has applied for this loan in order to increase the quantity of jameed that she makes. This will allow her to reach out to more distant areas and sell her product to food stores and restaurants.

loans.use: to make larger quantities of yogurt to offer for sale

loans.name: Cristian Tomás

texts.es: El señor Cristian, quien trabaja con vehículos desde hace años, ha solicitado el crédito para poder utilizarlo como capital de operaciones en su actividad de transporte. Él no ha podido reunir el efectivo para mejorar su negocio, por lo que se apersonó buscando alguien que le ayude; de ese modo se le ofertó un crédito que se adecue a sus necesidades, que pueda pagar en cuotas cómodas y que además le ayude en su negocio de transportista. El vehículo que reparará le ayudará a generar mejores ingresos y así conseguir una vida mejor y más digna.
texts.en: Cristian has worked on vehicles for years.  He has asked for the loan to be able to use it as working capital in his transportation activity.   He hasn’t been able to gather the cash to improve his business which is why he came by looking for someone to help him.  In this way he was offered a loan that will meet his needs, that he can repay in comfortable installments and which will help him with his transportation business.  The vehicle he’ll repair will help him generate better income thus attaining a better, more proper life.

loans.use: to purchase brakes, car parts, and fuel

loans.name: Ana María

texts.es: La señora Ana María es viuda: su esposo falleció hace 5 años en un accidente de tránsito dejándola a ella con una hija de 1 año. La vida de Ana María fue difícil, ya que  prácticamente ella cuidó sola a su hija Mariela que ahora tiene 7 años.  Ana María actualmente trabaja en una empresa  que vende productos lácteos, y es querida por sus superiores ya que es una mujer perseverante y luchadora. Además tiene su propio negocio de venta de pastillas, dulces y regalos. Esta actividad la realiza en las noches en la puerta de un local. Vive a 60 minutos de la ciudad en uno de los barrios más pobres de Cochabamba. No tiene casa, vive con una de sus amigas. Hace poco tiempo su hija enfermó y ella tuvo que gastar el dinero de su capital de trabajo, motivo por el cual solicita el presente crédito.
texts.en:
Sra. Ana María is a widow.  Her husband died five years ago in a traffic accident, thus leaving her with their one daughter.  Life has been difficult for Ana María since she must practically raise her daughter Mariela, who is now seven years old, by herself.  

Ana María currently works at a company that sells dairy products.  She is admired by her superiors because she is a persevering and determined woman. In addition, she has her own business of selling mints, candies, and gifts.  She engages in this activity in the evenings from the doorstep of a shop.  Ana María lives 60 minutes away from the city in one of the poorest neighborhoods of Cochabamba.  She does not own a home and currently lives with one of her friends.  

Her daughter recently became ill, so she had to use the money from her operating capital in order to pay for her care.  This is the reason why she is requesting this current loan.

loans.use: to buy candies and gifts.

loans.name: Eduardo Antonio

texts.es: Eduardo nació en Quininde provincia de Esmeraldas, recuerda de su ciudad natal lo hermosa que es por la variedad de frutas que se cultivan. Hace más de 15 años que vive en Quevedo por decisión de sus padres quienes migraron buscando un mejor futuro para sus hijos. Ahora tiene 26 años sigue en Quevedo y tiene su propia familia por la que lucha día a día. Está casado con Elsa quien es ama de casa dedicándose al cuidado de sus hijos de 2 años y 4 meses de edad. Eduardo se dedica a la compra y venta de chatarra esto lo realiza luego de quedarse desempleado, cuando finalizo su contrato recibió una liquidación con la que compro una tricimoto y empezó su trabajo. Se decidió por esta actividad por un tío quien le indico que es rentable, y le enseño la forma del trabajo. Empieza desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 2 de la tarde recorriendo varios sectores, tiene un micrófono con el que vocifera la compra de artículos en mal estado, luego va al lugar de acopio y lo vende. Es una forma de ganarse su sustento diario a la vez que ayuda al medioambiente, esto por las múltiples compañas del gobierno para convertir al Ecuador en un país ecológico. El crédito que solicita Eduardo es para tener capacidad de financiamiento y poder comprar la chatarra, esperando reunir dinero para la compra de un carro con lo cual ampliaría sus recorridos.
texts.en:
Eduardo was born in Quininde, province of Esmeraldas.  He remembers how beautiful his hometown was because of the variety of fruits that are grown.  He has lived in Quevedo for more than 15 years because his parents migrated in search of a better future for their children.  Now he is 26 years old and is still in Quevedo.  He has his own family and fights every day for them.  He is married to Elsa, a housewife who works taking care of their children, ages 2 years and 4 months.

Eduardo has worked buying and selling junk since he lost his job.  When his contract ended he received a settlement, with which he bought a three-wheeled motorcycle and began his job.  He decided on this job because an uncle told him it was profitable and taught him the job.  He works from 7 in the morning until 2 in the afternoon, covering various areas.  He has a microphone to announce the purchase of articles in bad condition.  Then he goes to the collection area and sells it.

This is a way to earn his daily living and at the same time help the environment, because of the multiple government campaigns to turn Ecuador into an ecological country.

The loan Eduardo is requesting is to have financing to be able to buy the junk.  He is hoping to get together money to buy a car, with which he would expand his routes.

loans.use: to buy junk.

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann is involved in a direct sales business. She offers different cosmetic products and fashion clothing for men, women, and children. She has been engaged in this work for two years. She lives in the local community of Diduyun Maddela with her two children. Her husband is an Overseas Filipino Worker.

Mary Ann is genuinely thankful because she has been able to improve the family's standard of living through the profits from her business as well as from remittance from her husband. The couple aims to secure a quality education for their two children. This motivates them both to work hard in order to achieve the dreams and goals they have for their children.

Mary Ann would like to buy a new stock of cosmetic products and different kinds of fashion clothes for men, women, and children, which will allow her to earn a higher income. Due to the increasing costs of household expenses, the capital intended for her business is no longer enough for her to make these purchases. This is why she is asking for a loan of PhP 50,000.

She is confident that she can expand her direct sales business and thus to be able to support her children's education and improve the family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a new stock of cosmetic products and different kinds of fashion clothes for men, women, and children to offer for sale

loans.name: Rima

texts.en:
Rima is a 34-year-old teacher. She is married to a private sector employee.

In her free time after work, she makes embroidered art pieces and crafts to sell.
 
She will use this loan to buy fabric for making more embroidered table covers to sell. She hopes that she can open a workshop for teaching women in her area how to create embroidered art.

loans.use: To buy more fabric

loans.name: Karina Pilar

texts.es:
Karina es una mujer que se caracteriza por ser responsable, trabajadora. Tiene 20 años, vive con sus padres Pujilí que se encuentra cerca de Latacunga.

Karina trabaja con su mamá en la crianza y venta de animales como ganado, cerdos. Karina solicita un crédito a Fodemi para invertir en la compra de una ternera que pronto utilizará en la producción de leche y también comprará crías de cerdo. Esta inversión permitirá a su familia obtener mejores ingresos económicos y para Karina ayudará a seguir pagando sus estudios.

Karina sueña en comprarse un terreno para poder criar más animalitos.
texts.en: Karina is a woman who is known for being responsible and hard working. She is 20 years old and she lives with her parents in Pujili which is located near Laracunga. Karina works with her mother raising and selling animals such as cows and pigs. Karina is asking for a loan from Fodemi to purchase a calf that she will soon use to collect milk and also purchase young pigs. This investment will allow her family to obtain a better income, and for Karina in particular, help her continue to pay for her studies. Karina's dream is to purchase land to raise more animals.

loans.use: purchase a calf and young pigs to grow her business.

loans.name: Juana Maria

texts.es:
Juana tiene 42 años, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Zaña en el Norte del Peru en una zone que se caracteriza por ser  agrícola, ganadera y turística. Ella es una cliente recurrente que ha demonstrado ser puntual y responsable.

Juana se dedica a la comercialización de animales de corral (ovejas y  chanchos), los cría en los corrales que tiene en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales, una vez que hayan completado su crecimiento, los vende a sus clientes o en los diferentes mercados. Ademas cuenta con un mototaxi que la ayuda a ella y a su familia a transportar su mercancia.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 soles para comprar animales y su respectivo alimento, ademas de reparar y mantener el lugar donde se encuentran los animales. Ella quiere mucho a sus animales y a su negocio en general y quiere seguir manteniendolo en buen estado.
texts.en:
Juana is 42-years-old living with her husband and children in her own house that only has electricity and is located in the rural part of Zaña District in northern Peru; it’s a zone that’s noted for farming, animal husbandry and tourism.  She is a recurring client who has demonstrated punctuality and responsibility.

Juana sells small farm animals (sheep and pigs).  She raises them in corrals in her back yard.  She feeds them nutritionally balanced feed and natural grasses.  Once they complete their growth she sells them to her customers or in various markets.  She also has a mototaxi which helps her and her family to transport their merchandise.

She’s asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1500 soles to buy animals, their respective feed and also to repair and mantain the animals' yard. She very much likes her animals and her business in general, and wants to continue maintaining them in good condition.

loans.use: to buy animals, animal feed and to repair her corrals.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana, es soltera y no tiene hijos, vive en la casa de sus padres ocupando solo una habitación pequeña con paredes de ladrillo y el piso de tierra, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Llojeta de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente trabaja como profesora de primaria por más de cinco horas al día ya que debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación y servicios básicos de su familia; es por eso que solicita el crédito ya que desea comprar libros didácticos de primaria para actualizarse y con lo poco que gana no le alcanza.
El sueño de Juana es mejorar sus ingresos y poder independizarse para mejorar su calidad de vida y tener más comodidad.
Es la segunda vez que solicita el crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Juana is single and does not have children. She lives in her parents' house where she occupies one small brick walled room with a dirt floor. The house is located in the Llojeta area of the city of La Paz. 

She currently works as a primary school teacher for more than five hours a day as she has to cover food costs and basic services for her family. This is why she is asking for a loan because she wants to buy didactic books to update her knowledge as the little money she makes is not enough. 

Juana's dream is to improve her income and be able to be more independent so she can improve her quality of life and be more comfortable. 

This is the second loan she has requested with IMPRO and the first with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy didactic books for primary education to update and pass on information to her students at the primary school where she works.

loans.name: Cruz Margarita

texts.es: Cruz de 49 años vive alquila una casa en la ciudad de Quevedo, en ella vive con su hijo ya que es madre soltera. La casa que alquila es de cemento y cuenta con los servicios de agua, luz y camino pavimentado. Su hijo tiene 15 años y estudia en el colegio fiscal del Quevedo. Cruz se dedica a la costura desde los 26 años cuando se graduó de la academia. La actividad la inicio con una maquina domestica que compro en una casa comercial con financiamiento, como debía pagar las cuotas empezó a ofrecer sus servicios. Al principio sus clientes eran familiares y amigos pero poco a poco fue mejorando ya que ellos le hacían publicidad. Hace 2 años cambio su domicilio ya que necesitaba algo más amplio para colocar sus maquinas ya que cuenta con 2 maquinas de coser, una overlock y mesas para cortar. Por ese motivo adecuo la sala de casa para poner el taller ya que tiene un ayudante y necesita espacio. Trabaja de lunes a sábado todo el día y cuando tiene trabajo que entregar descansa cuando lo termina ya que le gusta ser puntual. Confecciona en su mayoría vestido de fiesta, ternos, uniformes y realiza arreglos de prendas si se lo solicitan. Cruz está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de una recubridora y cortadora para agilizar su trabajo. Su sueño es tener un local donde abrir el taller para brindar un mejor servicio.
texts.en: Cruz is 49-years-old and rents a house in the city of Quevedo where she lives with her son, as she is a single mother.  The house she rents is made of cement and has electricity and running water, as well as paved roads accessing it.  Her son is 15-years-old and studies in the accounting school of Quevedo.  Cruz has worked as a seamstress since she was 26-years-old, when she graduated from the academy.  She began with a personal sewing machine that she bought from a shopping center on credit, and to make the payments she began to offer her services as a seamstress.  In the beginning, her customers were relatives and friends, but little by little business improved as they spread the word.  Two years ago, she changed houses as she needed a larger place to fit her machines as now she has two sewing machines, an overlock machine, and cutting tables.  With this in mind, she uses the living room of the house for her workshop as now she has a helper and needs the space.  She works Monday through Saturday, all day, and when she has an order to complete, she only rests when she is done because she likes to be punctual.  She mostly makes party dresses, suits, and uniforms; as well as doing repairs on garments if that is asked of her.  Cruz is requesting the loan to buy upholstery sewing machine and a cutting machine to speed up her work.  Her dream is to have a shop where she can open her workshop so she can offer better service.

loans.use: to buy an upholstery sewing machine and a cutting machine.

loans.name: San Pablo Group

texts.es:
San Pablo es el grupo de 14 mujeres de la ciudad de Luque, son todas amigas y vecinas de esa ciudad, que se unieron con el proposito de formar parte del programa de la fundacion y de esa forma salir adelante y ayudar a sus familias.
La Sra.Cristina tiene una despensa, esta casada con el señor Mariano, tienen  2 hijos. Ella retiro el credito  para la compra de productos  variados para su despensa, como ser panificados, bebidas, golosinas, yerba, etc.Cristina tiene como meta ir agrandando su negocio y  agregar mas productos para brindar una mejor atencion a sus clientes.
texts.en:
San Pablo (Saint Paul) is a group is composed of 14 women coming from the town of Luque. They are all friends living in the same neighborhood, and they have come together to take part in the program of Fundación Paraguaya in order to progress in life and to help their families.
Cristina is married to Mariano, she has 2 children and she runs a small store. She has requested a loan to buy different products for her small store such as baked goods, soft drinks, sweets and yerba. Cristina’s goal is to expand her store by including more products to sell in order to offer a better service to her customers.

loans.use: To buy baked goods, soft drinks, sweets and yerba.

loans.name: Dionicio

texts.es:
Dionisio es casado y tiene siete hijos que están en etapa escolar, viven en casa propia ocupando tres habitaciones, la casa esta ubicada en la zona San Juan de la ciudad de La Paz.
El estudio solo hasta la primaria y actualmente trabaja como albañil por más de diez horas realizando todo tipo de trabajos en construcción ya que debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación, educación y servicios básicos de su familia siendo el único que contribuye en la parte económica de su familia.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de ladrillos, cemento y arena para construir un muro perimetral alrededor de su vivienda ya que desea dar más seguridad a su familia.
El sueño de Dionisio es construir más habitaciones para dar más comodidad a su familia ya que son nueve miembros que viven en tres habitaciones, también desea mejorar sus ingresos para poder pagar los estudios de universidad de sus hijos los cuales ya ingresarán a la universidad.
Es la segunda vez que solícita el crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Dionisio is married and has seven children who are school age; they all live in his own house occupying three rooms.  The house is located in the city of La Paz’s San Juan zone.

He only went to elementary school and currently works in construction more than ten hours doing all types of construction jobs since he has to cover food, education and basic utility costs for his family and he’s the only income earner in his family.

He needs the loan for the walls at home because he wants to give his family more security.

Dioniso’s dream is to build more rooms to provide more comfort for his family since they are nine members living in three rooms.  He also wants to improve his income to be able to pay his children’s university expenses since they are about to start university.

This is the second loan request to IMPRO and first to KIVA.

loans.use: to purchase bricks, cement, and sand to build a perimeter wall around his home

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
El Sr. Luis es un hombre quien trabaja como mecánico en una empresa del estado desde hace 13 años, es casado y cuya familia está conformada 1 hijo y su esposa, este crédito lo quiere para comprar unos lentes para la esposa y exámenes médicos como ultrasonido.

Don Luis tiene 4 créditos de trabajar con nuestra institución  el ha sabido aprovechar para mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Luis is a man who has worked as a mechanic in a state entity for 13 years.  He’s married and his family is composed of a son and his wife.  He wants this loan to buy his wife eyeglasses and to pay for medical exams like ultrasound.  Luis has had four loans with our institution and he’s known how improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy eyeglasses and pay for medical exams.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad, age 38, is an agriculture engineer who supervises a number of farms. He also opened a small food and convenience store in order to have another source of income for his family. His wife is a teacher, and together they are raising five children.

He has applied for this loan in order to work on the internal design and expansion of the store. He also intends to rent a storage room.

loans.use: to work on the internal design and expansion of his store and to rent a storage room

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: Maria vive en Libertad en donde tiene un pequeño bazar. A sus 46 años, Maria es viuda y tiene un bebe de 4 meses de edad. Empezó el negocio cuando falleció su esposo ya que era él quien mantenía a la familia, y como estaba embarazada debía pensar en su futuro. Fue así como compro una vitrina la cual coloco en la sala de su casa empezando a ofrecer sus artículos. A la venta tiene ropa de bebe, desodorante, gel, reloj, perfumes, crema, maquillaje etc., atendiendo todos los días desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche. Ella da gracias a Dios porque tiene acogida en su negocio ya que su bebe demanda gastos y cuidado y si trabajara en una empresa no podría atenderla. El préstamo que solicita es para la compra de mercadería ya que hay artículos que sus clientes solicitan y no tiene, espera mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en: María lives in Libertad where she has a small store.  At the age of 46, María is a widow and has a four-month-old baby.  She started the business when her husband died since he was the family’s source of support and since she was pregnant she had to think of her future.  This is how she bought a display case that she set up in her living room starting to sell her items.  She sells baby clothes, deodorant, gel, watches, perfume, cream, make-up, etc. and is open for business every day from 8am until 7pm.  She thanks God that her business is well-received because her baby generates expenses and care and if she worked for a firm she’d be unable to take care of her.  The loan she’s asking for is to buy merchandise because there are items her customers are requesting that she does not have.  She hopes to increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy assorted merchandise.

loans.name: Nicolas Carlos

texts.es: Nicolás de 29 años se dedica a la mecánica automotriz. El negocio lo emprendió de su padre quien le enseño desde niño primero cosas básicas como cambio de llantas, cambio de aceite, dar aire. Al pasar los años y como fue creciendo fue aprendiendo el arreglo de motores ya que para esto necesita más técnicas, por eso a realizado varios cursos para actualizarse en marcas y modelos de autos. En la actualidad sigue viviendo en Duran con sus padres y administrando el taller ya que a echo de esta actividad su forma de vida. Nicolás no tiene un horario fijo para la atención ya que está disponible cuando lo llaman, si no es en su domicilio se traslada hasta el cliente. Con el préstamo va a comprar lubricantes para autos y varias herramientas que necesita para el arreglo de los mismos. En su futuro espera abrir su local propio y contratar ayudantes de ser posible.
texts.en:
Nicolás, 29, is a car mechanic.  His father started the business and taught him basic things like changing tires, oil and putting air in tires when he was a little boy.  As time went by and as he grew he learned how to repair motors since that’s what requires the most technical ability.  Because of this he’s taken several courses to learn about various makes and models of cars.

He continues to live with his parents in Duran and running the shop since this has become his way of life.  Nicolás does not have a fixed work schedule since he’s available whenever he’s called for service either at the shop or at the customer’s address.

He will use the loan to buy lubricants for cars and several tools he needs to repair cars.  In the future he hopes to open his own shop and hire helpers if possible.

loans.use: to buy car lubricants and tools.

loans.name: Rashad

texts.en:
Rashad, age 27, works in a garage as a mechanic. He is unmarried and has four younger brothers. Recently, he learned the valuable skill of diagnosing and repairing the computerized and programmed elements of modern cars. 

Rashad has now opened a small business of his own in a section of the garage where he can offer diagnosis of computer-related issues in cars. He intends to buy more tools and equipment related to this work. It is for this purpose that he has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: to buy more tools and equipment for his car repair business

loans.name: Farial

texts.en:
Farial, age 49, prefers not to put her photo on the Internet, so her son is pictured here. She lives in Hay Nazal, Jordan, with five family members. 

She is requesting a loan of 600 JOD so that she can pay the tuition costs at her daughter's university. She is also planning on buying products that she will sell wholesale to increase her income. 

In the future, she would like to marry off her son. 

Her dream is to buy and own a family home.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's university tuition

loans.name: Maryam

texts.en:
Maryam, age 37, is a homemaker caring for nine sons and daughters. She is helped by her husband, who works as a bus driver.

To help her husband in supporting their big family, Maryam obtained a small number of sheep and goats and started an animal sales business. She has now applied for this loan in order to buy higher-quality feed and to expand the barn so that she can bring in more goats.

loans.use: to buy higher-quality feed and to expand her barn

loans.name: María  Teresa

texts.es: María  Teresa de cincuenta y dos años de edad  vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz, tiene años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite mejorar su labor día con día, el terreno de cultivo es grande y está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola, comercia en todos los alrededores y ya tiene mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo que comería es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; María es una mujer entregada a su labor con muchos sueños que desea alcanzar, piensa que ningún esfuerzo es insignificante porque esas pequeñeces son las que nos conduce al éxito, quiere empezar con poco, pero aumentara la producción para ello necesita invertir en insumos pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante, insecticida, herramientas, etc. María Teresa tiene buen record crediticio y una moral impecable por eso asegura que podrá cancelar el financiamiento y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: María Teresa is fifty-two years old and she lives with her life partner and their children. She is a farmer, specifically growing corn. She’s been in this line of work for several years and has acquired great experience that allows her to improve on a daily basis. Her field is big and it is located in a zone of intense agricultural activity. She sells her products in all the neighboring areas and she has many customers because they know that all they eat is of good quality and comes at affordable prices; on top of this, she provides an excellent service. María is dedicated to her job and she has many goals she wants to reach. She thinks that no effort is trivial because it’s the small things that bring one to success. She wants to start with small quantities of products to increase the quantity in the future, but she needs working capital and for this reason she has requested a loan to INTEGRAL to buy corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide and tools. María Teresa has a good credit record and has an impeccable moral, and this is why she is sure she will repay the loan and that she will be able to offer a better standard of living to her family.

loans.use: To buy corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide and tools.

loans.name: Luis Carlos

texts.es: Luis es un joven comerciante de accesorios. Tiene 30 años y vive en el Fortín junto a su familia. Su esposa Janeth se dedica al mismo negocio ya que tienen 5 hijos estudiantes. Con una familia tan amplia es normal que necesiten mejorar sus ingresos. Su historia empezó al salir del cuartel militar, trabajo en varios lugares pero nada fijo así que decidió invertir en la compra de gafas y artículos de celular. Luis inicia sus actividades desde las 10 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde recorriendo diversos sectores, la mercadería la expone en un tablero donde ofrece los artículos. Como es un comerciante informal su mayor preocupación son los Municipales quienes se llevan sus artículos sino presenta permiso de funcionamiento. Al perder la mercadería pierde capital y ganancias por ese motivo se mueve a diferentes sectores. Los recorridos no lo hace solo ya que su esposa lo acompaña. Luis solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería espera mejorar sus ingresos y continuar trabajando para ayudar a sus hijos en el estudio
texts.en:
Luis is a young accessories merchant.  He’s 30-yeras-old and lives in Fortín with his family.  His wife, Janeth, is in the same kind of business since they have five children who are students.   With such a large family, it’s normal that they need to increase their income.

His story started when he finished his military service.  He worked in various places but nothing lasted so he decided to invest in the purchase of sunglasses and mobile phone accessories.  Luis starts his work day at ten in the morning and goes from place to place until 6pm.  He displays his merchandise on a board where he offers his items.  

Because he’s an informal merchant, his greatest concern is the municipal authorities who confiscate his wares if he does not have an operating permit.  Losing his merchandise means losing capital and profits which is why he moves from sector to sector.  He doesn’t make these moves alone since his wife comes with him.

Luis is asking for the loan to buy merchandise.  He hopes to increase income and continue working to help with his children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy sunglasses and mobile phone accessories.

loans.name: Ayda

texts.en:
Ayda, age 44, is a conservative woman caring for six sons and daughters, the oldest of whom is Aseel who appears in the photo.
